source: あっという間
target: Nothing.

source: 覚えてる　あっという間の出来事
target: As I recall it ended much too soon You look marvelous.

source: 先生ならあっという間よ
target: Doctor Mixter have you stitched up in no time.

source: ほら　ほら　あっという間に過ぎ去る 取るに足らないことだ
target: Look, look, it was fleeting, inconsequential.

source: もしこれが本当に最後のチャンスなら、 何かあっと言わせるようなものを見つけないと。
target: If this really is your last chance, we need to find you something spectacular.

source: - 違うんだ - あっと言わせたくて
target: You're just trying to make me say something nice.

source: この新しいパートナーシップの早い成功を 互いに喜んでいます あっと言う間の２年、ヤムラに 最初のＧＰ勝利をもたらしました
target: Both delighted with the quick success of this new partnership which has brought Yamura his first Grand Prix victory after two years of flying.

source: あっと言う間だ
target: In a heartbeat

source: 炎よ あっと言う間に 骨まで燃え尽きる
target: He'll melt the flesh off your bones in the blink of an eye.

source: （哲希） プハーッ そりゃそうだ このまんまだと うちのクラスは 吉森のいいようにされちまうね
target: Well, that's right. If this continues, it will only benefit Yoshimori.

source: 奉公に行かなくていいようにする
target: I promise thee, you'll need not leave to serve the Tildens nor any family else.

source: 勝手なまねをした罰だ いい気味だ
target: Enough! They've had their fun!

source: - 全くいい気味だな メリー
target: -Not too happy at all, Merry.

source: いい気味だね
target: Crying like a sucky baby.

source: さあさあ いい目が出でてくれよ
target: CROUPIER: All right, boys. Come on, now.

source: 奴を見て... 奴の 大きくて かわいい目を見て... 答えてくれよ
target: Look into his eyes those big, pretty eyes and tell me yes or no.

source: まわりの連中は　いい迷惑だな 自分が間違ってることを 君は決して認めない
target: You know, it must be very difficult for people around you, the fact you can never admit to being wrong.

source: 患者さん　いい迷惑だな。
target: What a nuisance it must be for the patient.

source: 彼はいい顔をしないわ
target: I'd tell him myself, but he wouldn't understand.

source: いい子になるのも・・
target: I was free.

source: あなたは走り続けた　スー いい子になりたくてね 大学生になるのを夢見て そして理想のボーイフレンドと 素晴らしいプロムを
target: You kept running, Sue, little Suze, because you've been dreaming about senior year and the perfect boyfriend and the perfect prom your whole goddamned life.

source: では いい子になるのよ
target: Now remember, Pinocchio, be a good boy.

source: 問題児だったけど― いざという時は勇敢だった
target: He was a real handful... but when it came down to it, he was very brave.

source: いざという時が来たら― 君はどのくらいで ラボを引き継げるかな
target: If push came to shove, I was wondering how soon you might be able to take over the lab yourself.

source: いざという時　やり返す
target: I'm going out like I came in: screaming and kicking.

source: おじゃんになった
target: Mm. Now, that blows.

source: ほぉ　お世辞でも嬉しいな
target: Whoa. Well, I'm flattered.

source: お先真っ暗だな 勝手にやってろ
target: 'Cause you just blew the best thing you had going for you.

source: - お安い御用
target: - You're welcome.

source: あなたが勝って― お山の大将になったら―
target: And once you've won, once you're king of the mountain,

source: お手の物ね
target: You're so good with him.

source: 反対尋問で陪審員は 銃はお手の物だった事が判りますし
target: So on cross-examination the jury could hear about how well he handled a gun?

source: お手上げね
target: Allergies. Nothing you can do.

source: お手上げだよ
target: I wish to hell we did.

source: あぁ　基本的なことはね 君にはお手上げだろ
target: Yeah, I got the basics. Wow. You are so in over your head.

source: とんだところでお目に掛かったな
target: - It's great to see you, Leslie!

source: すこし戸惑われたかもしれませんが お目に掛かれて大変光栄です
target: I'm very pleased, if slightly puzzled, to make your acquaintance.

source: 礼はする、またお目に掛かろう 近いうちにな
target: I'm gonna make a problem for you. I'm gonna be seeing you again, real soon.

source: 私たちにお誂え向きの仕事だわ
target: So we've got our work cut out for us.

source: お誂え向きだわ
target: We're not going to get a better window.

source: 財務長官だったんだよ お門違いどころか
target: I was the US Treasury Secretary. I'm in some position to make that call.

source: そもそも、お門違いだし
target: 'Cause you shouldn't be, anyway.

source: 身分の違い 願うのは　お門違い
target: Because you'd be barking up the wrong beanstalk.

source: あいつ等のおべっかで 満足しました？ Kiss your(my) ass おべっかを使う、誰々のゴマをする
target: Did they kiss your ass to your satisfaction?

source: かっとなって言っただけだよ
target: Listen, I'm sure your sister didn't mean what she said.

source: きまりが悪かったか？
target: You embarrassed about me?

source: ひどくきまりが悪かったよ たった５分間なのに
target: It was fucking embarrassing. It was only for five minutes.

source: きまりが悪いわ
target: It's embarrassing.

source: 始めた事の けじめを付けたいよ
target: I'll finish what I started.

source: おい　けりを付けたくないなら やめろ？
target: Hey, don't start this if you don't want to finish it.

source: しょうもない酔っぱらいが
target: You fucking drunk.

source: しょうもない男と 関係を持ったんだ
target: Hooked up with this guy. He was no good. His name was...

source: - トレントしょうもないやつだ
target: Trent was a dick.

source: だが そうは問屋が卸さない
target: I just don't get it, Spock.

source: 笑顏も見せてくれないし 直ぐそっぽを向くし
target: Never give me a smile, or even a shrug.

source: その手は食わないわ
target: Oh, no, I'm not falling for that.

source: その手は食わない
target: I know what you're doing.

source: もうその手は食わないわ
target: I'm not falling for this shit.

source: それはそれは、ほれぼれすること 目元が引き立って素晴らしいことね
target: Okay. Well, you look adorable. It really brings out your eyes.

source: めっちゃ うれしかった それは それは普通にうれしかった 俺は
target: -Yeah, it made me super happy. It made me happy.

source: 前回までのFringe... そ知らぬ顔で 成りすましたせいでしょ
target: Just because you walked in my shoes, don't you think that you know me.

source: そ知らぬ顔で 私の人生を奪ったせいでしょ
target: Just because you walked in my shoes don't you think for a moment that you know me.

source: 知られたら あなたは、ただでは済まないのよ
target: The point is, if he finds out about this, he's gonna transfer your ass to juneau so fast,

source: ちゃんちゃら　おかしいよ
target: That was a stupid idea.

source: ちょっかいを出してるんじゃないよ
target: I'm not bothering them none.

source: オオカミにちょっかいを出すと 群れでやって来るぜ さっきの仕返しだ
target: Guess nobody told you, if you mess with the wolf, you get the fangs.

source: ちょっかいを出したくなかったけど
target: I didn't mean to interfere, you know. Silly girl.

source: デイブ　目に付く女全てに ちょっかいを出すのはやめてくれないか?
target: Dave, would you quit bothering every girl you see?

source: ちょっとした金
target: A little money. No, sorry.

source: より汁気の多い料理を作れるし、 ちょっとした見栄えと演出も 料理に加えられる。
target: It creates a more succulent dish and adds a little theatricality to dinner.

source: 私が冒険中 ちょっとした相棒を得るなら それは 感情や 気まぐれからではありません 多くの素晴らしい資質を 持っているということです
target: If I burden myself with a little helpmate during my adventures, this is not out of sentiment or caprice, it is that he has many fine qualities of his own that he has overlooked in his obsession with me.

source: もし私が力を貸すと いったらどうかしら 貴方の抱えるクラウス問題と ちょっとしたネタを 引き換えに?
target: What if I told you that I could help you out with your Klaus problem in exchange for the tiniest bit of gossip?

source: とてもじゃないが
target: No, he's taking it pretty hard.

source: とどのつまりだな　ジョン 我々が心と頭を奉げる対象とは 一人の男ではなく　理想なのだよ
target: Ultimately, John, we owe our hearts and our minds not to any one man but to an idea, and that idea is under threat.

source: とどのつまりは 殺されるってのに
target: And you are en route to getting yourself killed,

source: とどのつまりはな
target: Eventually, yeah.

source: ない知恵を絞ってね
target: You know, in case you got displaced.

source: そして、ほとぼりが冷めるまで、あなたはココに隠れています。 あなたがそれを知っているから。
target: And you're hiding out here until things cool down because you know it.

source: あんたは見てみぬ振りで 満足だっただろうが あんたには口がある
target: You were more than happy to turn a blind eye, but... you're not dumb.

source: 見て見ぬ振りをしています ただ...
target: I stay out of the way.

source: 見て見ぬ振りをした
target: You just looked the other way.

source: 今から起きることは 見るに堪えない
target: What's about to happen is gonna be hard to watch.

source: 見るに堪えないわ
target: I can't watch.

source: 見るに堪えなかった？
target: Was it painful to see?

source: 見るに忍びないか？
target: Can't stand the sight of a little blood?

source: よく言うよ
target: He pressed you. Come on.

source: 生徒と寝といて よく言うな
target: Says the teacher who sleeps with his students.

source: 盗んだ女の分際で よく言うわ
target: That's pretty rich coming from the woman who stole Alex to begin with.

source: 彼の "アキレス腱" だ
target: His Achilles heel.

source: 良いニュースは 彼女のアキレス腱は
target: Yes, the good news, she may have her own Achilles' heel.

source: 私の "アキレス腱"
target: My Achilles heel.

source: アンテナを張ってればドクターはあちこち登場する
target: If you dig deep enough and keep a lively mind, this Doctor keeps cropping up all over the place.

source: オブラートに包んで言おうとしたんだ
target: I'm just- - I'm just trying to wrap my mind around it.

source: 社長、これ以下の表現はオブラートに包む方が
target: Mr. Reid, do you understand that's kind of hitting it delicately?

source: 君たち　キャフリーは　我々より４時間も前に 有利なスタートを切ったことを忘れるな
target: Gentlemen, might I remind you that Caffrey has a four-hour head start?

source: 新しいスタートを切り　古いしがらみも絶った
target: Fresh start, no old ties.

source: いつか 君の復帰する日が 来ることを願おう 初めから　支配人とは いかないだろうが 再スタートを切り 信頼を回復しろ
target: And one day when all this is ancient history, I hope you can come back, maybe not as a building manager at first, but somewhere where you can start over, earn our trust.

source: ベッドの下に潜む怪物に スポットを当ててるだけさ
target: We're shining a light on the monster under the bed.

source: でも スポットライトを 浴びることになれば―
target: But Kate... you're stepping into the spotlight now.

source: スポットライトを浴びたいが パートナーが必要さ
target: I guess I crave the spotlight. All I need is a proper partner.

source: 特に公衆のスポットライトを浴びる のが好きな人物はね
target: Especially one who enjoys the public spotlight so much.

source: タオルを投げる選択肢はない 私たちにあるのは ２つの道だ
target: But seeing as throwing in the towel is not an option that leaves us with a total of two choices.

source: 全てについてタオルを投げちゃうかな
target: Maybe I'll just listen to the universe and... and throw the towel in on the whole thing.

source: タオルを投げる
target: - So I'm gonna call the fight.

source: 私を縛ってたテープを切るから
target: He said he would cut me free.

source: 意外とミーハーなんだよなあ
target: You are pretty oldfashioned, despite your looks.

source: 紗絵子さんは ミーハーな ノリで 新しいものに 飛び付くけど 商品に対しては シビアだよ｡
target: Saeko-san jumps at new things like a trendhopper, but she's a harsh judge of products.

source: 案外ミーハーなんだよね
target: She's oldfashioned despite her looks, right?

source: 大学病院の腐った院内政治に 鋭くメスを入れますよ。 ちょっ　ちょっ...
target: I plan to delve deeply into the rotten politics at university hospitals.

source: ダビデ像が無事だと？ ... モナリザの微笑みは？
target: Who would make sure that the Statue of David is still standing, or that Mona Lisa's still smiling?

source: ユリイカ！
target: Eureka!

source: 一種のユートピアの創造さ つまり...
target: I sort of created a utopian society where we all sort of...

source: 私達は夢中でユートピアを作ったよ
target: We were jamming, man, building utopia.

source: 私たちは毒を持った宿命の人たちの中にい- ます。 常にユートピアです...
target: We are among those whose fate is a poison We are constantly utopia ...

source: それでもあんた　有罪にしたい？ なにがなんでも彼女に犯罪者のレッテルを貼りたい
target: You still want to stamp a mark of conviction on her?

source: あんたは レッテルを貼ってるだけだ
target: These are all labels. You just label everything.

source: 起業して軌道に乗るまでかかった、でもローマは一日にしてならずだよ
target: It took a while to get up and running, but Rome wasn't built in a day.

source: 情報部の幹部は いつも一か八かなんです
target: Intelligence officers usually hedge their bets. It's...

source: 一か八かだが シスコと私でやってみる
target: It's a bit of a hail mary, But Cisco and I are going to give it a try.

source: 一か八かしかない
target: Risk is all I've got left.

source: 一つ間違えれば殺される
target: One mistake, I die.

source: 一つ間違えば大勢の命が
target: We make one mistake, thousands of people die.

source: 年に１度 コウノトリが一堂に会する
target: Once a year, storks come together for one thing. Storkcon!

source: 一寸先は闇だな
target: So, I've been thinking about those thousand razors.

source: 一寸先は闇だ
target: You're dying the death of a thousand razors up there and you don't even know it.

source: 一寸先は闇だ つらい毎日だったよ
target: I don't know. I don't know what happened. Tough couple of days.

source: 気付かれたら 全員が一巻の終わりよ
target: Because if they see you coming, we're all dead.

source: 一巻の終わり
target: But if Torus gets the ARQ... they'll be unstoppable.

source: 一巻の終わりだな
target: We are so dead.

source: 一本取られたな、中尉。
target: Fair point, Lieutenant.

source: 一本取られた
target: - She's got you there.

source: 一本取られたようですな
target: You win.

source: 一杯食わせやがったな！
target: You swindled me!

source: ああ　一杯食わされた だが　失敗した
target: Yeah, you took your shot, but you missed.

source: 一杯食わされたな
target: You should have seen your face.

source: お人よし過ぎた だから一杯食わされた
target: I've been gullible, all right, letting him make a fool of me.

source: 当然彼も一枚噛んでる
target: Of course he was involved.

source: いや　お前は一筋縄では行かない
target: No, nothing with you is easy.

source: - 奴は　一筋縄では行かないからな
target: - He's not playing with a straight bat?

source: ええ 彼はもっと上手に対処すべきだ でも　彼は友人で 彼の為にひと肌脱ぐつもりだ
target: But he's my friend, and I'm gonna bat for him.

source: 私が持ってきた情報は 一刻を争うものです
target: The Intel that I brought back is time sensitive.

source: 一刻を争う事態でしたので 報告が遅れたことはお詫びします (浅野)結局 国税に持っていかれたら 元も子もないですね
target: but it was a race against time. it was all for naught.

source: 一刻を争ってる
target: Father, they don't have a lot of time.

source: どう　一口乗らない？
target: So, what do you say?

source: 僕も　今度 一席　設けるから。
target: I'd love to meet him sometime. I will.

source: 今夜は特別だ、まず一張羅に着替えろ
target: You have a feast tonight. First change your clothes.

source: 彼の一張羅の上着だぞ
target: He only wears that one damn jacket.

source: （逮捕に一役買ったので 俺達の違法行為は見逃されたのだ）
target: But since we led the cops to Harken they ultimately agreed to let our other offenses slide.

source: ジェーンはオレたちには トラブル メーカーだ 粛正に一役買っても良い
target: Now, what befell Jane is very troubling to all of us, and we would like to help you to set it right.

source: 私が君の記憶に一役買うとしたら？
target: What if I help your memory?

source: 大丈夫 一息入れて　落ち着いて
target: Okay. Just breathe and relax.

source: 俺達が　一息入れるころ 船はダイヤを乗せて　パリに向かう
target: When we come up for air, that ship will be headed to Paris and the diamond will be gone forever.

source: - 一息入れろよ、マイク
target: - Get some ice cream, Mike.

source: 僕は今日１日　この２３人の前容疑者の 一言一句漏らさず 一挙手一投足から　無意識な反応まで 観察し続けていた
target: I spent today soaking in every word, every gesture, every involuntary reaction of these 23 former suspects.

source: 地域外では大規模な掘削活動が 行われていて - -我々は一挙手一投足を見張られている
target: There has been massive digging activity out there and they undoubtedly monitor our every move.

source: 仕事に戻ったばかりの 君にしてみれば 情緒が不安定な状態にもなるし 君の一挙手一投足を観察してる 上の奴らに対して
target: I understand your precarious emotional state, given you've just gotten your job back, and your sensitivity to the bureaucrats that are watching your every move.

source: つかまってろ 小惑星帯に入るぞ これで一泡吹かせてやる
target: We'll move into the asteroid field... and we'll have a couple of surprises for him.

source: 自殺行為だ アンナに一泡吹かせてやりたいが
target: It's a suicide mission.

source: 配置についた 一泡吹かせてやる
target: We're on point, ready to give them some of their own medicine.

source: - アルフォンには一目置かれている - おう　そうか？
target: I saw Alphonse respected me back there.

source: 彼はお前を一目置いている
target: He sees something in you.

source: 皆が一目置いてる NYの私立学校関係者も
target: That sort of thing means something to people in private schools in New York City.

source: "教会は 考えられる限りの" あらゆる医療に 多大な努力を払っていますが 心理学的な説明は お祓い前には一笑に付されます
target: The church takes great pains to make sure every conceivable medical or psychological explanation can be ruled out before moving forward.

source: 一笑に付され 自分の首を絞めるだけだ
target: They'd laugh at the truth, and I'd have my head in a noose.

source: お前達とは問題を起こしたことがなかった 反逆の一翼を担うまではな
target: I never had a problem with your people... until they became a part of this rebellion.

source: 私は偉大な愛国戦争の 一翼を担う事を 誇りに思います
target: I am proud to be part of this mission in the great patriotic war.

source: 近づく為に一芝居打つよ
target: I want to get close to Latimer. And I'll need a cover story.

source: 彼は一言もなく 何週間も行方をくらましたんです
target: He has been gone for weeks.. Not a single word.

source: 一言もなく死亡しました
target: And did not live to tell about it.

source: 私に一言も無く？
target: Without telling me?

source: うん　三度目の正直ね
target: Yeah, maybe three times is a charm.

source: - 三度目の正直か？
target: "Third time's a charm?"

source: 長官たちが 党大会の壇上に立って― 犯人逮捕を アピールするんだぞ
target: The entire top tier of the Bureau's in town to stand onstage and show the world that we prevailed.

source: そこの上げたり下げたりしている人
target: Well? What's your vote?

source: 実験の成功の為 私は上手に出るしかなかった
target: For the experience to succeed. I had to get the upper hand,

source: CIAの一つ上手を行きたいの？ そうだ CIAの現状を暴露したい
target: Yes, I want to expose the CIA for what it's become, but... mainly, I want to catch him.

source: 真剣にやれ 下手すると怪我するぞ
target: Take this serious, because you can get hurt if you're not strong enough, okay?

source: 下手すると 誰かの人生を台無しに
target: If I fuck up I can ruin somebody's whole life.

source: 今､上手くいってますが下手をすると終わりです
target: Now, we walk in there like this, with this, we're done.

source: 真剣に言ってる 下手をすると これから20年は監獄だぞ
target: Preston, if you're not careful, you're going to spend 20 years in prison.

source: あの高さじゃ不幸中の幸いだった
target: Not bad, considering the height.

source: "それを知られてないのは 不幸中の幸いだ"
target: Yeah, well, I'm glad they don't know that.

source: それでも不幸中の幸いだ
target: We're lucky they got out when they did.

source: 花火は不発に終わり 最悪の事態に
target: Only Fitzpatrick didn't explode, it was far worse than that.

source: だが不発に終わった
target: That's the only reason why I'm still here.

source: 不肖の父親だがやらない
target: Look, I'm not the world's best dad, but I would never do that.

source: 息子の不興を買うのが怖いんでしょ？
target: Terrified of displeasing him, aren't you? I know how my son can be.

source: 掛けて 悲しむべき事に 世に出る前に死んだ
target: Sadly, fredrick died without ever being published.

source: この写真が世に出たら ＤＥＡは終わりだ
target: The DEA's worst nightmare is that face out in public.

source: 君が怒る必要は　無い これが世の習いって　やつだ
target: Maybe angry is just the way of the world.

source: 栄光は長子のもの それが世の習いだが
target: You're the elder, you reap the glory. This is the way of the world.

source: 世も末だ
target: Even for the apocalypse.

source: 俺がこんな事をするとは 世も末だ
target: Of all the horrible things I have had to do in the apocalypse,

source: そんなに誉れ高き王たちが運び屋に用があるとは世も末だ
target: What is the world coming to when smugglers must vouch for the honor of kings?

source: 悲劇にも 若くしてこの世を去った...
target: ...who was snuffed out... tragically early.

source: 全員笑いで息を詰まらせるまで この世を去るつもりはない
target: And I'll not leave this world until they all choke on that laughter.

source: 何年も前に世を去った
target: Lost for many years.

source: ほんとに世話が焼ける人
target: Your uselessness is epic.

source: 来年　僕はずっと家にいる 世話が焼けて ママも大変だ
target: I guess I'll just be home, which sucks for you because it's gonna be so hard for you to go through all my stuff.

source: ポッポちゃんは　世話が焼ける
target: You must admit she works hard with those chicken feathers!

source: 俺は人の世話になったことない 自分のことは自分でする
target: I've always paid my way. You know I send what I can.

source: 残りを昔世話になった遺伝学の教授に送ったの
target: I sent on to my old genetics professor.

source: 世話を焼いてくれんでも 自分で出来る
target: Why must you always mother-hen me? I'm quite capable of looking after myself.

source: レノックス･ヒル病院前です ヴァン･ルーンとの合併が 世間を騒がせてますが
target: Outside Lenox Hill Hospital today, more twists and turns in the Van Loon-Atwood merger.

source: ああ　だが　あの銃は両刃の剣だ
target: Yeah, the gun's a double-edged sword, kind of.

source: 歯止めとして働きますが 両刃の剣です
target: Besides, he's hot.

source: ダンスフロアでは 両手に花で踊つたものだ
target: On the dance floor I used to dance with girls on each arm.

source: だから、私は中に入る チャップルが何を 隠しているのか見つけて下さい
target: So, I'll go back in, see what exactly Chapple's hiding.

source: さあ　中に入って 何かお口に合う物を探さなくては 文明国から来たお友達にね
target: Oh, come inside, and we'll see if we can't get you some food, and some civilized company.

source: じゃあ　気が済んだら― 中に入って貰えるかな？
target: Well, now that you have, can I politely invite you to step off my fucking porch?

source: 注目の的になることは 彼女にとって　荷が重すぎて 悪い仲間の中に入ってしまった
target: The attention was too much for her, and she fell in with the wrong crowd.

source: このバカは７，８人の ゾンビの真ん中に立ってた
target: This prick stands right in the mix, while seven or eight of them turn Zeke all at the same time.

source: ｳﾞｫｰｹﾞﾙはどのように丸くなった How the fuck did that happen ?
target: How did Vogel come round? How the fuck did that happen?

source: でも、あなたの可愛い娘は九死に一生を得ましたよ。
target: But your little darling's got nine lives.

source: 知ってるのは未来の運命 予断を許さない状態 あなたは役割を果たせばいい
target: All I know is that the fate of the future hangs in the balance, and you have some role to play.

source: 銃で撃たれ 予断を許さない状態です
target: Hancock is in serious condition with multiple gunshot wounds.

source: ナショナル・シティ総合病院にて 昏睡状態で― 予断を許さない状態が続いていますが スーパーガールのタイムリーな 到着が無ければ...
target: Willis is currently in a coma at National City General, although her fate would have been much more grim had it not been for the timely arrival of Supergirl...

source: あんな美しい人とは争えない
target: I cannot vie with such beauty and such sorrow.

source: りんごは木から離れた所に落ちない （血統は争えない）
target: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree, my friend.

source: 血は争えない
target: Blood runs true.

source: 簡単に事が運ぶとは言ってない
target: I never told you it was gonna be easy.

source: そう簡単に 事が運ぶわけないじゃない？
target: You didn't think that'd be that easy, did you?

source: シンプルに事が運べば 人間 苦労しないよ
target: If things were that simple, no one would ever suffer.

source: ゾーイ・バーンズの 記事によると デュラント上院議員が― カーン退場後の 新たな国務長官候補に...
target: Zoe Barnes of the Washington Herald now reporting, quoting a source close to the President, as saying that Senator Catherine Durant will likely be the new nominee for Secretary of State after Michael Kern's withdrawal earlier this week.

source: この記事によると あなたが ブラック・マウンテン警備 の事件に関わっていたらしい
target: Listen, this paper talks about you being in this Black Mountain Security thing.

source: 地方記事によると、スーザン ジョーンズさん、二人の子供の母．．．
target: Locals reported Susan Jones, an American mother of two...

source: AV業界の多くの女性は 私生活と仕事を 分けているわ
target: A lot of the women in the adult film industry completely separate their porn lives from their personal lives.

source: そして、僕は関与を 非難される事を好まない... 人類の大虐殺の罪を、たった一言... それも僕がすでに指摘した サイロンであろう女性の言葉で
target: And I don't like to be accused of participating in the genocide of the human race based solely on the word of a woman whom I have already indicated to you may well be a Cylon agent.

source: " 事を構えずに済んだ "
target: We have one chance for peace...

source: シフターが事を起こした後は 俺たちのシマを奪い 侮辱したら
target: After what those shifters have done -- chipping away at our territory, insulting us...

source: ご存知通りです　陛下 老師の責務はご希望通りに事を運ぶだけに及びません 戦時には　助言を申し上げることも責務
target: As you know, Your Grace, it is not only the sworn duty of a Maester to carry out the wishes of the house he serves, but also to offer guidance and counsel in times of war.

source: 食事を運ぶ者もなく
target: Nobody to bring her food.

source: 警部 私は頭越しに事を運ぶのは 好みませんし
target: Look, captain, I don't like going over anybody's head,

source: さて、捕虜を取らないとすると、 残る選択肢は二つに一つだ
target: Now, that leaves two ways we can play this out.

source: 死ぬか生きるか、二つに一つだ
target: I am killing us, or saving us.

source: タイヤン・シェンは両方に必要だ 二つに一つの選択だ
target: Both plans require the Taiyang Shen. So, we have to choose.

source: 二つ返事だったわね
target: That didn't take long.

source: 彼と一緒に過ごすために 自分のキャリアは　二の次にした
target: I put my career on hold to be with him.

source: 君がお別れが言えなかった 二の舞いにしないでくれ
target: It's wrong that you didn't get to say goodbye to your sister. Give them what you deserved.

source: ２００８年の二の舞はごめんだ！
target: Squirrel.. I am not going to have a repeat of 2008!

source: スタークの二の舞を踏むつもりはない
target: I don't mean to follow Ned Stark to the grave.

source: 離婚の費用を考えると　いつも 二の足を踏んできたが フリックとの浮気のお陰で 彼女への支払い金額が半分になる
target: The cost of divorce always deterred me but her infidelity with Fricke cut the payout she'd receive in half.

source: ずば抜けた技術で→ 医学界が二の足を踏む術法を 展開させ→ 救えない命を救ってきたのも 事実である」
target: It's also true that with their outstanding skills, they developed surgical procedures the medical world shied away from, and saved lives that otherwise would have been lost.

source: 二重生活を送るように 二枚舌を使った どうしてそんなことをするのか　わからないな
target: That kind of duplicity... leading a double life, I don't know how you do that.

source: 二番煎じを得たと思ってるだろ
target: You think you got a second shot.

source: 彼女は人が変わってしまった と彼女の医療費 -
target: She hasn't been the same, and her medical bills-- look, I'm...

source: 奴は人が変わる
target: The guy flies off the handle.

source: 木の中では いい人が悪い人になる事あるの？
target: Do good people ever turn bad in the upside-down tree?

source: 愛する人が悪いことをした、とかね
target: If their sweetheart's done 'em wrong, they write.

source: ジヤック、ソナだ フランス育ちのアメリカ人だ だから人当たりがいい
target: Hey, Jack, this is Sona, she's an American who grew up in France, which makes her really friendly.

source: 火は人目を引くぞ
target: Is what attracts them, see?

source: 人目を引くためだ
target: Something to lure you in. Like...

source: - "ハッキング"は人聞きが悪いです
target: - "Hacked" is such an ugly word.

source: 人聞きが悪い
target: I wouldn't call it that.

source: 今の今まで　どんな女なのかも知らなかった
target: Until just now, I didn't even know what she looked like. That's funny.

source: そして今の今まで、何が起きたか 納得はしていない
target: And I have never, ever been so convinced of what has to happen now.

source: 今の今まで 誰もそれを指摘しない ここは私有地です どうぞお引取り下さい そうか 私はどこにも行かないぞ
target: Up till now. This is private property, sir. I'm going to have to ask you to leave.

source: でも今は　これまでの 経験の後では
target: But now, after everything we've been through...

source: 今はこれまで以上に重要よ
target: And now it's more important than ever.

source: 今は昔、例の悪いニュースを 聞いた後
target: Now once upon a time, after receiving some particularly bad news

source: ま、今は昔よりだいぶマシになったんだけどね。
target: But it's going better with her now.

source: でも今は昔のように
target: It's like old times.

source: 奴には家族がある 好むと好まざるに拘わらず 結果が付いて回るんだ
target: Cantor has a family and a future and there are consequences for what he did or didn't do.

source: 気に留めるべきは 君が何かを犯したと 誰かが考えた場合 その情報は今後一生君に付いて回る
target: So it's important to note that if someone has a perception of you having done a thing, it will now follow you for the rest of your life.

source: お互いに 付かず離れずよ
target: - Well, it keeps us apart, but not too far apart.

source: 「人民のためだという仮面を被った」 「犯罪や」 「労働運動」
target: Criminality, labor movements masquerading as being for the people.

source: 誰がアンドリア人とテラライト人の 仲を取り持ったと思ってるのか
target: Who does he think got the Andorians and Tellarites talking?

source: でも誰が俺とソビエト政権の 仲を取り持ってくれるんだ？
target: Who'll heal the breach between us and the Soviets now?

source: 自分でほぼ 手を打ちましたが 両親との仲を 取り持って下さい
target: I'd ask you to put in a good word with my parents, but I've pretty much got that taken care of.

source: 姉さんとの仲を 裂こうとしているの
target: She hopes to keep him in town, and persuade you that he does not care about you.

source: やめて私たちの仲を 裂きたいの？
target: If you tell, then you're my enemy! You want to ruin my life.

source: タラにも会わせる顔がない
target: And hell if I know how I'll ever, ever be able to look Tara in the face again.

source: ほんと、アイドルの流河とは、似ても似つかないや
target: You're right. He doesn't even look anything like him.

source: 似ても似つかないね
target: She's a different person altogether.

source: 住めば都
target: Nothing beats a real home.

source: 体で覚えているはずだ。
target: - Should be just muscle memory.

source: 重要ポイントを 体で覚えているんだ
target: It is merely an aid to memory. Helps me marshal the facts already in my command.

source: お身体に障る... ！
target: You are too weak...

source: だから体を壊した夫が会社を 売却するのを内心　喜んでた
target: So it came as a relief when his failing health and a costly lawsuit were forcing them to sell to the competition.

source: あなたの魂が 肉体を壊してる
target: Your dead soul is killing his living skin.

source: もうクスリの乱用や　粗食 身体を壊すような　真似はしない
target: There will be no more pills. There will be no more bad food, no more destroyers of my body.

source: 体を張ってくれた
target: She saved my life, you know?

source: あいつは仲間のために 体を張る男だ
target: That man in there takes bullets for the people he cares about.

source: 何かと言うと...
target: Plus...

source: それは何かと言うと それは･･･
target: I'll tell you what it is. It's...

source: 死因は感電死によるもの 凶器は... 何かと言うと...
target: Cause of death was electrocution, courtesy of... wait for it... a cattle prod.

source: トム、トム 何かと言えばトムか
target: Tom, Tom. You're like a broken record!

source: 何から何まで
target: Alpha to omega.

source: - 彼が何から何まで教えてくれた
target: - He showed me what was what.

source: 彼の意思の何から何まで
target: Any part of his soul.

source: 今日は何から何まで 完璧にしなくっちゃ 可愛いダドリー坊やの 特別な日だもの
target: - I want everything to be perfect for my Dudley's special day!

source: 兄上はいつもそう 何が何でも 皆に犠牲を払わせて
target: You always do, no matter what it costs the rest of us.

source: 何が何でもリンカーンに行く
target: I'm going to Lincoln if it's the last thing I do.

source: 俺がこれまで千年もの間に 何が何でもアンタを 傷つけると思ってるなら 俺をクラウスと 履き違えてる
target: If you think that I'd ever in 1,000 years do anything to hurt you, you got me confused with Klaus.

source: 何が何でも手に入れてやりたい
target: I will stop at nothing to get it for him.

source: 何が何でもゴンドールが 手に入れるのだ
target: We cannot let that happen. This thing must come to Gondor.

source: 何でも来いだ
target: Here you go. Eddie. Hey.

source: 何としても守る
target: Plan to keep it.

source: リバー８情報を 何としても入手する積りだ
target: We're gonna get all the information we need about Liber8.

source: 何としてもやるの
target: We have to.

source: 何はさておき
target: Above all else,

source: "何はさておき 駆けつけます"
target: I'll drop everything. On my way.

source: 年を取るというのは皮肉なものだ 何はともあれ
target: Old age is a wonderful source of ironies if nothing else.

source: 何はともあれだ 問題が残ってないかね
target: Be that as it may... don't think we got the right guy.

source: 何を隠したって？
target: Where what is hidden?

source: ハーヴィーも ご覧に 何を隠そう 彼は...
target: And then I started to pay attention to Harvey and all that he's been doing as our new da.

source: 「そこで 何を 隠しいる？
target: What do you have in there? What do you have in there?

source: 何食わぬ顔をしているが 良くなってはいないよ
target: He's putting on a brave face but he's not doing well.

source: 君の決断を批判する者を 対処しなければならない いつも何食わぬ顔で 始まる
target: You have to deal with all those people constantly second-guessing your decisions, and it always starts out so innocently, doesn't it?

source: 家から出ることを余儀なくされ― 壁の向こうの原野へ追いやられた
target: Forced from your home, driven out to the wilds beyond the Wall.

source: アンディ... 覚えておいて , Jadallaが信じていることを確かめてください 私はあなたにこれをさせることを余儀なくされています。
target: Andy... remember, be sure Jadalla believes I'm forcing you to do this.

source: 私たちは、 馬に彼を結ぶと私の納屋の周りに彼をドラッグすることを余儀なくされた。
target: We were forced to tie him to a horse and drag him around my barn.

source: ティリオン・ラニスターであれば お前の一族が私の一族にした事の借りを返させるために 殺さない理由がないであろう？
target: If you are Tyrion Lannister, why shouldn't I kill you to pay your family back for what it did to mine?

source: 慎重に扱え 値が張る 粉末状だ
target: Careful. It's rare. Pricey.

source: 少し値が張りますが
target: though a little bit expensive.

source: - 値が張るもんな
target: For that price, it better be.

source: 値千金のな！
target: Priceless!

source: 備えあれば憂いなし
target: Pray for the best, prepare for the worst.

source: 備えあれば 憂いなし
target: It's best to be prepared.

source: 備えあれば憂いなしです
target: - Packed already? No harm in being prepared.

source: 最後 傷口に塩ぶっかけて
target: -He cried the most. But he dumped salt on his wounds.

source: 元の木阿弥だ 好印象が必要だろ？
target: And that's really gonna score a bunch of points with the group, okay?

source: 元の木阿弥
target: We're back to square one.

source: でも天使を助けたら 元の木阿弥で またトラブルに陥るぞ
target: I do, but helping angels is what got you in trouble in the first place.

source: - いや あんまし ただ近い内に 元の鞘に収まるとは思えない
target: No, not much, but it doesn't look to me like they're gonna be getting together anytime soon.

source: 貴方にはまだ悪い２つの選択肢がある あなたは出血して先が見えてる
target: Well, you still have two bad choices, but only one ends with you bleeding out.

source: 土地は平等に分配すべきだ 1人の貴族を特別扱いして 先を争わないように
target: The lands should be divided equally so as not to favor one nobleman over another.

source: 先を読む能力よ
target: It's the gift of anticipation.

source: 見つけるのは無理さ 彼女は先を読んでる
target: You're not gonna find her. She's smarter than that.

source: 俺が眠ってる間に 先を越されたのだ
target: She must have passed me while I slept. Well? ...

source: 先を越されブこな
target: Someone got here first.

source: - 先を越されたのかな？
target: - Are we too late?

source: 先手を打って行くわよ
target: They'll go past, we'll keep them ahead of us.

source: 先手を打って 流れを変えないと
target: It's time to get out in front, change the game.

source: 我々は先手を打って カネを追跡可能にした
target: We've got to get a step ahead of these people. The money's rigged, thermal tracking.

source: 先立つ物も無い者に?
target: Someone without his means?

source: これ 入れ替わり立ち替わり みんなが謝りに行くだけで 終わらないですよね？
target: Is everyone just going to take turns apologizing?

source: 八方塞がりなんだろ？
target: I know you're running out of options.

source: 八百長だからよ クィニー
target: Because the game is rigged, Queenie.

source: ジェーンに対する裁判は　八百長だったの
target: The case against Jane was a setup.

source: ケビン　選挙は八百長だった
target: Kevin, the election was fixed.

source: そして帰って来た 献身的な妻とやらの元に もう公然の秘密 パパ以外はね
target: And he comes home, to this devoted wife, and everyone is in on the secret except him.

source: 彼の性嗜好は公然の秘密だった
target: His proclivities were the worst kept secret at court.

source: これは公然の秘密だ
target: This is an open secret

source: 私も爺と同じ考えだ、長い期間、 兵を挙げる勇気を持てないだろう
target: I think my mentor is right. He won't be able to dare anything for a very long time.

source: カラマンオール・イブラーヒムが 兵を挙げたようです
target: Karamanoglu started the campaign.

source: 冷たくなって死んでたんだろ
target: - "Dead" is the word you're looking for. Stone-cold dead.

source: 僕は脚が冷たくなるのを耳にした...
target: I heard of getting cold feet...

source: 常識ある人間なら、ここで 癌の切り札を出すんだよ
target: That's where someone with half a brain would have played the cancer card.

source: この2つは切っても 切れないもの
target: Survival and sacrifice... they go hand in hand.

source: 地球的な表現に「切っても切れない縁」とある
target: There's an Earth expression, "We're stuck with each other".

source: お前が切羽詰まってる時に 一日に6マイルは走ってるし
target: Look, I'm running six miles a day, I'm sleeping eight hours.

source: 切羽詰まってる
target: I'm dead in the water here.

source: "いつもの声が　聞けるのはいいな" "Snake Eyesは　戦列に入った"
target: It's nice to hear a friendly voice. - Snake Eyes has joined the fight.

source: 初心に返るってことでしょう 大事なことだと思うわ
target: Returning to one's origins? I think that's important.

source: 判で押したように毎週　彼女は来る
target: She comes back every week like clockwork.

source: 割に合うことなら 何でもやる
target: Look Vera, I'll do anything within reason. But not that. So forget it.

source: あの少女は 割に合わないかもな
target: Maybe the girl is not worth it.

source: - 割に合わない
target: It's not worth it.

source: 俺がここに居るから いつでも割って入る
target: I'll be right here. I'll step in.

source: アンジェラはきみの親友なんだ オレが２人の間に割って入った
target: Angela is your best friend, and obviously, I've come between you two.

source: 僕が割って入るまで　まさにそんな感じだった
target: Oh, well, it was about to, until I stepped in.

source: つらさを原動力にして もっと強くなってやる
target: I take that shit and I use it as a motivation to push me to be better at what I do.

source: 力になる為に勉強してました 理解できる年齢です
target: I've been studying to be with the force since I was old enough to read.

source: 力になってくれ
target: Help us.

source: 広がりの大きさが - 魅力になる
target: Pretty soon all the Baylor kids saw their friends on our site and we were in.

source: もっと力を付けた
target: The more firepower I got.

source: 着々と力を付け...
target: Wormed his way up the ranks.

source: アンナはフィフス カラムが 力を付けて来たと考えている
target: Anna knows that the Fifth Column's growing stronger.

source: 力を入れてもいいわよ
target: You can do it harder.

source: 男達の描写の方に力を入れてた それは何故 私はモンローに惹かれてるのに
target: I keep writing men better than the woman, which is so strange, because Marilyn is who I'm most captivated by, just like they were, I guess.

source: はやく、もっと力を入れてくれ！
target: Now! Oome on!

source: 寝返っては居ない 安心材料を必要としてる 力を落としてる
target: He's still with us, but he needs to feel a sense of control, power.

source: 一休みしろ　海軍の仲間達が 俺達のために抵抗力を落としてくれる
target: Take a breather. Our pals in the Navy are going to soften them up for us.

source: それを見直して　少し認めてくれるなら 喜んで　私の洞察力を貸してあげるわ
target: If they'd review it, grant me a few, well, then I'd be happy to lend my insights.

source: ちょっぴり私達に 力を貸すだけでいいの 追跡呪文でお兄様を 見つけ出すのに
target: We need you to perform a teeny, tiny locator spell to help us find our brother.

source: 私に何してもいいが、 この悪に力を貸さないよ！
target: You can do what you want with me. I won't be a part of this... this this evil any longer.

source: 身動きが取れなくなっちゃった
target: I'm screwed up.

source: 図書館で身動きが取れなくなってる 分隊が有ります
target: We got a squad pinned down in a library.

source: 最近の出来事も 勘定に入れなくてはなるまい
target: However, recent events must be taken into account.

source: だが彼は勝手を知ってるし 君は関わらないのが一番だ
target: And safe and cautious is you not being involved in this at all.

source: 勝負は時の運
target: You win some, you lose some.

source: 僕の経験では　勤勉は成功の母だ
target: My experience-- diligence is the mother of luck.

source: 難問を 突きつけるのは あなたの 十八番
target: You always told me to ask the tough questions.

source: - 千里の道も一歩から
target: - You have to start somewhere.

source: 千里の道も一歩からだ
target: Every journey begins with a first step.

source: "千里の道も一歩から 最初の一歩から "始まる
target: "A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step."

source: それは分ってるが お前なら 銀河間　超空間　千里眼で 誰か探せるんだろ
target: I know that, but maybe you can use your intergalactic, hyperspace, X-ray eyeballs to find someone else.

source: 千里眼があるのか 霊能者なのか
target: You're either a clairvoyant... a psychic, a seer, a soothsayer, or something.

source: 千里眼だ
target: Clairvoyant.

source: そう何度も危ない橋を 渡ることはできん
target: It's one thing if my employer gets iced. It's another if it happens in his bedroom.

source: 見物はしたためしがない ロックフェラーのように 危ない橋を渡るタイプだ　カラ
target: Never pictured you as a Rockefeller ice-skating type, Kara.

source: この上ご厄介に なる訳にはいきません
target: I couldn't impose on your hospitality any longer, sir.

source: - シアトルへと厄介払い
target: - Shipped off to Seattle.

source: あのクソ女は俺を厄介払いしようってのか
target: God,that bitch pisses me off.

source: 彼は厄介払いだと思うだろう
target: I think he'd take it as an affront, like I'm trying to get rid of him.

source: わしは奴を厄介払いし 指環と財宝を手に入れる
target: I can finish him off with ease, and the ring and the hoard are mine!

source: バートレイの推進してた事業で 反りが合わなくて ガブリエルは クビにされてる
target: Seems Gabrielle was fired for apparently being difficult to work with while Bartley went on to be promoted several times and make a small fortune.

source: お前には反吐が出るよ
target: And that is why I have nothing but contempt for you.

source: 反吐が出るほどだ わしが働くすべてに何時も 自分ばかり見出す
target: To my disgust I find only myself in all I bring about

source: 反吐が出る
target: Makes me sick.

source: ジェダイは　元老院に 反旗を翻すでしょう
target: The council's next move will be against the senate.

source: 人々が反旗を翻した時 お父上は彼らの舌を切って燃やしました
target: When the people rose in revolt against him your father set their towns and castles aflame.

source: アンナの種族にも 反旗を翻す者が
target: Even her own kind are turning on Anna now.

source: 引き止めたが 取り付く島もなかった
target: I tried to stop him, but he definitely wanted to get the hell out of here.

source: 多分　マシンに聞くべきだ サイラス・ウェルズに関する 詳細については あなたは彼を考える前に 取るに足りない
target: Perhaps you should ask the machine for a bit more information about Cyrus Wells before you deem him insignificant.

source: 我々の取るに足りない努力を 見つめることは 帰るのに遠いと言う 注意として役に立つだけだった
target: And to gaze upon our paltry efforts only served as a reminder that we were a long way from going home.

source: あまりに取るに 足らないことだ。 玉皇大帝に話しておこう。
target: It's too trivial to mention to Jade Emperor

source: 少なくとも君は取るに足らない ヒモのように見える　合ってるか？
target: At least you look like a two-bit pimp to me. Am I right?

source: もちろん、あなたのような取るに足らない 人物に伝えるのは簡単ではない。
target: Of course, it's not easy to tell for small potatoes like you.

source: 「"アンナがハルマゲドンを 呼び起こすのなら"」 「"受けて立つ覚悟だ" と」
target: "if Anna's bringing Armageddon, I'm going out fighting. "

source: 口が過ぎるぜ
target: You talk too much.

source: ようは　彼女を愛している だが　彼女はいつも口が過ぎる
target: I eventually loved her, but every time she got out of line,

source: 本当に口が堅いぞ
target: They're real cagey types.

source: 口が堅いしね
target: Yeah, so keep it to yourself.

source: ああ 俺は口が堅い 相棒も まあまあ口が堅い
target: Oh, we're very discreet. I mean, me so, more than him. But, you know, him too.

source: まず人口が多いだろ センター試験で君は
target: Well, first, an awful lot of people live in China, but here's my question.

source: 賢いが 口が悪い
target: Sure.

source: 匂うし　ベタベタだし 口が悪くなって ザーメンがそこらじゅうに！
target: They smell, they are sticky, they say things that are horrible, and there is semen all over everything, okay?

source: 口が悪くて すみません
target: - Rene. Pardon my language, Miss Maxine.

source: おお... この子は口が減らないわね
target: Well, this girl's got a mouth on her.

source: 私は口が滑るかもしれん
target: Or I'm gonna have to.

source: 私からは口が裂けても 申し上げれません
target: Such words have never passed my lips, sire.

source: 若い娘は口が軽い
target: Young girls are notorious for keeping their fucking mouths shut.

source: 口が重いもう1つの理由
target: Another reason for my reticence.

source: さようなら　ギャビン "地獄の王子"の事は 口にするなよ
target: Goodbye, Gavin. Oh, uh... Don't go mentioning that whole "Prince of Hell" thing.

source: わしの前で その名を口にするな！
target: Do not speak to me of Radagast the Brown.

source: ちょっと情緒不安のようだね 怒りのあまり君は・・ 私の忘れたい事を口にした
target: Now, you've had your little tantrum and you said some things in anger that I am willing to forget.

source: それでは　ついに　最後に皆さんの 1部は口に出してるかもしれません 私の特権　私の名誉であり 私の個人的な喜びです 忘れられない時の人
target: And now, finally, at long last, as some of you may be saying, it is my honor, my privilege, my personal pleasure to present to you the man of every hour,

source: ありがたい 口に出すのも はばかる妄想をした
target: Well, that's good to hear, because what I'm thinking is pretty damn awful.

source: パン職人か料金収受人より重要であると 口に出してほのめかしてはいない
target: Not to imply that it's any more important than, say, a baker or a toll collector.

source: ≪(沙苗)お口に合うかしら？
target: I hope it suits your palate.

source: 口に合わなかったでしょ？
target: It was such a bad sandwich.

source: バーボンは口に合うかい？ 女性は強い酒は好まないから
target: Is the bourbon smooth enough? Women don't usually like a harsh whiskey.

source: 「口は　災いの元」とか言うし
target: Loose lips sink ships and all that.

source: 聞かれない限り 口を出すな
target: -Or tell 'em unless they ask.

source: いや　口を出すなクローバー
target: Your Majesty, if you're having cold feet--

source: 化学やら何やらの事は知らん お前もビジネスには口を出すな
target: I don't tell you how to mix your chemicals and whatnot, and you do not tell me how to take care of business.

source: 口を割らせないと 殺すのではなく
target: Our instructions were to break him down not kill him.

source: 弾を食らう前に 口を割ったか？
target: He explain this before he ate the bullet?

source: 刑務所で17年間 口を割らなかった男が―
target: Kept his mouth shut for 1 7 years in San Quentin.

source: それで　誰かが 彼女の口を封じる為に殺した
target: So someone at Infinince killed her to shut her up, and they framed Chad for her murder.

source: 彼らがクーパーをひき逃げした 口を封じるためにね
target: They wanted to hold the hit-and-run over Cooper so that they could force him to do what they wanted.

source: なのに　今朝　ハンク・ジェラルドは 一言も口を挟まなかった
target: Yet this morning, Hank Gerrard doesn't even get a syllable in edgeways.

source: この事件は　長引けば長引くほど 誰も彼もが余計な口を挟んで
target: The longer this goes on the more everyone wants to get involved, stick their oar in.

source: 口を挟むな
target: Just relax. - Kaley... stay out of it.

source: 全員 口を揃えて人命救助か
target: You all sound very noble.

source: 彼を知るすべての人に インタビューをしたが、 みんな、口を揃えて 彼を褒めた。
target: And I interviewed everyone who knew him and they all told me how great he was.

source: みんな口を揃えて 褒めてるよ 君とサシャをね
target: I know people are saying things -- nice things about you and Sasha, hmm?

source: みんな あいつの名前 聞いたら 固く口を閉ざしおる
target: they all clam up.

source: じゃ　なぜ　ヨルムンガンドが言っただけで みんな口を閉ざしてしまうんだ？
target: Why would they just fall silent just because "Jormungandr" says to?

source: いや　口を閉ざしたままだ
target: -...out of him? - No. He wouldn't spill the beans.

source: 偉そうに口を開くな
target: Shut up,shopkeeper. Be still.

source: また口を開いたら もっとひどい状態にしてやる
target: Sherlock, one more word and you will not need morphine.

source: パイセルは口数が多いな
target: Pycelle talks too much.

source: あんたは 口数が多くて言う事がでかいね
target: You've got a big mouth, girl, and too many teeth.

source: 抗争の口火を切ることになるかもしれない
target: Pardillo quick, this might just be the first shot fired.

source: 私が口火を切る前に 立ち寄って会おうと思いました
target: I just thought I'd stop by and see him before I get the ball rolling.

source: ジョンが彼女の口火を切った
target: Well, John always could push her buttons.

source: 親しげな話の口車に乗せて 小僧をたぶらかす
target: With fawning flattery I must win the trust of the foolish, obstinate boy.

source: 結局は口車に乗せられた 児童サービスについて
target: I sweet-talked this from a guy in child services.

source: 台風の目 中心は安全だ
target: In a hurricane, the center is said to be the safest spot.

source: これが台風の目だ
target: This is it. This is the eye of the storm.

source: 新人ながらファッション業界の 台風の目となり 旋風を巻き起こし 日々　進化を遂げています
target: The rookie sensation who has burned his way into the eye sockets of the fashion world, and left them clawing their faces for more.

source: オズへの魔法の入口がある 竜巻　台風の目　渦 でもこの鍵はどんなドアも オズへの入り口にする
target: There are magical ways into Oz -- tornado, eye of a hurricane, whirlpool -- but this key will turn any locked door into a portal to Oz.

source: - 右から左へ流した？
target: - I had to ask you everything that I do? No....

source: 大間違いだった 合わす顔がなかったんだ
target: It's the biggest mistake I ever made. I just... I couldn't face you after that.

source: 2度と合わす顔がない
target: I can never show my face again.

source: プロのアスリートの名が泣くよ
target: Certainly screams out "professional athlete".

source: 退屈してるかと 思ったのよ... こんな名もない場所の 主婦なんかが相手じゃ
target: No, just maybe it's a little dull for you... sitting here telling this to some housewife in the middle of nowhere.

source: 名も無い所から出てきた若い女性は 成功しようと必死になるものだ
target: A girl from nowhere will desperate to make it big,

source: ここは貴女の家です 名もない場所じゃない
target: This is your home. This isn't nowhere.

source: ジャーナリストとして 名を上げようとするかぎり
target: "just so long as you can make a name for yourself "as an investigatory journalist,

source: こんな事になるなんて思わなかったわ 私はいつも自分の名を 上げることに終始してたから 今回も自分が何とかしなきゃって
target: It's something I never thought would happen to me because I've been so busy making a name for myself, and now I'm this close to making captain.

source: - 俺は名を成したい
target: - I want my 15 seconds of fame.

source: だた君の立場は違う 名を成すチャンスだ
target: You, on the other hand, have a chance to make a name for yourself.

source: アンソニー･アマド 名を成す為に容赦ない
target: RICHIE: Anthony Amado had a major hard-on to make a name for himself.

source: 「コミュニケーション連鎖に あなたの本名を残さない様に」
target: "so we don't have a clear record of your true name in our final communication chain.

source: "レンジャー"の名を残す 小さな証だ。
target: Somebody named Ranger might need a little proof.

source: 歴史に名を残すような偉大な 人物になれば、永遠に保存しますよ
target: Of course. Just be a historical document worthy of storing for all eternity.

source: 神の名を汚したのよ 鍵を渡すなら
target: On the name of the lord himself.

source: FBIの名を汚さなければ、 麻薬を使わなければ 昇進は当たり前だ。
target: When you're neither a disgrace to the Bureau nor a drug addict, good things can happen.

source: それで名を汚すことに
target: You decided to ruin it.

source: シーザーの誘いに答えて－ ローマの歴史に名を留める－ 無敗のチャンピオン
target: Caesar is pleased to bring you... the only undefeated champion... in Roman history:

source: 聞いたぞ！ 我が息子の一人が ペルシャの勇者に名を連ねたそうだな
target: I'm told that another of my sons has joined the rank of great Persian Warrior.

source: おまけに投資先も 探しとる 新規事業の出資者に 名を連ねたいと
target: He has some venture capital that's burning a hole in his pocket... he says he might be willing to invest some start-up cash in a fleet of limos.

source: 惜しむらくは ２年前に 名を馳せた探偵にとって 遅すぎたということです
target: 'Sadly, all this comes too late for the detective, 'who became something of a celebrity two years ago.'

source: オセアニアの海で 勇気と力と青春が 残虐に名を馳せた 蛮族の犠牲になった
target: On the oceans of Australasia, courage, strength and youth are sacrificed, sacrificed to barbarians whose only honour is atrocity.

source: 今後は　名を馳せることだろう "ダース・ヴェイダー"として
target: Henceforth you shall be known as... Darth... Vader.

source: あなたが言う " 変化 " に期待し、オレは名乗りを上げました。
target: I volunteered because you said things would change.

source: ニキ･ラウダが再び 表舞台へ戻ってきました 世界チャンピオン争いに 名乗りを上げます
target: Niki Lauda is a major step closer to retaining the World Championship.

source: 完成したら私が実験台に 名乗りを上げようじゃないか
target: I must admit I, I sampled it and ended up drinking it all.

source: 後ろ向きになって 足の裏を見せて
target: All right, turn around, stick your feet up.

source: 彼女は何か僕に 含む所があるんだ。
target: She's got a thing for me.

source: たいていの刑事の服は　味も素っ気もないぞ
target: Most of you have no taste.

source: 一度、味を占めたら 後戻りはできない
target: Once you get a taste of that, there's no looking back.

source: あなた自身が　彼が中毒をぶり返す 呼び水になりうると考えたことある？
target: Have you considered that you yourself could be the catalyst for a relapse?

source: 当然だ　命の綱だからな
target: - Don't forget to pick up the water ration. - I'll do that. I'll die if I don't get water.

source: このバッグを隠せ 俺達の命の綱だからな
target: Hide this bag, it's our life insurance.

source: アル・プロウン・タガートの 最後の存命の親戚で タガート博物館を今のまま正確に 保存することを主張している
target: She's an advocate for preserving the Taggart Museum exactly as it is.

source: 命を懸けて人々に伝えてやる
target: The only way to make people listen is to give our lives.

source: 君たちは 我々を守るため... 戦ってくれている 命を懸けて だが君たちをヒーローだと 言う者もいれば...
target: You have fought for us... protected us, risked your lives... but while a great many people see you as heroes... there are some... who would prefer the word "vigilantes."

source: サミーンは 証券取引所で命を懸けた
target: Sameen risked everything at the stock exchange.

source: 仕事もなく 生活は厳しい でも息子のためなら 命を投げ出すわ
target: I don't have a job and life for me is hard, but I would still die for him, you know.

source: 力が足りないと 分かっても― 犠牲を払っても― 命を投げ出しても...
target: Even when it's not perfect, even if it costs you something, even if it costs you everything.

source: 奴らのために 命を投げ出そうとしてた
target: You was willin' to get killed for 'em.

source: 私は部下の命を 預かっている
target: I'm responsible for these men's lives.

source: 命を預かった
target: We own your lives.

source: 体調が悪い人に 命を預ける気にはなれない
target: I'm not putting my life in your hands if you're not 100%.

source: お前なんかに 世界や 人類や 自分の命を預けなきゃなんねぇオレ達への見返りがこれかよ
target: Is this our payback for placing mankind's future and our very survival in your hands?

source: ここで命を預けてくれないか?
target: Could you throw me a bone here, man?

source: 俺の貞節は、問われるかもしれない。 それで問題にならなければいいなと思ってる。
target: loyalty issues going on, and I do not want to end up rn between my fidelity to you and the reality of having to keep my nose clean.

source: この数キロのかばんは、 数千キロの飛行機と比べると、 問題にならないでしょ？ その上貨物としても手荷物としても 重さは、変わらないはずでしょ？
target: What difference does a few extra pounds make on a three-ton aircraft, whether that's up above or underneath?

source: これ以上問題にならないよう
target: So you shouldn't have any more... Problems.

source: 政府は　喉から手が出るほど あのリストが欲しいんだろ
target: Your government must be salivating over that list.

source: 喉から手が出るほど 哀れだね
target: Need one, desperately. It's quite sad, really.

source: 喧嘩を売る気か
target: We gonna fight, Raymond?

source: 政府に喧嘩を売った 女の発言とは思えないね？
target: Aren't you the same woman who told the government to kiss her ass a few years ago?

source: 何で俺に喧嘩を売ってるんだ？ そっちこそ 何で俺に喧嘩を売ってるんだ？
target: Why you been acting so messed up towards me?

source: 嘘で固めるなら もっと上手くやることだ
target: You know, for somebody who lies all the time, I'd think you'd be better at it.

source: 一回だけで済むだろうって ...そうなると騙し行為の 嘘で固めた人生の始まりだ
target: What I hoped would be a one-time event was just the beginning of a life consumed with lies, intrigue and deception.

source: 嘘で固めた人生だな
target: A life that is a big fat lie.

source: 嘘をつくならもっとマシな 嘘をつけ
target: But you'll have to spin a better story than that if you expect it to get you off the hook.

source: 島を出るのならば すべて嘘をつけ
target: If you have to go, then you have to lie about everything.

source: あのテロ以降 何度俺に嘘をつけば気が済むんだ
target: How come every time we've talked since that bomb went off, you lie to me?

source: 私達はシャンプーのボトルを突っ込んだの 嘘を言うな！
target: - I fell down on the shampoo ... - You lie!

source: 俺が死体を見つけた朝のことで 聞きたいことがあるから来いと 俺に嘘を言ったことか？ それとも
target: Lying and telling me you needed me to come here to answer questions about the morning I found the corpse, or plotting against my boss?

source: 嘘を言うな 腹から脳まで切り裂くぞ そして自分の臓物を食わせる
target: Lie to me again and I'll open you from your belly to your brain and feed you your intestines.

source: 先日君は私に　嘘八百を並べたくせに 今日は　君のパートナーを助けろと 言うのか？
target: You lie to me the other day about everything, and now you expect me to help save your partner.

source: （山里） "四の五の言ってんじゃねえ"と "好きだったら好きでね お互い動きなさいよ"と
target: She basically told them both to make a move if they like each other.

source: 四の五の言わずに働け
target: Why don't you shut the fuck up and get back to work, okay?

source: 因果応報を示さないとな
target: Whatever the play, it has to do double-duty.

source: お前の功徳は因果応報で
target: What merits and retribution are you looking to?

source: 因果応報を信じなければな
target: unless you believe in karma.

source: そんなに固くならないで
target: Don't be so horrified.

source: もう彼のガードは　固くなるだろう 何回言わせりゃ気が済む？
target: How many times I got to say it?

source: 国王によりリヴァランは フレイの領土となった
target: Riverrun was granted to the Freys by royal decree.

source: カンザス州が 領土になった時...
target: --when Kansas became a territory?

source: 常識的で足が土を踏んでる。
target: Sensible girl with her feet on the ground.

source: 即、攻撃は無い 先ずは圧力を掛けるだろ？
target: All they have to do is hint. Vaguely insinuate.

source: 不必要な圧力を 掛ける気じゃないよ 君にね
target: Just not wanting to put any unnecessary pressure on-- on you.

source: もう少しの圧力を掛けてくれ ちょうどいいくらいの
target: Give me a little more pressure. Just what I need.

source: 圧巻は、 彼女がすべて世界と共有するために、
target: Now the best part, in the interest of sharing everything she can with the world,

source: 彼のキャリアも地に落ちました
target: The nail in the coffin of a career. And Powers kicks his glove.

source: 地に落ちた者. . そいつの名は.
target: And his name, for ever more, was the Fallen.

source: ラングとハッチの2人の将軍が権力を争い ラングが勝利しハッチは地下に潜った
target: Two generals claim power. Lang wins the war. Hatch hides in the shadows.

source: それで、俺たちは地下に潜ったのさ
target: So, my team went dark.

source: 私の所に来たら 地下に潜って
target: If they get to me, you're going down, too, remember that.

source: 地獄に仏だ
target: There is a God.

source: 地獄に仏とは　このことだ
target: Talk about a Good Samaritan.

source: ちょっと、堅くなってる
target: Maybe they're a little tight.

source: そうお堅くなるな
target: You're just too tense, man.

source: 堅くなる必要はない。 全体を解決しようと思うな。
target: You don't need to come up with the whole solution.

source: いつからそんなに 口が堅くなったの？
target: Since when, Mr. Blabbermouth?

source: 堪忍袋の緒が切れるぜ
target: But you're really pushing my buttons.

source: 高速道路の近くにある会社の ペーパーカンパニーの壁に ぶち当たった
target: What I got was a wall of shell companies that dead-ends at some corporation off the Dulles Toll Road.

source: 壁に耳があるのは心得ていたが どうやら庭の植え込みにもある
target: I know the walls have ears, but apparently the shrubbery does, too.

source: 壁に耳ありだ
target: Walls have ears.

source: 壁を作って 抑えつけろ
target: Create a mental block, repress them.

source: 心に壁を作るな
target: Let down the walls.

source: 声を大にして言いたいわ
target: Maybe I just need to say it out loud.

source: 今朝は仕事で早く出たので 起こしたくないのもあって 声を掛けていません
target: Uh, I left early this morning for work, so I didn't want to wake her up, so I didn't check on her.

source: 日曜か月曜に会ってる 彼と会話中に 君は声を掛けただろ？ ああ
target: You met him last Sunday or Monday, we were talking and a guy came to get me.

source: 絶対に声を掛けて
target: No, of course call Ivy.

source: 立ち上がって声を揃えて宣言するんだ
target: Standing up and declaring with one voice

source: 何で声を潜める？ 灯りも消えてるし
target: Why I should remain silent, and this darkness?

source: 声を立てるなよ
target: - Hush.

source: - 声を落とせ
target: - Keep your voice down.

source: シー 声を落として
target: Shh. Keep your voice down.

source: 声を落とせ 奴等が来ている
target: Keep your voice down. They're coming.

source: ええ　声を限りに絶叫してます
target: Yeah. He's screaming his head off.

source: 多かれ少なかれ
target: - More or less.

source: 多かれ少なかれな
target: Some just hide them better than others.

source: 多勢に無勢だ
target: We're outnumbered five to one.

source: 多勢に無勢よ.
target: We're outnumbered.

source: 多勢に無勢です
target: They beat us in number.

source: 夢から覚めたように 素晴らしい展望が開けると聞いているが
target: I'm told it gives the feeling of great perspective, like waking from a dream.

source: 悪夢から覚めたようだわ 信じられない
target: Like I just woke up from a nhtmare. It was unbelievable, Ethan.

source: その夢が覚めなかったら？
target: What if you were unable to wake from that dream?

source: 夢が覚めた
target: Good feeling's gone.

source: エレボールの再建なぞ 夢のまた夢
target: If they'd come to me, I might have spared them this disappointment.

source: たどり着くことは 決してない その夢の世界に...
target: We shall never find that lovely land of Might-Have-Been.

source: - 形の無い夢の世界
target: - Unconstructed dream space.

source: - そうだ、 夢を見たよ
target: - Well, you... I was dreaming.

source: イカれた、2重の夢を見た
target: I just had a crazy double dream.

source: 気を失っている間 すごく異様な夢を見た
target: I had the weirdest dream when I was out.

source: 亡くなる二ヶ月ほど前に 母は僕の夢を見た 目を覚ますとここに来て
target: A couple months before she died, she had this dream about me, and she... woke up, she came out here and she just started painting this as fast as she could.

source: 女王は 夢を見ます 少女が窓に座っています 女王が目を覚ますと 私は そこにいます
target: The Queen will dream, that a little girl is sitting on her window sill.

source: どんな夢を描いてる？
target: What do you dream of?

source: 我々は圧力を受けながら 勢力を結集した 我々が夢を描いていた以上に 成功した
target: We joined forces under pressure but were successful beyond our wildest dreams

source: 夢を描かなければならなかった時 それを社会の周辺に捨ててしまった
target: When I had to leave them as dreams

source: 反抗し イカれてて 夢を追う
target: Rebels, lunatics, dreamers.

source: いつも夢を追う人なら
target: When your heart is in your dream

source: エディの邪魔をしたくないし 夢を追って欲しいからって
target: She was pregnant, said she didn't want Eddie to deal with the responsibility, wanted him to pursue his music.

source: 亡くなった女房が毎夜 夢枕に立つんだ
target: I have a past wife that comes to me in dreams.

source: 大目玉を食らうよ あのドロイドは困ったやつだ
target: That little droid's going to cause me a lotta trouble.

source: 大きなお世話
target: None of your business.

source: だから大口を叩く前に その事を思い出してね
target: So keep that in mind before you even think about opening your big mouth.

source: 大口を叩いてるけど無害ね
target: The guy's got a big mouth, but he's harmless.

source: それは無理です 聞きましたよ あなたは生化学学会で 大口を叩いて
target: I hear you like to get sauced at biochemistry conventions and brag about how you're gonna win the Nobel Prize for the work you're doing here, research that has been entirely funded by my late husbands money.

source: えぇ 大手を振ってね - 銃だ！
target: - Yeah, we will.

source: これは皆さんへの警告です こんな怪物が 大手を振って街中をかっ歩しています
target: Let this be a warning to you, ladies and gentlemen, that there are monsters amongst us in the world.

source: 先ず 犯罪が大手を振って まかり通る最悪の都市になった
target: First off, this is the worst damn city in the world to commit a crime.

source: 大概にして下さい
target: Come on.

source: 進歩は大海の一滴
target: The advance would be a drop in the bucket.

source: 彼は店で大盤振る舞いを
target: He came into that bar. He was waving his money all around.

source: １度くらいなら大目に見る トイレ休憩が１回だけ
target: Maybe we can have one stop for a coke and a pee, and that's it.

source: だから 大目に見て かばってきた そしてリスボンに 惨めな思いもさせてきた
target: So I tolerate you and I protect you and I let you make Lisbon's life a misery.

source: 大目に見ると言ったわ
target: You said you'd cut them some slack. I know.

source: 膵臓では第一人者の 鳥井教授が執刀しますので→ 大船に乗ったつもりで いてください。
target: Professor Torii, who's considered a pancreatic expert, is your primary surgeon so rest easy and leave it to him.

source: 大丈夫 大船に乗ったつもりでいろ
target: It's all right, male. Relax to the max. Take a chill pill.

source: 天下分け目を収められた 大御所様なれば　おわかりのはず
target: Your Highness, as the leader of this new realm, I am sure you understand this.

source: 私は　天下晴れて それだけだと思う 私はこれを外務大臣に確認する
target: I think it is only right and proper that I refer this up to the Foreign Secretary.

source: すでにほかの地区で御覧頂いておりますように 「子供の城」プロジェクトは三年前のスタート以来 天井知らずの利益を上げております
target: As you can see, since launching the first Kiddie Kastle project three years ago we've had nothing but unencumbered profit margins.

source: 資産価値は天井知らず
target: With the rumors of gambling going legal, property values are going through the roof.

source: 彼が死ねば　その価値は 天井知らずに上がるわね
target: He dies, the prices go through the roof.

source: それができて ぼくは天狗になった
target: And then, when I finally got there, it wasn't me anymore.

source: 当然だと思うよ｡ それで 天狗になるわけでもなく｡ 性格もいいし アイデアも 豊富だし｡
target: And you're not stuck up about it, you have a good personality, and tons of good ideas, you work really hard.

source: 傭兵では太刀打ちできない
target: They'll beat any mercenary army.

source: For there's no man in town half as manly 誰も太刀打ちできない
target: For there's no man in town half as manly

source: 警察も太刀打ち出来ない
target: Maybe way beyond them, too.

source: 太鼓を叩いて道路を行進して旗をなびかせる
target: You march down the road banging drums and waving banners?

source: 先月衛生指導員が来て 太鼓判を押して帰った
target: Look, we had the county health inspector here last month, and he gave us perfect scores.

source: わが社も彼に 太鼓判を押すよ
target: And the way I feel, my company will underwrite him anytime.

source: しかし、愛のために全てを 放棄した頭のいい女性は、 必然的に自分自身を 見つめ奈落の底へ、 男性や、赤ちゃんでは、 単純に埋められない。
target: But a woman with brains who gives up everything for love inevitably finds herself staring into an existential abyss that men, babies and cardio bars simply cannot fill.

source: 奈落の底まで突き落とされるわ
target: You will end up at the bottom of a hole.

source: 司祭の前で契りを結び
target: We say our vows in front of the high septon.

source: - それは血で兄弟の契りを結んだんだ
target: It was a Blood Pact! Like brothers!

source: 奥行きがない！
target: - Depth! I'm lacking depth!

source: ケンカしても始まらない
target: Come on. Now we're not gonna get anywhere fighting.

source: さっさと立って 外で始末を 付けようじゃないか
target: You're gonna get up, and we're gonna settle this outside.

source: 安心しな　刑事さん 俺にエディを殺った奴の 始末を付けさせれば− 手間をかけない
target: Rest assured, Detective, if I find the person responsible for Eddie's murder, you'll never know.

source: 始末を付けるに十分な
target: We could pay you to have it cleaned up.

source: やつらが姑息な手を使って 隠した事実さ
target: They use static electricity to... to mask the changes.

source: 俺と向き合ったらどうだ 操り人形で 姑息な手段を使わないで
target: Face me like a real man, not with your hand up another's ass like a bloody puppet.

source: 姑息な連中だよ
target: Even for this group, that takes nerve.

source: 知ってる？ 人生、姿勢を正して真直ぐ 立てと言われた続けた
target: Do you know... all my life I've been told to stand up straight, turn out posture, and now...

source: 証拠は もう嫌というほど
target: Boss, we've already been through all this. I mean, I got no leads;

source: もし、生きていないなら、 イザベル・ロシェフは遠慮せずに 嫌というほど見せつけてるさ 信じろ、彼は生きている
target: If he wasn't, Isabel Rochev wouldn't be so shy about rubbing it in our faces.

source: かなり訓練を受けた 嫌というほど
target: I trained you well.

source: 嬉しい悲鳴よ
target: - Good! So good!

source: 完璧に身柄を奪取 騒ぎも無く 無傷で
target: Clean lift. Nothing broken, nothing split.

source: すべて完璧です
target: The pede looks perfect.

source: 体育館に通ったり、整形手術を せずに、完璧な容姿が手に入る...
target: To have perfect looks without trips to the gym or plastic surgery

source: 早い話が 1943年9月3日... でも完璧じゃなかった
target: The point is, September the 3rd, 1943... wasn't perfect.

source: 気が合ったんだ 彼女は美しく完璧だった
target: We click. She's perfect. She's beautiful, she's smart, she's well-read... she's got an ass like a 20-year-old stripper.

source: 宙に浮く？
target: - Can you levitate?

source: 逆フラッシュが何かすれば 液体が宙に浮くんだ
target: Whenever something happens with the Reverse-Flash, liquid floats in the air.

source: 宙に浮いてるよ
target: She's not touching the floor.

source: 目撃者証言とも合わん モノが宙に舞い...
target: That wouldn't explain some of the stranger events described by witnesses. Objects suspended in midair...

source: 俺らは宇宙を飛んでる
target: I can feel it, we're falling through Space, you and me.

source: 宇宙を飛ぶのは 非常に危険だ
target: Makes flying through space very dangerous.

source: 宇宙を飛んでるわ 完璧な弧を描いて
target: She flew through space in perfect arcs.

source: その努力が実を結び 悪の拠点がまた一つ消滅
target: It was a textbook operation, Mr. Chairman.

source: 苦労が実を結んだと感じる
target: and I say, "that's good, I have learned."

source: 私には 寝耳に水の話だ
target: I must admit, it's the first I'm hearing of it.

source: 丸２日寝食を忘れ 生存者を避難させた
target: It took two whole days to evacuate everyone. Didn't sleep. We didn't eat.

source: 察しが付くと思うけど 彼は長いこと病気でね
target: Well, as you probably know, he's had this for a long time.

source: リサと寸分違わぬ外観に
target: Make sure she looks exactly like Lisa.

source: 寸暇を惜しんでね
target: She doesn't stop.

source: "射程距離に入った"
target: I need help! He appears to be held at gunpoint but...

source: 後５分で 山が射程距離に入ります
target: Saddle Ridge will be in weapons range in five minutes.

source: くしゃみ程度でも ハンカチを持たせるのよ ? 小事は大事？ わかりません?
target: If they so much as sneeze, they better have a handkerchief.

source: 小耳に挟んだだけ
target: Oh,I shouldn't have been listening.

source: 小耳に挟みましたよ あなたの大切な秘密も
target: I've heard the chatter about this private initiative.

source: 小耳に挟んだのさ
target: - I hear stories.

source: あなたの尻を叩くため？
target: Give you a swift kick in the butt if you need it?

source: "私の尻を押してくれ"と言ったんだ
target: He said, 'Pull back, my ass. We just got here. "

source: "私の尻を押してくれ"って どういう意味ですか？
target: What does that mean, "Pull back, my ass"?

source: 奴は気付いてなかった 尻尾を出すのを待ってるんだ
target: Clearly, he has no idea.

source: 終に尻尾を出したな
target: So you're finally revealing your foxtail.

source: 感謝するのね CDCが尻拭いをする
target: Thank God the CDC arrived to do your job for you.

source: あるいは、シモンズの尻拭いを しなきゃ いけないのか・・・ またな？
target: Or am I gonna have to save Simmons' ass... again?

source: バブル時代に やりたい放題やった 上の連中の尻拭いをするために 俺達は 銀行員になったわけじゃない こんなところで追い出されてみろ
target: We didn't become bankers to clean up after the mess of the folks at the top who did whatever they pleased during the bubble era. all our efforts will remain unrewarded.

source: 長く尾を引く彗星も 勇気を取り戻した ピエールの心には 新しい未来の象徵に 思われた
target: It seemed to him that this dazzling comet was the perfect symbol of what he felt in his compassionate soul which brimmed with the blossom of a new life.

source: あの宝の山が見えるか？
target: Do you see the hoard heaped up?

source: 岐路に立ったというか 現実に直面し 目が覚めた
target: I'm at something of a crossroads and it's brought me to a realization.

source: 私が強力に推進した結果 パイプライン問題は峠を越して この州の経済に 恩恵をもたらす様に成ります
target: Well as I've always maintained, the corner turn oil line would be a boon to this state's economy.

source: 嵐の前の静けさは最高だな
target: I like these calm little moments before the storm.

source: 嵐の前の静けさを楽しんでる
target: Oh, just, uh, enjoying the calm before the storm.

source: 嵐の前の静けさじゃ
target: It's the deep breath before the plunge.

source: "鍵は左前輪の上にある
target: "The key is on the left front wheel.

source: 彼を左遷したら 今より状況が悪くなる
target: The danger is, uh, replacing him with someone worse than the original.

source: 左遷もええとこですね 大左遷ですわ　これ
target: This is a demotion, huge demotion

source: 彼女も巻き添えを食います
target: She's collateral damage.

source: 巻き添えを食うのは ごめんだ
target: - But I'm not gonna let your bullshit take me down.

source: 君たち2人も その巻き添えを食って殺される
target: He also made it very clear that you two would be caught in the crossfire.

source: 席を外して下さい
target: Leave me.

source: 席を外して 悪いけど
target: Reg, step out. It's okay.

source: ロブ、席を外してくれる？
target: Rob, could we have the room?

source: フロイド･マネー･ メイウェザー 銅メダリスト フロイド･マネー･ メイウェザー 銅メダリスト かつてアメリカは オリンピックを席巻
target: The Olympics used to be where USA beat the crap out of the world, where we proved we were the best boxers.

source: そして罪のない人々が 帰らぬ人となるかも
target: And neither do a lot of innocent people back home.

source: 見直すのを忘れてた 帳尻を合わせないと
target: Obviously, we forgot or didn't go back and adjust the revenue entries.

source: 幕が上がったな
target: The curtain rises.

source: 幕が上がったら すぐ女神を殺す
target: Soon as that curtain rises, we are gonna be there to take out this Calliope.

source: 幕が上がってしまうぞ
target: The curtain is about to go up.

source: 今や 幕が開いたのだ 過去は序章にすぎぬのだ
target: Now that we're in this time, what's past is prologue.

source: その時、どうでも良い 別の芝居の幕が開いた
target: At that moment, the curtain rose on a parenthetical, domestic drama...

source: 連続殺人犯 ジョー・キャロルの人生は 今朝早く幕を下ろしました
target: Serial killer Joe Carroll's life came to an end early this morning.

source: 残念だけど　幕を下ろさなきゃならなくなった ・・・・早々とね
target: Sorry we had to close early, but you get the general idea.

source: もう幕を下ろすときだ
target: This is what takes us down.

source: 彼らの自由は 剥ぎ取られてる... 1度に1台のカメラ　1台の電話 1度に1メガバイト 今こそ 幕を引くべき時だ
target: That their freedoms have been stripped away... one camera, one cell phone, one megabyte at a time.

source: 俺達のやり方で 派手に幕を閉じるんだ
target: We have to end it on our own terms... with a grand gesture.

source: 青年が行くはずだ
target: The boy will meet you there.

source: 年には勝てない
target: It is a perishable skill.

source: 年を追うごとに偽造は 精巧になっている
target: Every year, forgers get more and more sophisticated.

source: 年を食ったら。 私のモットも理解できる。
target: Deb, later in life, you'll appreciate my motto.

source: 幸か不幸か、 うまくいくに違いないと信じています-
target: Gentlemen, unfortunately, we must be going as well.

source: そりゃ、幸先がいいな
target: Well, so much for our head start.

source: 幸先がいい
target: The gods favor you.

source: 幸先がいいな
target: A good start.

source: この船のほうが 船底が浅いのよね？
target: - We're shallower on the draft, right?

source: あと１〜２ヵ月で 資本金は底を突く
target: What can we do? We've only got capital to last a month, maybe two.

source: 店を畳んでたら こうはなってないわ
target: If you'd just quit the restaurant, none of this would've happened.

source: だが それでお前が 店を畳んだだろ
target: You made the right choice, though, didn't you, by choosing to close the restaurant?

source: 店を畳んでないのが 見えませんか？
target: What, you want me to close the shop?

source: - 店を閉める時は死ぬ時 - 良い知らせがあります
target: - I'll close the shop only when I croak.

source: それから店を閉めて 退勤しろ
target: Then close up the shop. Clock out.

source: 危険を承知で弓を引いた
target: Sorry, Harv, I know you have a thing for her.

source: I wasn't referring to the wheelchair 私 車椅子を 引き合いに 出すつもりは なかった
target: I wasn't referring to the wheelchair.

source: あなたはうんざりしてる 彼はローレルを引き合いに出した
target: Ok, you're pissed he invoked the almighty Laurel.

source: それに対して　君の本では 虐待をアニスが自分に打ち明けたと言う 隣人を匿名で　引き合いに出した
target: Your book, on the other hand, you quoted an anonymous source, a neighbor who claimed that Ennis had confided in him about the abuses.

source: オリバー・クィーン並みの 大金持ちよ 彼が大金持ちだから 引き合いに出しただけ 気にしないで
target: I would be as rich as Oliver Queen, who I mention because he's the richest person I know, or used to be.

source: トレーラーが引き金になって 全て思い出す可能性があるが
target: If going to the trailer helps bring back her memories, then there's a chance that she's gonna remember everything.

source: ３年前の手術で頭部を傷つけて 早期発症の引き金になっていたかも
target: The head trauma that put him in surgery three years ago could've triggered an early onset.

source: 引き金になる
target: It all triggers it.

source: 最悪な時こそ誰にも引けを取らない
target: Called the best by one of the worst on the planet.

source: そこで中野渡さんに引導を渡して
target: and he'll sit in the chairman's seat. Is that it?

source: ロルカが引導を渡されるのを見たい
target: Hector lorca being sent away for life.

source: 〈大学病院の医局は弱体化し→ 命のやりとりをする医療も→ ついに 弱肉強食の時代に突入した〉
target: University hospitals' medical offices were losing power, and even medicine, which deals with life and death, plunged into an era where the law of jungle prevailed.

source: 弱音を吐いている
target: - Whi... Whinier than I thought. - Hmm.

source: 君がした中で　当を得た陳述は これが初めてだ
target: That's the first correct statement you've made.

source: いや　当を得てるでしょ
target: No, that was a bull's eye.

source: いい感じだろ? 口当たりがいいな
target: It's pretty good, huh?

source: "当たって砕けろ" よ
target: Well, it can't hurt to ask.

source: 臆病で影が薄かった
target: He was quiet, timid, almost invisible.

source: ホタルの影も形もない
target: No sign of Firefly.

source: 影も形もなく隠せるわよ
target: And you will never find this again until I want you to find it.

source: 大統領は影も形もない
target: No sign of the President yet.

source: それがお前に 影を落としてる
target: Cast a long shadow, I bet.

source: そうだなぁ 魔獣の呪文が 何にでも 影を落としているからなぁ
target: Yeah, well, the spell of a hexenbiest does tend to put a damper on the good times.

source: ねぇ　ハロルド 男の人ってどうしてこんなに 往生際が悪いのかしら?
target: Really, Harold, why do men always seek to delay the inevitable?

source: 往生際が悪いわね
target: Too bad.

source: どのみち 今の俺には もう後がない あッ...
target: it's sink or swim for me.

source: 彼に逆らったのは 後にも先にもキミだけだよ
target: You're the only one who's ever stood up to him.

source: いくら謝っても足りないわ 後の祭りだけど...
target: You know I'm going to be apologizing forever, right? Just so you know.

source: "開けたら空だった"じゃ 後の祭りよ
target: We crack it, it's empty, the gold's somewhere else.

source: ネットに載せたら もう後の祭りだ
target: As Miss Adler remarks in her masthead, know when you are beaten.

source: あれは後を引いたよ 止められなくなる
target: That's become a real whore to me. I can't shake it.

source: 後れを取るわけには いきません
target: I would be ashamed to be left behind.

source: トミーが去ってから 俺達は後れを取ってる
target: We're way behind since Tommy left.

source: 後ろを見せるな ハリー・ポッター！
target: Don't you turn your back on me, Harry Potter!

source: 後味が悪い
target: I don't feel good with it.

source: ハートは回収の後押しをした
target: Hart was the force behind the recall.

source: にわか仕込みの信心で わしの後釜に座る気か？
target: Does he seek to humble me with his new found piety?

source: 俺はお前の後釜に座って さらにハッピーさ
target: And I'll be more than happy to fill your shoes.

source: 私を今の地位から追い出して 自分が後釜に座ろうと 画策しているのよ
target: You're trying to drive me from my position, so you can take over.

source: 服従心の事？
target: About their obedience?

source: 得体が知れないわ
target: We don't even know what that is.

source: だが, 得心が行かぬ.
target: But something bothers me...

source: 彼らは すべてを殺す・・・ 慈悲や後悔は微塵も無い
target: They'll kill everything... without mercy or remorse.

source: 心が乱れてるんだ
target: He's got a lot on his mind.

source: ワシの申し出に心が動いておる
target: That's why I put a special wimp clause in my will.

source: チャーリーは あの馬鹿なカードを受け取ってから 心が洗われたようだった 彼女は　セラピーに来て
target: Charlie had this, this... moment of clarity... after she got that stupid card.

source: 最高のオモチャを見つけて 久しぶりに心が躍りました
target: I had found the perfect plaything. My heart danced with joy for the first time in a long time.

source: ♪ 心が躍るの
target: There 'll be magic There 'll be fun

source: ゾーンと心が 通いあう人間ですから
target: You see, being a stalker is some sort of calling.

source: 心が通い合えば　治療に役立つ。
target: If you can connect with each other, it's easier to treat them.

source: 何週間、何ヶ月離れていても 地球の裏側にいても 心が通っていました
target: The weeks away lengthened to months, but every day would bring his thoughts from some distant part.

source: 訓練生仲間とは 心が通じあってると思っていた
target: These people were my friends... or at least I thought they were.

source: そして目を合わせるだけで 心が通じ合う気がします
target: And I feel I can communicate with you with simply a look.

source: 俺が言いたいのは 心に刻んでくれ 仕事には ケガが付きまとう
target: So the upside of this... it is a stark reminder injuries do not get swept under the rug on this job.

source: ルーディがロボットを 解体しているのを見てたら- ふと こう思ったんです 誰が僕のことを心に 刻んでくれるんだろう ってね
target: Just looking at that bot on Rudy's table makes me think, who is going to remember me?

source: メイザー･ラッカムの勇気を 君らの心に刻んで欲しい
target: Let the courage of Mazer Rackham be your inspiration.

source: パキスタンの音楽は 一生心に残るらしいね
target: I've heard enough Pakistani music to last a lifetime, if you don't mind.

source: ジョンの面白い話を知っているか？ （本： 心に残る結婚式のスピーチ）
target: Do you know any funny stories about John?

source: どうしよう 心に残りすぎ
target: She's on my mind.

source: 初めに心に浮かんだ言葉です
target: It's the word that came to mind.

source: 人が観察できるのは 既に心に浮かんでいるものだけだ。
target: One observes only things which are already on the mind.

source: 二つのことが心に浮かぶって言ったでしょ
target: You said two things occur to you.

source: -犠牲を心に留め -我々がそうすることを望むだろう
target: Be mindful... it may well be hoping we do this.

source: 彼女の警告を 心に留めて
target: Keep her warning' with you, nail it to your memory.

source: 女神に触るな 彼女の言葉を心に留めよ
target: Touch not the noble one. Heed her words!

source: 心を乱していた 内陸でさえも..."
target: "and deranged the public mind, even far inland, it must be said that professional seamen were especially alarmed."

source: 夜は心を乱すものです
target: Night changes many thoughts.

source: トレントは、僕らの関係に妬いてて、 彼女の心を乱そうとしてる。
target: Trent Preston is gonna mindfuck her into thinking she's too good for me.

source: 心を入れ替えたと 会いたいと 付け加えろ
target: Tell him you've changed your mind and you need to see him.

source: 心を入れ替えるよ
target: I'll do better.

source: 古風な恋愛が とても人の心を動かすんだね〜
target: I find old-fashioned romance so touching, don't you?

source: 人の心を動かす
target: It is a human calculation.

source: マペットたちと一緒の この場所にある カーミットの心を 動かしたのは君だ
target: Hey, you're the one who got Kermit to do this.

source: 私はずっと君に 関心を寄せていた キエラやリバー８がやって来て
target: Alec, I have always had an abiding interest in you, and when Liber8 and Kiera arrived in this time

source: ［私たち聖職者はみな　まず何よりも］ ［ラティマー家の方々に心を寄せています］
target: 'Well, first and foremost, all of our prayers are with the Latimer family.

source: 艦内生活体験プログラムに 皆様が大きな関心を寄せて下さって
target: People are so excited about the live-aboard program.

source: それを見たときに 何かが心を打ったのでしょう
target: Just sort of hit her in some personal way when she saw the play.

source: それでいて 心を打つ物は
target: And still, where it strikes me...

source: 貴女には人間性が無い 貴女の心を打つものが無い
target: Nothing human would ever enter your mind.

source: これ以上良心を痛めたくない
target: I don't want any more on my conscience.

source: エミリ ダグのことでまだ心を痛めているのは わかるし・・・ ディエゴのこともあったから 混乱するのはわかるさ
target: Emily, you're grieving for Doug and you're still confused about what Diego did.

source: 君があの患者を亡くした時 どんなに心を痛めたかは　知ってる でも　今その仕事を懺悔のつもりで しているなら・・・
target: I know how much it hurt when you lost that patient, but if you're doing all this as some kind of penance...

source: 心を砕くのは個人的
target: Crushed hearts are personal.

source: 心を許したからだ
target: 'Cause you gave it up to me.

source: ヴェイルの美しさは豪家の気品にのみ、 その心を許すのです
target: The beauty of the Vale is matched only by the nobility of its great families.

source: 家族とは互いに心を配るということだ
target: And family means we take care of each other.

source: ウィルに心を配って
target: Take care of Will.

source: お言葉ですが、私たちのコレクションです 私が心血を注いで 10年以上かけて集めたんです その労力を思えば...
target: No, you know what I think I'm actually entitled to say Our collection, considering the time that I've put in over 10 years curating that.

source: 世界を正そうと 心血を注いでるじゃない
target: I've watched you. Working with the Fringe Division, you've done everything in your power to heal the damage.

source: 別に ちょっと念を押しただけです
target: Nothing. Just clearing something up.

source: ワグナー将軍に町の秩序を回復することを 最優先するように念を押すように
target: Make sure general wagner understands our priority is to maintain order in the streets.

source: 何を念頭に置いていますか？
target: What have you in mind?

source: 私たちはすべて自分自身に保ちます。 私はそれを念頭に置いています 決して捕らえられません。
target: And I try to keep that in mind and never get caught short.

source: 私は より協力的なものを 念頭に置いている
target: I have something more collaborative in mind.

source: ご主人様のお怒りを買って 分解されてから... 通訳がいなくて困ってたのよ
target: We have been without an interpreter... since our master got angry with our last protocol droid... and disintegrated him.

source: こうして お姫様を連れ去ろうとした ２人の悪い魔女たちは― 王の怒りを買うと―
target: 'And so the two bad witches who tried to take the princess away... 'invited the king's wrath.

source: 放置しておくと FBIの 怒りを買う それにあなたを信じている人が 軽蔑されるわ
target: You leave it up, and you're just waving a red flag in front of the FBI and thumbing your nose at all the people who believed in you.

source: 悲しいときは去り 思いも寄らない幸運が来る
target: And I predict all the sad and dark times are over and you are going to be beyond happy.

source: 思いも寄らない　ダンさんは ウイザートン保険の為に働いた 6年間... 定職について
target: Unlikely, Mr. Dang has worked for Witherton Insurance for six years... a steady job, no drug or alcohol problems, not so much as a speeding ticket.

source: そんな事 思いも寄らなかった
target: I didn't know you couldn't do that. I dealt with the various animal rights groups,

source: 私は別の男性に 思いを寄せていますが 理由は判らず 納得もしていません 何かが狂った様に 私を突き動かしていて...
target: I am having feelings for another man, and I don't know why, and I gotta admit, it's kind of starting to drive me a little bit crazy, and...

source: けど、あなたは以前の人生にしがみついている。 思いを寄せる人にしがみついている、 それこそ地獄よ。
target: But trying to hold on to this life, clinging to the person you thought you could be, that's hell.

source: 寄付金に思いを馳せると
target: Think of the donations.

source: 聴取しようと思ってたが "人類 の危機に思いを馳せる" とか言ってた
target: Oh, I tried to talk to him, but he said he needed a minute to "muse upon the fragile nature of human life."

source: 未来に思いを馳せ 旅を続けてたんだろう
target: And may fortune... guide her journey.

source: 魔術師の思う壺です
target: That's what the warlock wants.

source: まさに奴はこれを望んでた　我々２人が ポータルに向かえば あいつの思う壺だ
target: This is precisely what he wants. Us together heading for the portal.

source: それこそサイロンの思う壺じゃない お互いに向き合わせたいのよ
target: That's exactly what the Cylons want. For us to turn on each other.

source: 急いては事を仕損じる
target: Haste makes waste.

source: 急いては 事を仕損じるぞ
target: And you can't just rush into danger, either.

source: 妹も武器が要るそうだ 個性に合うやつを作ってくれ
target: My sister needs a weapon. Something that suits her personality.

source: 隠居生活は性に合わなかったか ゴルフに飽きた？
target: Clearly, retirement doesn't suit you. You got tired of shooting golf?

source: 一度 試したが性に合わない
target: On the grounds that I tried it once and I didn't like it.

source: 性に合わない
target: Yeah, it's not my thing.

source: - 性懲りも無く...
