target: - Any busybodies

source: そして性懲りもなく再度 5年後にこれだ
target: And then you did it again five years later.

source: "性懲りもなく又寝たのか？ - 黙って聞いてくれ"
target: What, did he sleep with her again?

source: 恐れをなしたのか？
target: Out of fear?

source: これらの少年の中から... 名をあげれば 全軍の兵士が恐れをなす 戦士の中で育った一人...
target: From among these boys, one grew into a warrior so fierce that entire armies would retreat in terror with the mention of his name.

source: 恐れをなして 逃げるとでも思うか
target: It seems no one has ever had the privilege of leaving, either.

source: 恨みを買って ソイツガ巨人化したらどうする
target: What if he gets mad and turns into a Titan?

source: もしくはただ単に− 彼女が誰かの恨みを買っているかだ たくさん居そうだがな
target: Or just inept, but the way Sofia treats people, it's no stretch to believe that someone wants her dead.

source: ヴァンパイアの恨みを買う
target: The vamps don't take kindly to the juice dispenser.

source: 恩に着ます
target: And thank you.

source: すまない ビリー 恩に着る
target: Sure. It's nice of you, Billy, thank you.

source: 『本当にその仕事がもらえたら　ありがたい 恩に着るよ』
target: I could really use the work. Thanks, buddy."

source: 恩を仇で返すのか？ 報道生命を賭けるのか！ イギリスが終わるんだぞ！
target: You know how much help you're getting hereon in?

source: 恩を売ろうとしているのかもしれない... 新たな〈金貨の主〉に
target: Maybe they're trying to curry some favor with the new Master of Coin.

source: 何をするにも息が切れる
target: Doing anything makes breathing difficult

source: - 息が切れてるように聞こえるけど -
target: You sound winded.

source: 息が切れる 頼むから飛ばすな
target: I'm out of breath! Not so fast, for Christ's sake!

source: お前達二人は 随分息が合ってるんだな？
target: You realize you two are finishing each other's sentences, right?

source: いい コンビじゃないか 息が合ってる
target: You know, for being new partners, you guys are pretty good together.

source: お前の部下に 息が掛かってる マローニのな
target: Assuming, of course, that they are still your people and not Maroni's.

source: 兜は息が詰まる
target: His helmet is stifling.

source: 息が詰まるまで 締め上げるからな
target: I wrap the scarf around your neck and strangle you. I promise.

source: かゆいし 息が詰まります
target: It's itching. It's choking me.

source: そのランプコードで 彼の息の根を止める
target: Just choke him out with that lamp cord, then.

source: 胸を刺し 息の根を止めた
target: Finished them off with a single stab to the chest.

source: - 息の根を止めるぞ
target: We'll just have to finish him.

source: 王が帰還し 都が息を吹き返し... 滅びを免れるのではないかと...
target: That a king will come and this city will be as it once was before it fell into decay.

source: 息を吹き返してレバンダー！
target: Come back, Levander!

source: 私は息を吹き返した
target: He came and I came... Back to life.

source: 息を呑むような女性との出会いは?
target: Or saw a woman who literally took your breath away?

source: 彼は息を引き取った シュレッダーの計画を破壊しようとした
target: His last breath was taken trying to destroy Shredder's plan.

source: デーヴ・スカイラーク 息を引き取る
target: This is Dave Skylark signing off.

source: だから私の友人であり 良き指導者でもあった彼が ベッドで安らかに息を引き取ったと 電話を受けた時
target: And that's why, when they called me and told me that my, uh, friend, my mentor had passed away peacefully in his bed,

source: 彼等は閣下の子息を殺しました
target: These people murdered your son, madam president.

source: 弟の殺人犯は 息を潜めてる
target: My brother's killer. Still breathing.

source: 震えて・・・息を潜めながらは
target: Cowering. Clawing for breath

source: こうして父は死んだ あの小さな化け物は 今もどこかで息を潜めている
target: And now our father is dead and that little monster is out there somewhere drawing breath.

source: -　ステリオス　息を継げ
target: - Stelios, catch your breath, boy.

source: ウィスキーを飲みながら 悦に入ってますが
target: You're very comfortable here with your glass of scotch,

source: - 悪いようにはしない　な？
target: - they might go easy on you, okay?

source: 《言うことを聞いてくれたら 悪いようにはしない》 《だが もし誰かに話すというなら》
target: you won't be sorry.

source: 誰の仕事を手伝ってるのか 名前が知りたい　そうすれば 悪いようにはしない
target: Those are the people that we want, so if you give us their names, this won't be so bad.

source: そうだな．．． 悪態をつく必要はない カール
target: Well... You don't have to swear, Carl.

source: 時々悪態をつくの
target: I swear sometimes.

source: 悪態をつくな 話し合いが必要だ
target: You really got a bad attitude. We need to talk.

source: 倒れて悲鳴を上げてた あいつの血や肉が俺の体に
target: He lay there and screamed... I have all these pieces of him on me! Just like that.

source: ケリー・レイダーを訪問し 悲鳴を上げさせた
target: Goes and visits Kelly Reider. Sent her into a screaming fit.

source: 悲鳴を上げさせてやる
target: Make him scream.

source: 中に入ってみると 倒れていて えー 目を見て 悲鳴を上げました
target: I went in, and when I got inside she was laying on the ground, uh, rubbing her eyes and screaming.

source: 海藻が顔に触れ 悲鳴を上げる 完璧、完璧です！
target: wind blows out your candles, seaweed touches your face; You scream.

source: 情けは人の為ならず
target: What you put out into the world comes back to you.

source: 停戦の間に 情けを掛けたのに
target: I just added sparing him to the terms of our cease fire.

source: 情け容赦もなく な
target: Her life is not yours to take.

source: ドレンは 想像を絶する神秘の... 化学の "大なべ" に変わったわ
target: Your Dren turned out to be a cauldron of unimaginable chemical mysteries.

source: 外せば想像を 絶するす痛みが襲う
target: Without these, I'm in pain you can't imagine.

source: 「林檎を持った少年」の価値は 想像を絶するの、分かってる？
target: That picture, Boy with Apple, is priceless.

source: 誰の指図も意に介さない人だと
target: I expected him not to acquiesce to anyone's words.

source: もはや車座にならず－ 孤独に机に向かい 他人を意に介しない
target: They no longer sit in a circle... but rather sit apart... and one doesn't know anything about the other.

source: 意中の人は最後にしない
target: You put your first choice in the middle.

source: なぜ意地を張るのですか、お父さん もう少し錫を加えなければいけない
target: I don't know why you object it? We should include more tin.

source: 意地を張るなよ
target: Have it your way. Let's go.

source: 意地を張ってないで認めたら？
target: Be honest, your heart was never really in it.

source: 私たちの意地を通す
target: We have our ways.

source: 意気地がないね
target: You are weak.

source: 意気投合したよ
target: We hit it off.

source: 娘がお昼食べに来るんだけど あなたとなら意気投合するかもって思って
target: My daughter's meeting me for lunch. I think you two just might hit it off.

source: 意気投合してたよ
target: Yeah, they really hit it off.

source: 意表を突かれたと思ったよ
target: We were, like, caught off by surprise.

source: 意表を突いた
target: Alone? I took them by surprise.

source: 意表を突くってことを 君は学ぶ必要がある
target: You need to learn the element of surprise.

source: 愛の鞭を打ってやれ ベイビー
target: Hit them with the long arm of love, baby.

source: あのチームには愛想が尽きた
target: I'm sick and tired of carrying all the weight.

source: 地球にはほとほと愛想が尽きた
target: And I've decided ... screw earth.

source: ママに愛想を尽かされた
target: and your mom got sick of me.

source: 愛想を尽かして出て 行ったんでしょ？
target: I guess I thought you were... humiliated. You did run away, after all.

source: そんな夫に愛想を尽かすのは当然です
target: You would be fed up, too.

source: 態度が大きいぞ
target: I don't like your manner.

source: なぜいつも憎まれ口を叩くの
target: Why are you always so hateful?

source: 文明の成れの果てだ
target: - The decline of Western civilization.

source: 成れの果てまで 行きそうだぜ
target: I mean, you screw like the world's gonna end.

source: コロンバスサークルの 成れの果てだ
target: So this is what's left of Columbus Circle.

source: ああ　怒りで我を忘れて その辺の物をつかんで 殴ったんだろう
target: Whoever did this got angry, grabbed the first thing they could find and attacked.

source: 我を忘れたグリムは 殺しやすい
target: Easier to kill a Grimm when he's emotional.

source: 社会が生き残り 繁栄する唯一の方法は 各々が正しい所属場所を 得ることいあるのです
target: And the only way it can survive and thrive... is for each of you to claim your rightful place.

source: 別の場所を得るのに 争う必要はないはず
target: I said we didn't have to fight for another place.

source: こんな立派な女性は 所帯を持つがらじゃない
target: This is not the type of establishment for a respectable woman.

source: 所帯を持つのに 餌食が必要なのか？
target: - You start your families by killing two innocent victims?

source: - 所帯を持つ時期なので
target: - It was time to start our families.

source: 打つ手がない　作戦変更だ
target: Arsenal running dry. Adjust strategy.

source: もう打つ手がない
target: I'm all out of moves, Finch.

source: 手が無いぞ
target: Nothing but dead ends.

source: 助手が付くの 信じられる？
target: I'll have my own assistant. Can you believe that?

source: あなたの家に買い手が付きそうなんです お若い夫婦らしいんですけど
target: The most darling young couple just made an offer on your house.

source: だが　彼が３６人目を殺した頃までに 僕の中毒は　手が付けられなくなって
target: By the time he had claimed his 36th life, however, my addiction was out of control.

source: 君の想像以上に 奴には 手が付けられない面がある
target: He's a greater danger to himself than you know.

source: 警察の手が入った
target: Cops closed it.

source: 内部調査室の手が入った 俺たちは　奴を釈放するしかなかった
target: We had no choice but to cut Bradshaw loose.

source: まだ編集の手が入る前のものだ
target: Before film makers figured out all the tricks.

source: ブルックリンの物件には 手が出ない
target: I don't think I can afford a place in Brooklyn.

source: 麻薬と手が切れたかどうかを 時間の単位で計るのは　馬鹿げてる
target: It is absurd to measure sobriety in units of time.

source: さもないと　あなたの喉元に手が回る
target: WHEN I HAVE MY HANDS AROUND YOUR THROAT.

source: やっと2人きりになったわ 仕事の時間よ それで、ジョン、ついに 昔の事に手が回ったというわけだ
target: So, John, your past finally caught up with you. Whatever the circumstances, it's lovely to see you again. Relax.

source: きっと忙しくて手が回らな かったんでしょう
target: He probably just hasn't gotten around to it yet.

source: 手が回らなかったので
target: I haven't gotten around to mine yet.

source: 選挙で手が回らなかった
target: I was on the campaign and I wasn't there for him.

source: 地平線には手が回らなかったようだけど could have done ～したかもしれないのに（実際はしなかった） 警備は大変そうね
target: They could've done a better job with the horizon, though.

source: 手が塞がってるようだな
target: Sounds like you got your hands full here.

source: ファスナーお願い 手が届かなくて...
target: Could you just give me a hand with this zipper? I always have such a hard time --

source: それに手が届かなかったわ 私を切れるぐらい近づくまで
target: I couldn't reach it till you got close enough to cut me.

source: - 手が届かない
target: - Way out of reach.

source: そのお金は強奪の手が掛かりだ 誘拐　麻薬
target: The money that leads to extortion, kidnapping, and drugs.

source: もう 手が掛かるわね ハイ ラヴァー
target: He's so high-maintenance. Hey, lover.

source: お前は 頭の回転より手が早い
target: But you're a guy who shoots first and thinks afterward.

source: 女に手が早いから用心を
target: Watch where he puts his hands.

source: 手が早いわね
target: You didn't waste any time.

source: - 手が焼けるな
target: -This is so stupid.

source: 思ったより手が焼けるな
target: Our job just got harder.

source: 手が込んでいる
target: And it just got complicated.

source: 手が込んでますね？
target: Care to elaborate?

source: すごい手が込んでますね
target: Nice graphics.

source: 彼が近づいてきて言ったの "もう少し手が長くならないかって..."
target: He came up to me and I said, "Well, you have to extend your hand..."

source: 何か手が離せないことでも？
target: Unless you're in the middle of something.

source: - ちょっと手が離せないんだ！
target: - A little busy back here. Okay?

source: 今 手が離せないの
target: tied up, right now.

source: それで 誰を相手にする？
target: But he is coming all the way. So who am I getting within there?

source: 一度あの者達を手にすれば彼らは...
target: Once I own them, these men...

source: でも次女は　相手にしなかった
target: Her sister was having none of it.

source: 技術者に相手にされず 手に入るのは石だけ
target: In your hands, they go back to being nothing but rocks.

source: あの女は自分の手を汚さず 勝利を手にする気だ
target: She wants you to do her dirty work for her. You do this, and she wins.

source: 欲しいものを手にするのに 手段を選ばない
target: And I know you don't care who you hurt to get what you want.

source: 一族はカギを全て手にするまで 手段を選ばない だから君だ
target: And the families, they'll stop at nothing until they get their hands on those keys.

source: 親父が言っていた "人類はもっと─ 能率的になる　指でなく ハンマーとドライバーを─ 手にしたなら " と
target: My father said, "men would be more efficient if they had hammers and screwdrivers instead of fingers."

source: 人の中には獣が眠っています 剣を手にした時 目を覚ますのです
target: There's a beast in every man, and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand.

source: 僕は彼の助手になる 彼の傑作を 手伝うんだ 有名になる前にね
target: My scheme is to persuade him to hire me as his amanuensis, and aid him in the creation of a masterpiece, before shooting up through the musical firmament, eventually obliging Pater to admit that yes, the son he disinherited is none other than Robert Frobisher,

source: 初キスの相手になったり...
target: I can become your first kiss...

source: 血を見たいのか 相手になるぜ
target: You want blood, I get it.

source: その手に乗るか！
target: So that's how it is.

source: いくらお前でも 手に余るぞ
target: It's too big, even for you.

source: 君は、その怪力で、 僕は、驚くべきスピードで、 大抵の問題は、 解決してる。 だから、僕たちに 手に余る問題は戸惑う。
target: When you're used to fixing things with brute strength, or in my case, amazing speed, it's hard to accept that there are things out of our control.

source: - そうなんだが" "俺の手に余るというのが..."
target: I know, but see, that's where the "in over our heads" part comes in, 'cause, uh...

source: 無理強いはしませんが 500ドル足せばー 威力のある銃が手に入ります
target: Look, I'm not trying to give you the hard sell, but $500 more, you can get yourself a gun with real stopping power.

source: ルドゥーの情報が 手に入った
target: You hear me, Marty? I got a line on Ledoux. I got it right fuckin' now.

source: 今の時間は 砂糖菓子が手に入らなくて
target: Thanks. I can handle labor, but not sugar withdrawal.

source: - ちょっとした金が手に入ったんだ
target: We came into some money.

source: 手に入れろ
target: Claim it.

source: 言え　どこで ニセおしめを手に入れた
target: -find out what he knows.

source: ご主人が手に入れられなかった心の平穏を ご主人に与えるには あの晩あなたが見た男が ウォレス・ロークだと　言い張るしかなかった
target: And the only way you could give your husband the peace that he'd never had was to insist that Wallace Rourke was the man that you saw that night.

source: - ちょっとした物を手に入れた
target: - I got a little something up my sleeve.

source: お前は強い 何としても手に入れよ
target: But you, you are strong. And our need is great.

source: 食料は私達に依存しています 燃料も・・・ その代わりに 水を手に入れるのに力を貸すと
target: They're totally dependent on us for food, fuel... and they've agreed to organise the workforce for the water detail on the moon.

source: あなたの考えが 手に取る様にわかるわ
target: I can hear you thinking. It's like this crunching noise.

source: 困惑が手に取るようだ
target: I see their trouble...

source: "手に取るようにわかるんだぜ"
target: At your fingertips!

source: グリーヴァスの手に掛かって 何回も惨敗してから、 共和国のアウター・リムでの足場が 危うくなってる
target: After suffering a series of disastrous defeats at the hands of General Grievous, the Republic's foothold in the Outer Rim is in jeopardy.

source: 私の手に掛かるとこうなる...
target: My version is this.

source: だが、それには サイラスを釈放する事になる そうなれば、その装置が 悪人の手に渡る恐れがある
target: But first, we've got to put this snake back in the pit and give him the real tech-- risk it falling into the wrong hands.

source: フィルムはヤクザの手に渡りました
target: The film's been taken by the Yakuza.

source: せっかくの裏帳簿も 向こうの手に渡っちまったし
target: And they got the account book back. Damn.

source: "すでに悪魔の手に落ちているぞ"
target: Man, you're already sewed up tight in the devil's pocket.

source: （ついに怪力のチューバッカも 我が手に落ちたか ）
target: At last we have the mighty Chewbacca.

source: もし俺たちより先に 奴らの手に落ちたら・・
target: Man, if they get to him before we do...

source: もしリンダがミニドームを 手に入れて 悪い奴の手に落ちたら・・
target: If Linda takes the mini-dome, and it ends up in the wrong hands...

source: あなたが去って間もなく 技術が犯罪者の手に渡った 機を伺っていた 連中の手に落ちたのよ
target: Shortly after you left your time, technology found its way into the hands of criminals who saw only opportunity.

source: この巨大な毛むくじゃら 俺一人じゃ手に負えない
target: I need help with this giant hairy thing!

source: トラビス あなたに彼は 手に負えないわ
target: Travis, you cannot enable him.

source: 僕の手に負えないと思って 勝手な事を
target: You thought I couldn't handle something, so you took over.

source: センスがあれば 気が付くはずだ 自分の手に 負えなくなってる事に
target: You are too clever, you have no room in your head for intelligence.

source: - 君に手の内を見せろと？
target: What, I'd show you my hand?

source: 君は手の内を見せないように 感情を抑える そう 強い
target: You keep your emotions close to the vest, that's good, that's strong.

source: 「一瞬 手の内を見せた」 「彼は見逃さなかった」
target: I showed my hand for the slightest second, and he saw.

source: 手の施しようがなくなり 気づくころには遅すぎる 飲酒が命取りであったのだと
target: Too late, he had learned that drinking, when it gets out of hand, can be fatal.

source: 手の施しようがない...
target: Nothing they can do, so...

source: 手の施しようがなかったようです
target: Doc couldn't do anything for him.

source: 分析したいが 頼れる相手もなく 御手上げの状態でね
target: The police doesn't know what to do with it... and I am not getting any help from ROC.

source: ジェイミーには片手もないし仲間もいない
target: Jaime has one hand and no allies,

source: 手も足も出なかった
target: I must admit we were out of skill.

source: 誰も手も足も出ない
target: There's nothing anyone can do about it.

source: リンカーン・バロウズとマイケル・スコフィールド、 手を上げて出てきなさい！
target: Michael Scofield and Lincoln Burrows, You need to exit with the hand in the air.

source: 排除する時は 喜んで私が手を下す 勝手な殺し合いは――
target: As much as I would have enjoyed eliminating him myself, native-on-native killing cannot stand.

source: カットニスを抑え込めないなら 私が手を下すしかない
target: If you cannot contain Katniss Everdeen, then I will have to terminate her.

source: 次が最後の取引だ 用済みになる前に手を下す
target: This is providing he doesn't decide to waste us before then.

source: すまん　マルティネス 君のものに手を付けて ぼくを荒涼とした惑星に 置いていったばかりに
target: I'm sorry, Martinez, if you didn't want me to go through your stuff, you shouldn't left me for dead on a desolate planet.

source: それで全部だ 少しばかり手を付けた
target: It's all there. Except for what we spent.

source: キャットは甘いものから手を付けるのよ
target: Cat always went straight for the sweetest thing.

source: 何から手を付けるか 判らないが たぶん 手段を選ばない
target: I don't know when or where, but they will make a move.

source: ハハ、手を休めるな
target: Ha, ha. Don't quit your day job.

source: 手を休めないで！
target: Get on with your work.

source: 君が誰であろうと 何をやっていおうと 作業しているなら手を休めて
target: And whoever you are, whatever it is you're doing, if you're working, put down your work.

source: そして 手を伸ばした
target: And I have.

source: そうだ かつての暗殺者の 手を借りたい
target: Yeah, I was hopin' to let that old assassin sit this one out.

source: 村の人に手を借りましょう
target: T'would be better to go to the village to raise up help, I cannot--

source: オヤジの手を借りる 君さえ良ければね
target: W-With my father's help, if you're willing to let me get him involved.

source: 奴が娘に手を出しやがった
target: All over her, he was. Touching her.

source: ベンジャミンは自分で手を出し 警察を超えた こいつがどうやって クソCLAYを作ったか話すんだ！
target: Benjamin could go to the police and tell them he set up this shitty CLAY by himself!

source: ヨ　俺のチップに手を出すな
target: Yo, get your hands of my chips.

source: 麻薬と手を切りたいんだ　ジョニー
target: I want to get clean, Joanie.

source: ネルソンとは　手を切る
target: We gotta cut loose from Nelson.

source: お前が小切手を 切ってる夢を見てな
target: You were there handing out checks. "One for you, one for you... "

source: 麻薬と手を切ったからといって 男を選ぶ目が肥えたとは言えないわ
target: I can't say I got any better at picking men just because I got clean.

source: -　死体に何か手を加えたか？
target: YOU have changed nothing to the body?

source: 手を加えたという 物的証拠は出なかった
target: There's no physical evidence suggesting the ride was tampered with.

source: フランス料理に 手を加えた物だ
target: A modified Boudin Noir from Ali Bab's Gastronomie Practique.

source: 実習だけど... ちょっと手を回した
target: Well, you know, let me make it a little better.

source: 父さんが裏から手を回して いくつか特別扱いしてもらってる どうでもいいけど
target: My dad pulled a few strings, got me some extra privileges.

source: 少女達を誘拐した人物が手を回したんでしょう
target: Whoever abducted these girls must have gotten to them.

source: （徳井）だから アーマンが 割と自然と手を繋ぎに行ったり 腰に手を回したり
target: So Arman, rather naturally, holds her hand and puts his arms around her.

source: 手を変え品を変え あたしを支配しようとするのは...
target: That you want me to be yours. That you wanted to possess me, but no this is so much simpler than that.

source: あらゆる手を尽くすわ
target: Well, leave no stone unturned.

source: 俺なりに最善の手を尽くす
target: I'll make sure of that.

source: なぜ 手を尽くさなかった？
target: Why didn't you do more?

source: ロイを助ける為に 今手を差し伸べる...
target: That could help me reach roy now...

source: 私はちょうど手を差し伸べる 途中でアンドレのお母さんに。
target: I just got to reach out to Andre's mom on the way.

source: - アンタも知っての通り、俺は野球選手だ... ...だが３千万ドル相続したんで 手を広げる必要がある
target: - As you know, my business is baseball but since I've inherited $30 million, I have to branch out.

source: - お前は手を引いた方がいい
target: - You better not pull it out.

source: もう手を引きたいと言っていました
target: Said she wanted me to pull her out.

source: 手を引くように警告した
target: Nah, just warned me to back off.

source: もし スキュラを返したら 将軍は俺らから手を引く そして俺は 平和に息子と暮らす 時間を手に入れられるんだ
target: If I give Scylla back to the General, he leaves me and Michael alone, and I get to spend time with my son in peace.

source: 15％で手を打とう 妥当な数字だと思うが
target: Let's settle on an even 15. That's a nice round number.

source: でも 交渉になるわね 現段階では― 手を打つとしても １億7500万は欲しいところ
target: But it's a negotiation, and at this point, we might have to accept as little as... 175.

source: 1万で手を打つ この状況じゃ いい額だ
target: Come on. Listen, we'll take the ten grand. It's generous considering the circumstances.

source: これは安物で手を抜いてる
target: These are cheaper variations. He's been cutting corners.

source: いいえ 彼女は 手を抜いたりしない
target: No,she is most thorough.

source: 手を抜いてた
target: They cut corners.

source: ポケットの中の 弾が込めてある銃に 手を掛けるのは危ない癖だ
target: It's a dangerous habit, to finger loaded firearms in the pocket of one's dressing gown.

source: 自分の権利を人に乱暴する ことにまで拡大しないでくれ 他の誰かに手を掛けて見ろ
target: Your rights don't extend to roughing people up.

source: トリガーに手を掛け 引く
target: You don't pull the trigger...

source: それを検討してる {a1pos(126,268)} 血で手を染めずに 生きられると？
target: Making it now, do you really think you can do that without getting blood on your hands?

source: 大量殺人に手を染め 世間から恐れられている
target: SHE IS A PUBLIC THREAT. SHE'S ON A KILLING SPREE.

source: 意図的、積極的に手を染めた 中毒性薬物に・・・ 脳破壊や平衡感覚を失なうものに
target: You knowingly and willingly took an addictive drug brain-destructive and disorienting.

source: 敵を倒すためなら 手を汚してもかまわない ためらわないで殺す
target: I've never been too shy to dirty my hands with the enemy, and if need be, would do it right now.

source: クウィンが自ら手を汚したとは思えない そのために人を雇うような奴だからな
target: I never took him for a triggerman. He pays others for that.

source: この人は自分の手を汚さないよ
target: Not with those hands, you certainly didn't.

source: 手を焼くので有名だものね
target: I know, I know. He's famous for tinkering, right?

source: 彼のタフぶりには手を焼いてるがね
target: We were pretty tough on him.

source: 手を焼かせてくれた 一味の一人のようだな
target: He's someone who was with a whole lot of someones who didn't listen.

source: 手を煩わせるな！
target: Don't you tell me about me getting my hands dirty!

source: 君の手を煩わせることはない
target: Oh, you needn't trouble yourself over her.

source: あなたを柔和させます あなたを神の光の中に入れるのに 神のお手を煩わせない為に
target: We're going to soften you up so God doesn't have to work so hard to enter you with His light.

source: 両手を着け！
target: I said "hands on the ground"!

source: 床に手を着け
target: On the ground!

source: クワイ＝ガン･ジンが 貴様と手を組むはずがない
target: Qui-Gon Jinn would never join you.

source: シャベールとラングロワとマクサンスは 手を組み　ラシャンの虐待を暴露した
target: Chabert, Langlois and old Maxence joined forces to expose Rachin's abuse,

source: 悪魔と手を結んでしまうと 神に思い知らされる
target: "Let the devil take your hand and God will make you pay."

source: 君と私は マルコムと手を結んだ この街を 悩ます解決策を目的として
target: You and I got in bed with Malcolm to cure what ails this city.

source: 死ぬまで手を緩めない！
target: He won't rest until you're dead!

source: 理論的には　検察官が わざと捜査の手を緩めることは可能だ 特に　状況証拠しかない事件はな
target: Well, theoretically, a prosecutor could throw an investigation, especially one with circumstantial evidence.

source: ペリーズがベガのコカインを盗むのに あなたが　手を貸したのね
target: So... you're the one who helped the Perrys steal Vega's cocaine.

source: この野郎を捨てるのに 手を貸してくれよ
target: Why don't you help me might as well dump this mother fucker.

source: なぜ彼と話して　力を貸そうとしないの？ 僕はずっと彼に手を貸してきた
target: If you knew about it, why didn't you try and talk to him, try and help him?

source: どうかな 僕らに手を貸す気にならないか？
target: So are you sure you don't want to help us?

source: 手を離れて一人立ちしていくなんてな. . - 父さん.
target: Going out to handle the world on its own.

source: - 指輪はもう我らの手を離れた
target: - The ring is beyond our reach now.

source: 我々の手を離れた
target: It's now in Special Activities' hands.

source: この三人にできたんだ 少なくとも俺達にできることは 他の独房区画を手中に収めることだ
target: If these three pussies can do all this, the least we can do is take out another cell block.

source: 私の軍が国境で紛争を解決するや否や シルクロードを その全長に渡って手中に収める
target: As soon as my army settles in at the borders the entire Silk Road region belongs

source: シルクロード全体を手中に収められる 中国でさえ
target: He can take over the entire Silk Road even China

source: マックパパが手取り足取りで 教えてやるぜ
target: All those girls are going to need some hands on help from the Mac Daddy.

source: 俺がメンクを見つけられるよう 手取り足取り手がかりを教えてくれた
target: He spoon-fed me the clues so I could find Menck.

source: シマのすべてを返してもらえるなら 手心を加えてもいい... ペンギン以外は
target: He just told me I could have all my territories back, and all I have to do in return... is give him Carmine's head.

source: あれは手段を選ばないぞ 絶対戻らない！
target: - and it's gonna do everything it can- - we're never going back.

source: 俺が去る前に 手段を選ばなかった
target: Before I left, you played hard.

source: やるとなったら手段を選ばない 厳しい二人ですから
target: Those two will stop at nothing once they decide to do it.

source: ウーが手玉に取られたなんて まだ信じられない
target: I still can't believe he got wu to reverse his testimony.

source: 数百のサーバーを 手玉に取っていますが
target: Hundreds of hijacked servers spoofing various sites.

source: この女は私の権威を手玉に取って
target: Make fun of my authority!

source: 1人の 手癖が悪かった
target: What if one of them was light-fingered?

source: 手癖が悪いから 脅かしただけ
target: I just wanted to scare her because I caught her stealing.

source: 今のEmotionが その戦場に打って出られるって 意味じゃない じゃ 結局
target: That doesn't mean Emotion is ready to take on that kind business.

source: モルドールへ打って出よう
target: Strike out for Mordor from a place of strength.

source: 君と私は選挙に打って出る 世界の頂点の政府に向けて
target: We're about to run for office... the highest office in the world.

source: ああいう 打てば響くような対応が お客様を喜ばせるのよ
target: That's exactly the kind of response that customers appreciate.

source: 折り紙付きの上物だ 埃の輪から見て いつもは　バーのここにあり
target: This is the proverbial good stuff, and, judging by the ring of dust where it usually sat on his bar, he kept it for only the very rarest of occasions.

source: 体を通り抜けるような 無礼は避けるように
target: And please take care not to walk through him, not even when you're in a hurry. Thank you.

source: 網の目をすり抜けるように消えてしまった
target: It was like he'd gone off the grid.

source: 抜け目が無いね　リズボン
target: That's very astute, Lisbon.

source: 体をスキャンし 手も足も 抜け目がないわ
target: When she scanned me, she watched my hands, my feet, that's smart.

source: フォークは　抜け目が無いから 証拠の排除はしない
target: Mm... Faulk's too smart to exclude evidence.

source: ただのひねくれ者だよ... ...押し付けがましい女さ.
target: She's just stubborn and she's pushy beyond belief.

source: 押しが強くなくて 謙虚な男
target: First of all, he's too humble to know he's perfect.

source: レベッカは 押しが強いから好き
target: I like Rebecca. - She's pushy.

source: 押しが強いな
target: Well, you make a strong case.

source: 簡単じゃない、相思相愛なんだから 後は押しの一手よ
target: Look it's simple. You like him, he likes you. All you need is a little push.

source: -ボブです 私は有名な製薬会社の検査技師だが 持って生まれた才能がある
target: - Well, Bob, I'm a lab technician for a leading pharmaceutical company, but I was born with a gift.

source: 女房が言うには、 毎日指折り数えているんだとさ 私の癌が再発する日を
target: She told me that she was counting the days until my cancer came back.

source: 指折り数えていたんです
target: I counted down the days, sir!

source: 挙句の果てに...
target: After all this time...

source: 挙句の果て 悪人をチヤホヤしてる 奴のソファーの上で！
target: The next thing you know, you're complimenting the bad guy on his fucking couch!

source: あなたの人生を 他人に浪費して 挙句の果てに 家族の障害になっている
target: This is consuming your life, and it is poisoning ours.

source: 迷路は振り出しに戻るわけか
target: The maze is taking me full circle.

source: 振り出しに戻ったわけでもないと思うよ
target: I wouldn't say square one exactly.

source: 使い切ってしまったら 振り出しに戻る だ
target: We use it up, we're right back where we started.

source: 掛け替えのない人達が 私には居ますが...
target: People who care about me. But you...

source: R2は掛け替えのない
target: You can't replace R2.

source: 掛け替えのない物よ
target: But abigail. Henry, they can't be replaced.

source: - そうそう けど 時々 事件について 探りを入れて
target: - I know, I know, but sometimes you gotta go where the case takes you.

source: 僕の知人には　探りを入れたし
target: I put out feelers to some of my contacts in New York's finest hotels.

source: だったら 探りを入れましょう
target: Well... there's a way to find out.

source: 揃いも揃って
target: God almighty, I can't believe who

source: 揃いも揃って 何の用ですか？
target: Okay guys...

source: 提灯を持って
target: Pick up that lantern.

source: アンナが工作を インタビューが改竄される事は 想定していたが これは
target: - I knew Anna would try and manipulate my interview somehow, but this...

source: 715)}ざん 改竄されておる 記憶の持ち主 スラグホーン先生によって
target: This memory has been tampered with by the same person whose memory it is, our old friend, Professor Slughorn

source: 攻撃は最大の防御だ！
target: The best defense is a good offense!

source: あれだ　敵に塩を送ったんだ
target: She gave it to him.

source: "女性下着というと" "敷居が高いイメージが ありますが"
target: "Women's lingerie may give the impression of being expensive...

source: なるほど でも少し敷居が高いかな 今直ぐは
target: Yeah, well, that's kind of a tough sell right now.

source: それにテロリストが何時 敷居を跨ぐか分からないしね
target: Plus, you never know when a terrorist might darken your door.

source: 連中が白旗を掲げるような いい知らせは　無いのか？
target: Does anyone have any good news that they can offer up?

source: まだ日が浅いものね　ファスコ
target: The day is still young, Fusco.

source: まだ日が浅いのでしょ？
target: I know you haven't been with him for long.

source: わかってくれ 君は　彼のパートナーとしてまだ日が浅い
target: I mean, you have to understand, of course, you are in the infancy of your partnership.

source: じゃあ彼らは日の目を見て 彼らの親切心を ないがしろにするのね
target: So they just saw the light of day and let you go out of the goodness of their hearts.

source: いつかそのうち、ふさわしい危機が 頭をもたげて ソース・コードは、日の目を見るのだよ.
target: One of these days the right crisis is going to rear its head and source code is going to have its moment in the sun.

source: ルーラはこの10年 日の目を見なくてね その見事な才能を見込んでー ステージに出すことにした
target: Well, Lula's been on the underground scene for the last decade, and I think she has some real talent, and I'd like to try her on stage to balance out the duo.

source: 早い者勝ちだ
target: The quickest one wins.

source: 早い者勝ちよ
target: First come, first served.

source: 俺らを欺して42日先行した 早い者勝ちだって 知ってたからさ
target: Fine, he lied to our e-mail accounts and he gave himself a 42-day head start, because he knows what apparently you don't, which is that getting there first is everything.

source: とにかく... 何と言うか 早い話が
target: Well, I had gotten some insect samples from South America and...

source: - 早い話が初歩から教えられました
target: Let's just say I've been initiated.

source: 早い話が　ここまでってことだ。
target: You've lost!

source: 警察と兵士 明けても暮れても人々に悲しみを与える
target: Cops and soldiers giving people grief day in, day out.

source: 明けても暮れても、生きねばならないこと、 そのように成らなければ ならないことを
target: What he has to live with day in and day out, what that's got to be like.

source: リオ・ブラボーの件が 明るみに出れば...
target: Rio Bravo could be a real problem there, too.

source: その場合 近藤が大和田と 取り引きした事実も明るみに出る
target: the fact that Kondo made a deal with Owada would be exposed too.

source: 明日は我が身かもしれない
target: I don't want to be Ned.

source: 明日は 明日の風が吹く
target: Tomorrow's another day.

source: 私達はモハッドヴァンに 4つ星を挙げた
target: We gave Mohadevan a four star case to the front of the line.

source: アラブでは "昨日の友は 今日の敵"
target: An Arabic proverb attributed to a prince who was betrayed and decapitated by his own subjects.

source: 時は金なり
target: Time is precious.

source: ヤイラルパリルはそれを知っていた そして彼の時を待った
target: Yeeralparil knew it and waited his time.

source: その時を待って 世界的なショーにする
target: Waiting for our time to make our move, take our show global.

source: Ｄｒグリーンとこの時を 待っていた
target: Dr. Green and I have been waiting.

source: 新しい安全保障局局長は 時を移さずして 陸海空軍を組織して 石油を産する 小国 ジンベキスタンを
target: The new commander-in-chief wasted no time deploying a coordinated assault involving army, navy and air force troops against the tiny, oil-producing nation of Zimbekistan.

source: ここに長くはいられない 俺が時を稼ぐ
target: I can't give you long, but I can give you a head start.

source: - 我々がその時を稼ぐ
target: -We can give him that.

source: なぜ使用人に暇を出さない？
target: Why did you send a servant away?

source: ニャーチャンへのほうびの 休暇を取るものに祝福を... 先の戦闘での 素晴らしい実績に対して
target: Congrats to those taking a leave to Nha Trang as a reward... for marvelous achievements in the last battle.

source: 思ったんだが このまま通りすぎて 休暇を取ったらいい
target: Lady, what I think you need to do... you need to go down the road, take a vacation, okay?

source: おそらく休暇を取るのが 最善だと思うよ 目を離さないからね
target: Perhaps it would be best if you took a leave of absence. I'm on to you.

source: かろうじて ベッドから起きるため 数学で暇を潰し − 特別な力で 子供を奮起させてやる
target: I barely encourage myself to get out of bed, let alone inspire some kid with special powers who wants to spend all his spare time doing maths.

source: あなたは暇を 潰す為に何かしないと
target: You gotta do something to pass the time.

source: どう暇を潰すの？
target: What do these people do for fun?

source: 暗礁に乗り上げました
target: I hit a snag.

source: （記者）　指揮権発動により花岡疑惑追及は 暗礁に乗り上げました　特捜部のみならず　検察庁全部に
target: The move has sent shock waves through D. A. offices.

source: 彼が父を殺したという1つのヒント 彼の政治的将来は暗礁に乗り上げた
target: One hint that he killed his father, and his political future is dead in the water.

source: 最初で最後のね
target: My first, my only.

source: 最初で最後よ
target: First, and last.

source: もう平気だもの これが最初で最後よ
target: I can handle it now. It'II be our first and last.

source: トリスタンが　これを着て見せる予定で ウィックはこのドレスで ショーの最後を飾るはずだった
target: Tristan was gonna model it and Wyck was gonna close the show with it.

source: 皇帝はその寛大なる み心で ローマ市民のために この大会の最後を飾る 歴史的な試合を 準備してくださった
target: And in his majestic charity... the Emperor has deigned this day to favor the people of Rome... with an historical final match.

source: 輝かしい経歴の 最後を飾るんだ 天才　オデッサ・コズロヴァ 真のプリマの
target: It marks the end of a stunning career of one of ballet's greatest talents, Odessa Kozlova, a true Prima.

source: スタニス・バラシオンは 良い最期を遂げなかったな？
target: It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?

source: どんな最期を遂げようと 非常に特別な兵士だった
target: It doesn't matter how he ended, he was once something real special. Nonsense!

source: だから有無を言わせず 俺も取り分をいただく
target: That's why I'm cutting myself in whether you like it or not.

source: これが最期となるなら せめて彼らには... 有終の美を飾らせたい
target: If this is to be our end, then I would have them make such an end as to be worthy of remembrance.

source: 息子は有頂天よ どう返せば？
target: Ruben was just ecstatic. I don't know how I'm gonna repay you.

source: 私の心は有頂天
target: I have always placed you far above me

source: ぼくは 遠足に有頂天
target: I liked the school trips as well.

source: 今日からは私が国家だ （朕は国家なり）
target: I am the State

source: 親が金持ちなら 朝飯前だ
target: Rich parents like Zach has, it's not hard to put two and two together.

source: 前は数千マイルだって 朝飯前だったのに
target: Before a couple thousand miles were a piece of cake.

source: - 杞憂だといいが 署で追いかけられたバッドは 凶獣だ
target: Well, I hope I'm wrong, but he followed Bud out of the precinct.

source: 杞憂に終わりました
target: There was no danger at all.

source: 超自然に詳しい 私の予感が 杞憂であって欲しいのだが
target: I think you'll be able to confirm or deny my fears.

source: "わー 板に付いてる"
target: Oh, I like the sound of that. - Hey.

source: ここで本当に板挟みになった 私はとんでもないロボットを造った
target: We got a real dilemma here. Okay? I created incredible robots.

source: ラブクラフトは共同体の柱石
target: Lovecraft was a beloved pillar of this community.

source: 娘は政治オタクでね 俺の株が上がる
target: You don't understand. She's a freak for this kind of stuff, so if I get her in, I'm Dad of the Year.

source: プロとして 株が上がった アンダーソン
target: Really upped my professional factor.

source: で どうなるか？ - 株が上がる
target: - The stocks went up.

source: これは豊富な録音資料から 作られましたが あなたは問題の核心に触れることが 出来ると思います
target: This is backed up by extensive audio recordings, but I think you'll find it gets to the heart of the matter.

source: わかったよ　この件は相当に 根が深いんだ
target: Okay, this is deep, deep background.

source: 悲しいけど　家族の確執は根が深いの
target: It's very sad, but family feuds run deep.

source: 外科部長になった毒島は それを根に持って→ 他の関連病院にも根回しした。
target: Busujima, who became the Surgery Chief, bore a grudge against him for that, and he put pressure on other affiliated hospitals as well.

source: 根に持ってるのか？
target: Still bitter, Tim?

source: どこかに根を下ろしたい それが大切
target: I need to put my roots down somewhere that matter to me, Saul.

source: ここに根を下ろす
target: We're putting down roots.

source: 分かった 根を詰めるな
target: All right, don't work too hard.

source: あんまり仕事で根を詰めないでね
target: Don't be too busy with work.

source: 根を詰め過ぎですよ
target: You work so hard.

source: いいや 彼女が そう根回しをしているだけです
target: That's only what she's going around saying.

source: 根絶やしにするのは困難だ 内皮腫瘍患者の生存率は低い さらなる手立てを講じなければ
target: The survival rate of patients with severe endothelial growth... decreases exponentially the more the condition advances.

source: 兄貴はおまえらとは桁が違う...
target: Lawrence is better than all you lot...

source: - 桁が違う
target: I'll meet you on the other side.

source: お前らの桃源郷に行けと？
target: So we just should follow you to your Shangri-la?

source: 案ずるより産むが易し、だよ
target: Doing it is the easy part.

source: 自分を棚に上げて？
target: You're being pretty kind to yourself now, aren't you?

source: 信じられない　自分たちのことは 棚に上げる気？
target: Am I dreaming? You were secretive too! Why should I give up?

source: 自分のことを棚に上げて？
target: Did you even hear what you just said?

source: "しかし君と私には約束があったし" "君は終了を棚上げにしたからね"
target: But you and I had a bargain, and, uh, you held up your end.

source: モローは、彼のプロジェクトを棚上げに された為、レーンに復讐を望んでいる。
target: Morrow wants revenge on Lane for mothballing his project.

source: 彼女が棚卸しをする
target: She should inventory what we have.

source: 殺人のあった夜　彼は棚卸しをしていたわ
target: He was doing inventory the night of the murder.

source: 槍玉に上げる誰かよ
target: All that judge is looking for is someone to make an example of.

source: おばあちゃん まず横になって
target: Grandma, just lie down.

source: しばらく横になって...
target: But you should lie back down in case of another--

source: まずは横になって
target: If you want to lie down.

source: 彼はベッドに横になって 汗をかくのよ
target: He lies in bed and sweats.

source: 機を逸する前に 事態を収めるのだ
target: It's important you remedy things before the situation can get out of hand.

source: 我々が機先を制したようだ
target: Looks like we beat you to the punch.

source: あなたはパティの機嫌を 取りたいだけ
target: No,ellen,all you ever wanted was to impress patty hewes.

source: ジョフリーは父を鎖に繋いだ上に 俺にご機嫌を取りに来いというのか？
target: Joffrey puts my father in chains, now he wants his ass kissed?

source: 彼女は機嫌を取ってる でも　それも本当だ
target: She flatters me, but it's also true.

source: 奴の機嫌を損ねる
target: To him, something will be off.

source: 何か機嫌を 損ねることでもした？
target: Have I done something to you to upset you?

source: 一族には気をつけて すぐに機嫌を損ねる種族だから
target: Careful what you say around these folks. They're easily offended.

source: ミスター・ワイズ 君は本当に機知に富んでいる
target: Mr. Wise, you are as resourceful as promised.

source: 明らかに、パパは彼女がどれだけ賢くて 機知に富んでいるか、考えてもいなかった。
target: Clearly, he did not take into account how resourceful she is.

source: 犯人は 常に機知に富み... 追い手を 惑わす発想で... 理想的な 逃走路を発見した
target: The killer, always resourceful... always thinking along lines that would baffle his hunters... had discovered an ideal avenue of escape.

source: 機転が利くわね　オリー
target: Ah... good initiative, Olly.

source: 彼の歓心を買うように
target: - Keep him happy.

source: 止めを刺したんだな
target: Probably executed.

source: 良いハンターは獲物の跡を 注意深くつけて 好機にのみ 止めを刺すものだ
target: A good hunter stalks his prey with care, and only strikes when the time is right.

source: 正鵠を射るねえ グスタフさんよ
target: You hit the nail on the head, Mr. Gustave.

source: ''武士は食わねど高楊枝''って やつですか
target: Eagles don't eat flies... is that it?

source: 健康器具を捨て去り 青空のもとへ歩を進める
target: We are the morning you got off the treadmill and ran under the open sky.

source: 歯が立たないよ
target: We're in over our heads.

source: 今まで 歯が立たなかった敵に
target: Against an enemy that, to this point, has been unstoppable.

source: 警察も渋滞には歯が立たない
target: Cops are stuck in the traffic, like everyone else.

source: じゃ"歴史は繰り返す"、ってな
target: - Well, I guess history does repeat. - Okay.

source: 歴史は繰り返すのよ ダイアナの力を借りて
target: Diana is going to help us make sure that history repeats itself.

source: 歴史は繰り返します？
target: History will repeat itself?

source: 死の商人だ 汚い仕事の為に 傭兵とB. O.
target: He's a merchant of death using mercenaries and B.O.W.s to do his dirty work.

source: それは私の役割が死の商人としての 情報将校であることだ
target: It's my job to be the merchant of death as an intelligence officer.

source: 死人に口なし
target: They couldn't risk her knowing or finding out.

source: それで　デルは 別の毛色の変わった 興行を打った
target: So, Dell arranged a different kind of command performance.

source: わかるわ そんな女の気が知れない
target: I know. What kind of cheap woman could ever do something like that?

source: デカフェなど飲むヤツの 気が知れない
target: What kind of idiot drinks decaf anyway?

source: あれで納得する人の気が知れない
target: Who'd believe it?

source: 気が乗っているんでね
target: I'm in a generous mood.

source: 女の子を集めて 来なくちゃ、気が乗らねぇ
target: Maybe we should get some girls to watch this stunt, huh?

source: 何かしら 気が乗ってないのかもしれんよ
target: He might not be into getting back together with her.

source: 気が乗らなくて...
target: Doesn't seem right.

source: 気が乗らないわ, ブライトン
target: I'm not in the mood, Brighton.

source: 気が乗らなくて
target: Wasn't feeling the vibe.

source: 気が付かなかった
target: - It was so obvious. - Glucose levels.

source: 頭を撃ち抜けば 死んだと気が付くのに
target: You should've shot her in the head so they could hear her die.

source: 多分　気が付かなかったんだろう しかし　ダンピアではそんな 楽しいサーカスはない、だろ？
target: Maybe you haven't noticed, but Dampier's no three-ring bloody circus, is it?

source: いくらかの市民に 気が付いたが 私に背を向けている
target: I noticed some of your townsfolk turned their backs towards me.

source: 気が休まる
target: It helps.

source: ライブワイヤーが逃走中で あなたを残して帰ったら― 気が休まりませんから
target: And I don't really feel comfortable leaving you here alone with Livewire on the loose.

source: 気が休まらないだろ？
target: And... you're not comfortable with that?

source: これぞ 気が利くってもんだ
target: Now, that's what I call making yourself useful, love.

source: 本当に　もう 気が利かないんだから。
target: Seriously, you are so dense.

source: お前はホントに気が利かないんだから 夫人は千歳以上で執念深いのよ
target: You are really a clumsy flatterer filled with severe grudge

source: わたしとならきっと気が合う
target: And definitely the most fun.

source: 昔よ 気が向いたら またやろう
target: And I will again, once inspiration strikes.

source: - いつもジンジャーの回りのことは気が咎めるわ...
target: I always feel so guilty around Ginger.

source: すみません 気が回らなくて
target: I know. I'm sorry. I should have said that.

source: 元カノには気が回らなかった
target: There's nothing you can say that changes that.

source: 他の人はそこまで気が回らない?
target: They couldn't be couriered?

source: アルメニア人は 血の気が多いと言われる
target: We are all said to be fiery.

source: 気が大きくなるから 実際そうでした
target: Because it takes courage to think for yourself. She did.

source: 親父に嫌気が差して 家出したんだと言われた
target: Said she probably ran to escape her jerk of a father.

source: ここの奴らに 嫌気が差したのさ
target: Because, man, I-- I'm just-- I'm done with this group, man.

source: 逃げることに嫌気が差した
target: You're sick of running.

source: 答えるのに気が引けるが
target: Alas, the answer's not so excellent.

source: さすがに気が引けるけど
target: And that was a dick move. Even for me.

source: ジェナー博士 うっとおしいのは分かってる 俺も質問を投げかけるのは 気が引ける...
target: Dr. Jenner, I know this has been taxing for you and I hate to ask one more question, but...

source: 独りで歩いて来るなんて 気が強いのも考えものね
target: It seems to me to show an abominable sort of conceited independence.

source: 女性は皆、気が強い
target: I know. It's just, you seem like a strong lady, is all.

source: ちっこいのは気が強い 持ち上げとけ
target: Oh, little people are mean.

source: あなたは気が散ってた
target: You've been distracted.

source: 気が散らないから 落ち着いて仕事ができる
target: You're lucky... no distractions. You have your work and you do it.

source: 生まれつきすぐに気が散って 病的なほど疑い深い気質だ
target: Distractible and paranoid by nature.

source: 「気が早いな．．．」
target: Can you still?

source: 気が早いな メキシコの祝日か？
target: Holy crap. -What, is it Cinco de Mayo already?

source: 私が父親と住みたがるんじゃないかと 気が気じゃないみたい
target: She's all freaked out that I'm gonna want to live with him or whatever.

source: でも 入試がね 気が気じゃないもんね
target: With the exams, you're probably not in the mindset.

source: あなたを見つけようとして 気が気じゃなかったのよ
target: I've been out of my mind trying to find you.

source: どんだけぶっ飛ばされれば 気が済むって言うの？ さらにレベルアップして見ようか
target: How many of these guys' butts do we have to kick?

source: 骨が砕ける音がしたぞ　ディアズ もうやめろ　気が済んだだろ
target: You hear the bones cracking, Diaz. Come on, that's enough.

source: 小屋を調べれば 気が済むだろう
target: Maybe we ought to check the shed just to quiet him down.

source: いや　何も掛かってないと 気が滅入るだけだ
target: There are few things more depressing than empty coat hangers.

source: まあまあだ 家にいても 気が滅入るだけだし
target: After a certain point, time off doesn't help so I figured I'd rather be here.

source: 気が滅入った時に 探索してたの
target: Sometimes I get a little stir-crazy and go exploring.

source: 気が短いのはよすのだぞ？
target: That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.

source: いい人だけど気が短いわ
target: Baby, you're sweet, but you've gotta mellow out.

source: 雇い主は気が短いんだ こいつを使え
target: My client is getting impatient. Take these.

source: あなたは今気が立ってるだけよ
target: You're just a passing phase.

source: 気が立ってたよね
target: He seems pretty pissed.

source: 気が立っているんだ そうさ
target: It can happen.

source: 気が紛れてる。
target: I'm distracted.

source: 死後があるから― エリーゼが死んでも 気が紛れる
target: You think all the ghosts we've seen would somehow make me feel better that Elise is gone.

source: 気が紛れるわよ
target: Helps take the edge off.

source: 私はただ気が緩んでいるだけだった
target: I just wasn't paying attention.

source: つい気が緩んで
target: I'm not very focused tonight.

source: 当然だな　気が若いから
target: Well, that's not surprising. I was always young at heart, you know.

source: 気が触れぬのは幸運だ
target: It is mere luck we are not all insane.

source: 気が触れた人間の集まりだろうかと
target: You think we're crazy.

source: 気が触れたか？
target: Not yet. Are you crazy?

source: 老人を痛めつけるのは気が進まなかったので 打ちのめすのは留まったのさ
target: I could've beaten him, but I didn't want to hurt the old man.

source: ソファで寝ないと 気が重いわ
target: Please, Lucas, let me sleep on the couch. I'll feel bad.

source: 気が重い
target: No, you're not right.

source: 仕方ないじゃない　無理して病気が 重くなったら困るでしょ。
target: There's nothing we can do. You don't want her to get worse, do you?

source: タイタスが　じきここに来る やつが俺ほど 気が長くないのは知ってるよな
target: Well, Titus is gonna be here soon, and we both know that he's not gonna be as patient as I am.

source: いいんだ 気にするな
target: No worries. No worries.

source: また衣装か　そんなの 誰も気にしないってばよ
target: Again with the costumes. No one cares what we're wearing.

source: お前がこの事を、、気にする必要はないよ.
target: Never mind that. You heard the man. Come on.

source: 気にしないわ・・・いい気味よ
target: I don't care. It's what he deserves.

source: いや　気にしないで　飲ませて お世話になったんだから
target: N-No, it's okay. I can drink. It's a thing about me.

source: 斜面は小さくなるが 牛は気にしない
target: The chute gets smaller, but the cattle won't mind.

source: 息を潜めて... 仮面の裏側は気にすることもない.
target: We keep our heads down, never bothering to look behind the masks.

source: ノートパソコンを渡せ どうやって手に入れたかは　気にしない
target: Just give me the laptop. How it got there, I don't really care.

source: 人間の手に渡ったところで、 「ソー」は気にしそうに無いですけど。
target: Wouldn't mind getting my human hands on Thor.

source: 気にするな ４年間休暇を取ってないんだ
target: Who cares? He hasn't taken a vacation in four years...

source: 君が気にしているのに ふと気が付いてね
target: I've noticed how you stroke it.

source: 彼が死んだことは　気にしてないけど 殺されたことは　気になってるね
target: And you don't care that he's dead, but you do care that he was murdered.

source: （ｱﾙﾏﾝ）別に もし本当に １週間とか経って気になったら 俺のこと気にしないで ドンドン バンバン...
target: If you're still interested in her after a week, don't worry about me.

source: "費用は気にせず 知恵を絞り"
target: I don't care what it costs. Dig up whatever you can.

source: 数人の脱走兵が 顔を見せる勇気もなく 湿地に隠れてることは 気にしてない
target: Well, I'm not gonna concern myself with five or six deserters hiding' out in the swamp who don't have the courage to show their face.

source: お前は幽霊だから、 首の骨を折っても、気にしないだろう
target: Since you're a ghost, you won't mind if I break your neck.

source: 一つでも汚点を作れば すぐに出向だ お前みたいに なりたくもない病気になっても 周りのやつらから
target: you get transferred out immediately. there isn't a single word of apology from those guys around you. they hand you a one way ticket to no man's land.

source: 関係を持つなら 本気にならないと
target: If we do this we really did this.

source: ちょっと気になって→
target: It bothered me a little so

source: え？ レイチェルとつき合えて いい気になってるんじゃない？
target: Greg, you hung out with Rachel once.

source: いい気になるな
target: Don't let it go to your head.

source: 《フッ｡ なんて いい気になってるのかな？
target: As if. Am I getting ahead of myself?

source: その気になっても子供たちのせいで、 やる気を失うそうよ。
target: She said they were up all night, they were both exhausted all the time, the kids just took every sexual impulse they had outta them.

source: 皆病気になり暴力的になる
target: People are gettin' sick, they get sick and they get violent.

source: 銀行を目の敵にしてるってわけか しかし気にならないか？
target: huh? But isn't it odd?

source: 少ししてから 目を覚ますと 少し狂気になり 非常に暴力的になっていて
target: And when you wake up a little bit later, you are a little crazed and very violent.

source: 格好いいと思います 気に入りました
target: I think it's bad-ass. I like it.

source: 俺を睨み付けて 返事が気に入らなければ 俺を壁に叩きつけるんだな
target: You get in my face,tighten your jaw,then if I say something you don't like, you slam me against the wall.

source: 恐らく お前の若い魔女娘は 奴を次第に 気に入ったのだろう
target: Maybe your young witch has grown partial to his company.

source: 色々気に入ってる 肉も手に入るし 他のだって
target: I like the variety and availability of meats and other goodies...

source: うちの社長は 気に入らない仕事だからって 手を抜くような人じゃ ないですよね？
target: Our boss isn't someone who wouldn't do her best just because she doesn't like the product.

source: あなたの手段を選ばないところ 気に入っている
target: I like this "by-any-means" approach of yours.

source: 少し気に掛かるだろう 爆弾は作動してる
target: This is gonna make you a little bit anxious. It's ticking.

source: この余白が気に掛かる
target: I hate this margin.

source: 聞くことで 気に掛けてくれるとの 貴方への満足感を 与えたく無かった
target: I didn't want to give you the satisfaction of thinking I cared enough to ask.

source: お気に 掛けないで下さいね ハンサムな方と話が出来るだけでも もう嬉しくて
target: I hope you don't mind, but I don't get many handsome young men visitors anymore.

source: それで今日　彼女を救う あなたは手伝う事になる たとえあなたが 誰も気に掛けないとしても あなたの娘ジュリアでさえ
target: So today, I'm saving hers, and you're gonna help, even if you care about no one, not even your daughter Julia.

source: 俺が目に付くのは 両方を気に掛ける誰かだ 苦難の連続だった
target: What I see is somebody that both of us care for having a rough go of it.

source: - おやおや もう気に病まなくても いいですよ
target: You don't need to worry about me anymore.

source: 君は気に病むたちだからな もう忘れろ
target: Well, you always worried too much, Jim. The past is the past, my friend.

source: 気に病む事はない
target: I wouldn't bother, laddie.

source: 先に使ってしまって お気に障ったかしら
target: I hope you don't mind that I tried it first.

source: 気に障ったかな？
target: Mind if I sit?

source: 何が気に障った? ん? 最後ぐらい一
target: At least die like a honourable man.

source: １回は"イエス"の意味だ 気に食わないとさ
target: One ding. That means yes. Tio don't like you.

source: 破られたのが 気に食わないんだ
target: - I don't think you like the fact that I beat your test.

source: 僕が吹っ切れてるのが 気に食わないんだ
target: She just can't stand that I got over it.

source: ちょっとした 協定が気に食わない・・ 毎月第2週目の火曜・・
target: I'd hate for our little arrangement, every second Tuesday of the month...

source: 同性愛って... 病気のようなもので 病気は心配です
target: Homosexuality is like... is like disease, and I'm afraid of disease.

source: 「特に気を付けて頂きたいのは 交換した鍵が漏洩したり」
target: "I would like to confirm out of email that the keys we exchanged

source: - 了解 気を付けろ
target: I know you know.

source: 「足が速いから気を付けろ」と 父に言われたが
target: Our dad had warned us how fast that dog was, but we couldn't resist.

source: 気を使うな
target: Don't mind me.

source: あー 本当はいろいろ進んでんのに （勇気）うん 知らないふりして 気を使って
target: You mean how even though things are progressing between them, we have to pretend we don't know.

source: 気を使った言い方してくれても いいんじゃない？
target: Er, yeah, nicely put, John.

source: よく判らない グリムに戻らないでいる為に ジュリエットや皆に 何かにつけ 気を使わせたくない
target: You know, I just don't want Juliette to constantly have to worry about something bad happening to me, or to her, or to one of our friends.

source: キミは僕の手を煩わせないように気を使うだろ？
target: Just try and do your best To keep your hands off me, yeah?

source: 気を付け そして 互いに気を使い続ける様に
target: Be safe out there, look out for each other and keep charging.

source: 気を利かせてくれて... ありがとう
target: Thank you for your... efficiency.

source: 気を取り直して働け
target: Now pull the cobwebs out of your ass and move.

source: 「ダズリングス」に 人気を取られると思って... 悪いウワサを流してるのでは？
target: Perhaps you're all just worried that the Dazzlings will steal your spotlight.

source: それとも手に気を取られたか？
target: Or you been too busy watching the hand holding the deck?

source: ああ, だがあの時は 食べ物に気を取られてたんだ
target: Yeah, but they were feeding. They were distracted.

source: 俺が夜の王に気を取られているのは それを目にしたからだ
target: I'm consumed with the Night King because I've seen him.

source: 離婚してから ヤツは物に気を回さなくなった 何か夢中になるものを 探してたように見えます
target: Ever since his divorce, he didn't really care much about stuff.

source: 気を回さないで　あなたに... 話が...
target: I just came by to... talk.

source: た たぶん 気を失ったのだと思います
target: I - I don't know, I think I passed out for a while.

source: ガソリンを入れている時に 蒸気を吸って それでまた気を失ったんだ
target: You were pumping gas, and the fumes, they made you pass out again.

source: ホントにあなたの気を 引いちゃったのね
target: I really got to you, didn't I, Walter?

source: 気を引きたいのか 嫌なヤツだぞ
target: You girls throw yourselves at any douche bag who happens to be Moroi and royal.

source: だったら 教えてちょうだい 万引き癖のある最悪の妹に かかわって 私に何の得が？ あの子は周りの 気を引きたいだけ
target: Now I'm supposed to go, "Hank, please what can I possibly do to further benefit my spoiled, kleptomaniac, bitch sister who somehow always manages to be the center of attention?"

source: 謝りに来た 君の気を悪くしたから... 仲直りしよう
target: To apologize for anything I said that hurt your feelings and sort things out between you and me.

source: みんな気を悪くしている 臨機応変に対応してくれよ？
target: A lot of people would just suck it up, you know, rise to the occasion?

source: 分かったよ 若旦那 気を悪くせんでくれ
target: All right young sir, I meant no offense.

source: -8 気を抜くな 頼むから
target: Concentrate, please!

source: 気を抜くな
target: Stay sharp.

source: よし 気を抜くなよ
target: OK, stay sharp.

source: アニーに気を持たせて 何もしない気なのか？
target: May, you can't give Annie all this hope and then not deliver on anything at all.

source: あの夜は気を持たせちゃって...
target: I know I left you hanging the other night and I just wanted...

source: 気を持たせるだけだなと思って 言えなかったのね
target: I figured that would just lead him on.

source: 気を確かに持つんだ！
target: Stay awake! Stay awake!

source: 気を落とすな 覚えてる
target: Be brave I'll remember you

source: 気を落とさずに
target: God bless.

source: 気を落とさないで　ヴィクター
target: Take care,victor.

source: 僕は本当に彼女に気を許していた
target: I really let her in.

source: ジュリエット 気を許すな
target: Juliette, you can't trust her.

source: 白状させるには 信用できる誰かが要る 気を許してしいる誰かだ
target: Look, if we're gonna get him to confess, it has to be with someone that he truly trusts, someone that he'll genuinely let his guard down with.

source: 健康には気を遣わないと
target: We're watching our cholesterol, I guess. Not me.

source: これは特に気を遣うの　注意して
target: That one's very fragile. Be careful.

source: あなたのお父さんは 色々と気を配るのよ
target: Your dad, he is so thoughtful, to the end.

source: あなたと違い 気を配ってるので 好きな時間や 相棒を迎えに来る時間など
target: Yes, I, unlike you, pay attention to details, like what time it is and what time you're supposed to pick up your partner for shift.

source: 細かいところまで　気を配らないと
target: It's an attention to detail.

source: 落ち着くんだ　気を静めろ
target: Okay, McFly. Get a grip on yourself.

source: 気を静めて入りなさい
target: So you better pull yourself together and get in there.

source: まあ奥様 気を静めてください
target: Please, don't get upset, Princess. It's just your imagination, because, I assure you...

source: 全然　気合が入ってない
target: There's absolutely no commitment.

source: 鳥井教授　今日は 一段と気合が入ってますよ　ええ。
target: Professor Torii is certainly fired up today.

source: 気合を入れろ！
target: Put some spunk into it!

source: チアリーダーたちが劇で 気合を入れてくれるようだ
target: The cheerleaders have put together a skit to help get us in the spirit.

source: もっと気合を入れて練習を始めろ ニーマン
target: Start practicing harder, Neiman.

source: 君よりも、私のほうがずっと気味が悪いと 思われてるよ、マーゴ。
target: I'm much weirder than you will ever be, Margot.

source: 気味が悪くて広い場所だ
target: I know it's spooky, big guy.

source: 気味が悪いな
target: Spooky.

source: 謝罪するなら すべてを水に流すそうよ
target: He says he'll drop the whole thing if you apologize.

source: まさか水に流すよ
target: Live and let live, man.

source: ジュニア　赤ん坊を渡せ すべて水に流そう
target: Junior, look, hand over the baby, and we'll let bygones be bygones.

source: だが言い終わる前に あの光に水を差された 話の続きを期待してるんだが
target: But before he could finish, we were interrupted by that flash of light and I'm hoping we can pick up where we left off.

source: 水を差すようだが 操ってはならん
target: I hate to interrupt, But glamour is not permitted.

source: チャドが生活体験者の名簿を 持って来なければ 全て水の泡
target: If Chad doesn't get back with that list of live-aboards, it was all for nothing.

source: 私が捕まれば全てが水の泡
target: If they arrest me, this mission is blown.

source: 今を逃せば水の泡
target: It's a needle in a haystack after this.

source: 水火も辞せずついて行きます"
target: To the bitter end."

source: パン工房は ほんの氷山の一角ね
target: The bakery's just the tip of the iceberg.

source: 歴史教科書から氷山の一角にしか学べない 自分の手で直接体験した方がよい
target: Archive texts can only teach you a part of the picture, my young Padawan. You'll learn a lot more through some hands-on experience.

source: 心をなくしてた　それが彼女 スポーツして汗を流すこともなく ただひたすら研究してた
target: You're losing your mind, and there she is, working just as hard, not even breaking a sweat.

source: そうです　食事はビーガン 走って汗を流します
target: Yeah, I actually did. I'm a vegan. And I started working out, and running, and working out, and running...

source: 共に血と汗を流し 弾の雨をくぐって来た
target: We've shared blood, sweat and precious metal together.

source: 決を採ろう
target: We should vote.

source: この場で決を採ろう
target: On behalf of custodial services,

source: 決まりが悪いわ。
target: He'd be embarrassed.

source: - ちょっと 決まりが悪いな
target: - Yeah, but it'd be pretty awkward.

source: キャット・グラントは、Catcoの ハックについて沈黙を 破ろうとしています。
target: It seems Cat Grant's silence regarding the Catco hack is about to be broken.

source: その一帯に囮貨物船が到着次第 無線で沈黙を破ります
target: Soon as the decoy freighters arrive in the system, they'll break wireless silence.

source: 夫が沈黙を破ります 妻の失踪に― 彼の不倫や噂の事を
target: A husband breaks his silence, not just on his wife's disappearance... but on his infidelity, and all those shocking rumors.

source: 油が切れてるな
target: Transmission's dry.

source: よう なんだ 一体どこで油を売っていた?
target: Hey, man, where'd you run off to?

source: 冬が来るまでずっと ここで油を売ってるつもりか？
target: Do you plan on sitting here scratching your balls till winter?

source: 油を売るために 電話した訳じゃない
target: I don't make the call about which, if any, of these charges hold water.

source: 私の頭に油を注いでくださる 私の杯は 溢れています
target: "You anoint my head with oil. My cup overflows.

source: 波風が立たないよう　友達のように接する 貴方の態度の事よ
target: It means that you're still acting like you're everyone's best friend.

source: "泣きを見る" 君は言ってくれた
target: " It will end in tears. " You've warned me.

source: この件が蒸し返して 泣きを見なければいいんだが
target: As long as this doesn't come back and bite us in the ass.

source: 分かってるだろう 土下座して 泣きを入れる奴も居れば その一方で 英雄然として
target: Well, you know as well as I do, there's guys who roll over and beg and mercy, and then there's those other guys who get all heroic, and are willing to die for the cause.

source: 泣きっ面に蜂ですよ
target: Took us completely by surprise.

source: ♪別々に暮らす 泣き出しそうな空を
target: I don't have enough strength anymore

source: 泣くに泣けなかったよ
target: It was very, very sad.

source: 彼の注意を引いて下さい
target: Distract him.

source: 確かに誕生日会はしなかった 周りの注意を引くからな 警察の目も光ってた 目立たない方がいい
target: Well, you didn't have birthday parties, because that would draw attention to us and with the police looking for us, that's not a good thing.

source: 念じて物を動かしたり 少しでも父の注意を 引こうとして
target: Or that I was moving stuff around with my mind, hoping it might get him to pay a little more attention.

source: 本当にそれは注目に値します 本当に驚異的です CIAにとっては大成功ですね 貴方が作戦統制を管理して以来
target: I must say, it is remarkable, really astounding, the success that the CIA has had since you have taken operational control, and so the President has asked me to ask you to ask him, to invite you both

source: 注目に値する
target: Remarkable.

source: 科学者で鑑定家としてそう思った こりゃ何だ？ 注目に値する
target: And as a scientist and a connoisseur, I have I have no idea the contents of this remarkable potion.

source: 頭は低く, つねに目を見張れ, 注目を浴びたい衝動に打ち克て.
target: Keep your head down, keep your eyes up, resist the urge to be seen as important or special.

source: 彼らは隊で侵入 メディアと国家からの注目を浴び 人質の命を盾に
target: they enter with force, drew the attention of the media and law enforcement using human hostages as collateral for their demands.

source: やっとボスの 注目を浴びるチャンスが 来たかと思った
target: I saw a chance to step up for you, get noticed.

source: だが彼は市の裏の部分 残忍さ暴力を浮き彫りにさせる
target: What that man does is carry out a dark reckoning for his city. It is a brutal, violent vision of justice, one we do not share.

source: 自慢じゃないがこの齢になるまで 一回も浮いた噂はない
target: I've had no romance in my life.

source: そう娘を探してる時は いつもこんなよ 娘が消息を絶ってから...
target: Yes, he stays out this late when he's looking for my daughter, since my daughter has been gone -- yes!

source: レバノン内戦にキリスト教徒側で参戦して その後消息を絶ったが
target: Fought with the Christian Phalangists in the Civil War, then disappeared.

source: 教授はラングーンに到着後 消息を絶っています 妻であるアウン・サン・スー・チー氏 を訪ねる目的だった模様
target: It has not been seen since his arrival in Rangoon where he came to visit his wife.

source: お前の母親はどう？ 醜悪な精神病院で 涎を垂らしながら死なせたいかい？
target: And what about your mother? Huh? You want her to die drooling in some hideous asylum?

source: 彼女の甘い香水が 俺の涙を誘う
target: Her perfume a sweet promise that brings tears to my eyes.

source: ただ、私の歌はよく子供の涙を誘うがね
target: Yeah. On the other hand, my singing would often drive my children to tears.

source: どんな時も 涼しい顔してたよね？
target: How'd you always make it look so easy?

source: 彼女は涼しい顔で人生を乗り切ってきた
target: She handled life like it was easy.

source: 竜巻の中に歩いて入り... 涼しい顔で出て来る男
target: We need someone who can walk into a tornado, and come out the other side like it was a damn gentle breeze.

source: 彼女の血が強く君に訴えてる... それで私は渇きを覚えている。
target: Her blood appeals to you so much it makes me thirsty.

source: 渡りに船さ
target: Janitors go anywhere, everywhere, nobody pays any attention to them.

source: 向こうにとっても 今回の提案は渡りに船だ
target: This proposal is a godsend to them as well.

source: 滅相もない... ！
target: Oh no!

source: 私は　その場しのぎの 一時的な謙虚さを潔しとしない
target: Well, I will not allow false modesty to tarnish the moment.

source: Vが濡れ衣を着せたのは二度目
target: - It's the second time V's framed you... for something you didn't do. - Anything you wanna tell us?

source: まぁ... 教会の金庫を空にする目的で 会計係に濡れ衣を着せ 自分が着服したと考えている
target: Well, we think he framed the church accountant for clearing out the church's coffers and took the money for himself.

source: 社長に殺人犯の濡れ衣を着せれば 事業計画を妨害できると言うのは わかるけど えらく回りくどいやり方ね
target: I get that framing the head of a company for murder could throw a hitch in his business plan, but it's a hell of a long way to go.

source: 濡れ衣を着せられた じゃリストを盗んだ人物は　まだ逃走中か
target: So the person who stole the list is still at large.

source: あなたを破滅させたがってる人物に 濡れ衣を着せられたように見せかけた
target: You were being framed by someone who wanted to destroy you.

source: 濡れ衣を着せられるのはごめんだ
target: I ain't going down on some trumped-up murder charge.

source: 任務を与えたら 火に油を注ぐ事に
target: We have enough race troubles as it is without these sons of bitches in the press throwing fuel on the fire.

source: 誰かが気づくべきだった 露骨なまでに目の前にあるんだ perfectly obvious 火を見るより明らか
target: Any one of us should have seen the perfectly obvious staring us in the face.

source: チキンはちゃんと火を通して
target: Make sure those chickens are cleaned properly.

source: ゆっくり火を通す
target: -It's all about slow roasting.

source: 火中の栗を拾う性分
target: You never could keep yourself out of trouble, either.

source: 火中の栗を拾うなら そうなるだろう 奴らは我々をも 普通の人間扱いするだろうか？
target: Not if we risk our lives doing so.

source: 彼らは海洋で仕事を 火中の栗を拾っている それを了解なしに引き上げようと
target: They're out there in the freakin' ocean risking their lives for us, and you raise their taxes without asking me?

source: 俺は 5歳か、そこらかな、小さい町で、ワイルドバーグって、 ブラックフォレストにあったんだが、 ちょうど爆撃されて灰燼に帰したんだ、知ってるか？
target: I was five years old, or something, in a little town, Wildberg, in the Black Forest, and it was just bombed to ashes, you know?

source: ダミーコ一味が すべて灰燼に帰すまで―
target: Not 'til D'Amico and his whole damn operation are burnt to ashes.

source: "灸を据える"って言ったろ
target: But you prayed for me to get punished!

source: 後ろから弱点を打つ
target: I must strike the weak spot from behind.

source: 点数を稼ぎたいのよ
target: I need a win.

source: 古いゲームの所為にしてると マスコミに知れたら
target: If this gets out to the press that we are pinning this on some old video game...!

source: 俺がした事は全て君の為に さようなら
target: Everything I ever did was for you. All board. All board.

source: 自分にもっと度量があったら アナタに応えられた アナタの為になる事を
target: I just keep wishing that I'd been bigger somehow, able to give you... what you needed to be okay again after you got back, but I couldn't.

source: 沈黙が君の為に なるとは思えない
target: I don't believe the life of the Silent Sisters is for you.

source: お前がしっかりしなきゃ ヤツの為にならないぞ
target: You oughtta lock him up for his own good.

source: 当てはないが 為せば成る
target: Just go for it.

source: その烏合の衆の中に 交渉権を持つ者は？
target: Is there any in this rout with authority to treat with me?

source: 烏合の衆のクソ週末兵士に 穴に埋められた
target: Buried in a hole by a bunch of weekend warriors!

source: 烏合の衆のままでは いさかいが絶えぬだけで
target: If we work separately, we'll just end up fighting.

source: 特に　自分の父親を殺した子と 烙印を押されるのはね
target: Especially when you're branded the kid who killed your dad.

source: 悪党は全て テロリストの烙印を押され
target: This new law, where if you're a bad enough, bad guy they stamp "Terrorist" on your jacket.

source: 人生の烙印を押されたんだ
target: I was branded for life.

source: 防毒マスクは 水素には 無用の長物になるのです
target: Gas masks will be useless against hydrogen.

source: 無辜の民か それが次のターゲットだ
target: I-it could be an innocent of some kind, but I think that could be his next kill.

source: むやみに無辜の民を殺さないなら
target: As long as you don't kill the innocent

source: 新米の君たちへの忠告だ よく観察して 無駄口を叩くな
target: Now, a few words of advice as newbies on the job... eyes open, mouths shut.

source: じゃ、無駄口を叩くな
target: Then don't waste time talking about it.

source: 考えておるわい 焦点を合わせろ
target: I said I would think about it. Now focus.

source: 焦点を合わせるのか。 私は、彼らの正体と、 組織の仕組みを知る価値があると考えました。
target: We decided it is worth knowing who these people are and how their organizations operate, because on the other side of the rage and the sadness are clarity and strength, the power we have to focus our efforts effectively,

source: 焦点を合わせて 押すんだ
target: You just take it, point it, and shoot it.

source: これらの一つに焦点を絞りましょう
target: I want to focus on just one of them.

source: 焦点を絞りましょう
target: Let's narrow the window of incident.

source: 焼け石に水なんだよ！
target: - is just a drop in the bucket!

source: 北の我が軍は 煙幕を張り こっそりと、少し後退した 一方、爆撃機は３回にわたり
target: Our troops in the north put down a smokescreen and under cover they withdrew a little while our bombers went in in three deadly waves to deliver a large aerial bombardment and one of the heaviest of the whole campaign.

source: 煮え湯を飲まされた
target: But to be betrayed by him...

source: 銀行さんには 今まで どんだけ煮え湯を飲まされたか
target: I don't know how many times I've been burned by banks.

source: 熱が冷めるように
target: Like the passing of a fever.

source: 結婚すると熱が冷めるって おまえ　言ってたけど 俺たち夫婦は　反対だな
target: You'd think that marriage would just cool things off, but for us, it's just the opposite.

source: 彼のことは　完全に熱が冷めたの
target: That guy is completely out of my system.

source: 誰に熱を上げようと 構わんが...
target: I wouldn't give a shit about your pathetic schoolgirl crush.

source: 熱を上げた最近の 女がすることよ
target: It's what us modern girls do when we have a crush.

source: もっと熱を入れて
target: Come on, give me some heat...

source: プレイに熱を入れろ！
target: Play with some energy now!

source: さて最近　この中の誰かが 少し熱くなってます
target: Now, one of you has been coming in a little hot lately.

source: プライスレスのライフワークです」 って　このコメント→ 実に素晴らしくて 胸が熱くなりました！
target: To me, surgery is priceless life work." That comment was so very touching, I was fraught with emotion!

source: Who'd have ever thought that this could be? 胸が熱くなるの
target: Who'd have ever thought that this could be

source: 会場の空気は熱気を帯びて来ています
target: Enjoy your day.

source: 彼女はロマンチックなんだと思う 彼女の好きな詩人の 爪の垢を煎じて飲むわ
target: I mean, knowing Jess, she probably just thought it was romantic, following in the footsteps of her favorite poet.

source: - 車で片を付けるか
target: I'm gonna keep it about the cars

source: 片を付ける ここに居ろ
target: I got business to finish. You stay here.

source: 俺は片を付けようと言ったんだ
target: I told you we're finishing this.

source: あの建物が分かるか？
target: You recognize building, yes?

source: - 探してる物が分かったら教えるよ
target: It'd help if I knew what the hell I was looking for.

source: 君の所有物を調べれば 君が持ち出した物が分かるかな？
target: Are they gonna be able to go into your stuff and figure out what you took?

source: 判った 物は試しだ
target: Okay.

source: 物は試しと言うだろ
target: -All right. It was worth a try at least.

source: 君がはっきり物を言うから 推薦したのだ
target: I recommended you to the President because you're not afraid to speak up.

source: お気に召さない? じゃこれだ デカさが物を言う
target: Let me tell you something, Size does matter.

source: キャロル、相手を 見て物を言えよ
target: Carol, you got to start listening to yourself when you talk.

source: ねぇ, この事件は犬も食わないわ.
target: I mean, this case is a dog.

source: 犬猿の仲ね
target: He hates the man.

source: - イラク人を誘い込んで狙いをつけるか...
target: - Either we call the Iraqis and level with them...

source: だから俺の顔に 完璧に一致したマスクを見つけてくれ 俺が逃走中狙いをつける能力に 影響を与えないこと
target: So find me a mask that conforms perfectly to my face and doesn't affect my ability to aim while I'm on the run.

source: 狙いを定めて
target: Set your sight.

source: 狙いを定めたら 気を付けて
target: And be careful where you point that thing.

source: 狭き門だからね
target: Yeah, but it's hard to become one.

source: 狸寝入りするってのか？
target: Will you stop crying about this? Let's go.

source: 私たちは悪人になる為に参加してない 猫の手も借りたいくらいよ
target: We didn't join up to be in a gang. We did it so we could help people.

source: 猫の手も借りたい、行くぞ
target: We need all the help we can get.

source: 俺を玩具にして
target: You're fucked up, you know that?

source: 憶えてるさ 人を玩具にしやがって
target: I know he remembers me! He's just messing with my head!

source: もしあなたが気違いなら 理に適う事はないわよ
target: Well, if you were crazy, they wouldn't make sense to you.

source: この法律を遡って適用 すべきでないのは理の当然 更に、私が 困惑しているのは アルトマンさんの弁護人が この事実を知らせていない
target: It seems to me obvious that the FSIA rulings cannot be retroactively applied, and I'm bewildered that Mrs. Altmann's counsel has not advised her of this fact.

source: なぜこんなことに夢中になるのか 理解に苦しむわ
target: What got into you? Why did you do it?

source: だから理解に苦しむ なぜ妻に不死身だと言った？ 分別ある人間なら 不死身など信じてない
target: Which makes it all the more difficult to understand why you would tell your wife that you are immortal, why you would believe, in that moment, something that any sane man would know is impossible.

source: 事故以来のお前って ほんとに理解に苦しむ
target: That night of the crash, you started getting all weird. What? What are you talking about?

source: お客様の琴線に触れるような イメージを 作り出していきたいと 思っています
target: We would like to create products that reflect this desire.

source: ハロー 瓜二つ
target: Hello, doppelganger.

source: お父上に瓜二つだ
target: You look like your father.

source: 君は瓜二つだな
target: You're like a clone.

source: 貧乏 甘く見るんじゃないわよ （繭子）え？
target: Don't underestimate the poor.

source: 老人だと思って 甘く見るな 究極に極めた力がある
target: That old man finally has the power that he's always yearned for.

source: 自然の力を甘く見て 思いあがるとこわいぞ
target: The lack of humility before nature that's being displayed here staggers me.

source: 人生はそんなに甘くない 甘い汁を吸う奴もいるんだ
target: Life is full of disappointments for some people.

source: 甘い汁を吸う会社だ
target: How about that big, fat Soylent Corporation?

source: 大統領はＴＶに出て話をし カネ持ちは甘い汁を吸う
target: Hell, even the President gets on TV and tells corporations and the rich to suck eggs.

source: 生き血を吸わない バンパイアなんて...
target: A vampire who doesn't feed is like a... like a...

source: フェンスの生ける屍達が... ここを守ってるが
target: You see, I have a lot of free labor here at the fence... living dead pricks that help keep the riffraff out.

source: むしろ抗生物質を貰う代わりに 歩き回ってる生ける屍みたいね
target: He'd rather walk around like the living dead instead of just get antibiotics.

source: 生ける屍ね
target: We are the dead.

source: 生みの苦しみはきつく
target: Her agony was awful!

source: "産みの苦しみ" ね
target: She's having some growing pains.

source: ハイテクとは言えんが 十分用が足りる
target: (monroe) it's not very high-tech, but we think it'll work.

source: 用を足す機会が 与えられねばならない" もうそのぐらいの 時間は経つだろう
target: And I do believe we're creeping up on that time.

source: だれも家の中で用を足さない
target: - Vikings. Well, none of them are house-trained.

source: ワインを飲み過ぎれば 用を足したくもなる
target: I drank too much wine, I must take a piss.

source: 劣った男が立っているのを 前にして 「神は人間を平等に創造した」 だなんて 信じられるわけがない
target: impermeable to reason, with cold, pallid slime in their veins instead of hot, red blood!

source: 驚かすつもりはないが 君の後ろに 変な男が立ってる
target: Um, I don't want to alarm you right now, but there's a fucking creepy dude standing right behind you.

source: 時にはもやしっ子が強大な男になることもある
target: And sickly little boys sometimes become powerful men.

source: 男を上げる しかも誰も彼もの良心が 晴れやかになる
target: He looks good, and everyone feels better about themselves.

source: 男を磨いてるの
target: I'm making you look pretty.

source: しかし 異を唱える声も
target: Though the day is not without controversy.

source: 彼はロバート王の弟と共謀し ジョフリー王子の王位継承に 異を唱えたらしい
target: They say he conspired with Robert's brothers to deny the throne to Prince Joffrey.

source: リコンの生きている限り 総督の座に異を唱えられる 生かしておくわけがない
target: As long as he lives, Ramsay's claim to Winterfell will be contested, which means he won't live long.

source: 異彩を放っていて ステキだわ
target: It makes you very different.

source: 疑わしきは罰せずにね
target: I gave you the benefit of the doubt over and over.

source: "疑わしきは罰せず" だよ
target: Hey, innocent until proven guilty, Jess.

source: 白状しないと 痛い目に合うぞ
target: This can be as painless as you want it to be.

source: 痛い目に遭うか？
target: I'm going to kick your ass.

source: 他社に移って 痛い目に遭わせる
target: Yeah, that man lives in fear. I'll go across town. Hell, I could go anywhere.

source: え　いや 君は痛い目に遭う事になる
target: Eh, no, you're gonna get hurt.

source: リンダを送りたいが 仕事があるし 癇に障る面もある
target: I'd send Linda, but there's so much work for her to do here, and, well, she can be abrasive at times.

source: その NETFLIXさんが 日本に上陸するにあたって ちょっと このテラスハウスに 白羽の矢が立ったと
target: Netflix came to our shores and showed their interest in Terrace House.

source: 誰だっていいさ お前は的が外れてる
target: It doesn't matter, you know, you're missing the point.

source: 私達の事に的を絞ると とやかく言われる
target: And focusing on us and not on the affair.

source: - 標的を絞ってる
target: I think it's targeting people.

source: だから 標的を絞ると
target: So you focus on the highest value target.

source: 君は、見る目があるよ
target: Trust you've had a chance to take a look around, huh?

source: なかなか見る目がある
target: A man of taste.

source: 人を見る目があるな
target: You're a good judge of character.

source: ほら　あの目がいい
target: Aw! Aw! Look at his eyes.

source: お前の目がいいな
target: Yeah, buddy, look at your eyes.

source: 彼らは目が利く
target: Well, they know a winner when they see one.

source: 我々は尊い金鉱夫だったんだ 闇の中でも目が利くのでね
target: We were noble gold miners because we could see the light in the darkness.

source: あぁ 目が回ってるさ
target: - Yeah, we do. We sure do.

source: 目が回るか？
target: Quickly, quickly, quickly. Do you feel dizzy?

source: なんか... すごく... 目が回る
target: I... feel... awfully... dizzy!

source: ５通目が届いた後　返事を書き始めたよ
target: I began to reply after the fifth one.

source: 私たちを 守るためだって... 目が届くからって
target: She said it was to protect us, so she could patrol things.

source: よりいっそう細部にまで目が届き より本質に迫れる
target: I prefer to work on the originals.

source: - 目が眩む 何も見えない
target: - I can't see. I'm blind. - Me too.

source: 本物の職人の技で 目が眩むわよ
target: You'll be blinded by the sheer craftsmanship.

source: 鎮静剤を打つ 家で目が覚めるだろう
target: I'm gonna give you a sedative. You'll wake up back at home.

source: 原因爆弾はそれらの束を目が覚めました。
target: Cause bombs woke up a bunch of them.

source: それは脅し方次第じゃなくって 殺せば目が覚めるだけ
target: That depends on what you're threatening. Killing him will just wake him up.

source: 気を失って 三日前に目が覚めた
target: I blacked out, then I woke up three days ago.

source: - ファスコ刑事から目が離せない
target: Keep an eye on Detective Fusco.

source: もう目が離せない 並外れた動き
target: I can't take my eyes up off it moving so phenomenally

source: お前から目が離せないからな
target: I'm keeping an eye on you, you slippery little mutt.

source: 目が飛び出て　拷問の証拠だ
target: Eyes blown out, evidence of torture.

source: 目が高いぜ　世界最強の 助っ人を選ぶとは
target: You were wise to seek help from the world's most deadly weapon.

source: お目が高くていらっしゃいます
target: You have a keen eye.

source: お 目 が高いですな
target: Boy, you sure know how to pick 'em.

source: 目と鼻の先で暴動になったら
target: What if we set your backyard on fire?

source: そんなところの目と鼻の先で働いているんだ
target: I can't believe you work right across the street from there.

source: 怒りは人を盲目にする... 関わらないのが最良だが
target: When fighting angry, blind men... best we just stay out of the way.

source: 想像できるだろ 家柄も何もない子供が 伝説の人物たちを目にするんだ
target: You can imagine what it was like for me, a boy from nowhere, with nothing to his name, watching these legendary men, tilting at the lists.

source: アーノルドは 息子の誕生日を目にしーー そして　この世を去るのを 目にした
target: Arnold had watched his son come into this world, and then he had watched that light extinguished.

source: 自分の目を疑う光景を目にすることだろう
target: You will see things that will make you doubt your eyes.

source: 耳にしたことは まったくないわけでもない 目にしたこともまったくないわけじゃない ごめん
target: I can't unhear things I've heard, unsee things I've seen.

source: "ニック 目には目を 歯には歯をだろ？" あれで
target: I think the time for being careful is over, Nick.

source: いや、ただ中で目に付いて、思ったんだ ほら、持っておくべきだって
target: No, I just saw it inside and thought I, you know, should bring it along with me.

source: ロビー・ボーイは全く目に付かず かつ何時でも見つけられなければならない
target: A Lobby Boy's completely invisible, yet always in sight.

source: どうしても目に付く 医者にも行かないのか 私が勧めた
target: But I can't help noticing that you are nowhere near the doctor that I recommended.

source: わしの価値以上に─ 態度が目に余って 辞めるべきなら...
target: If I should cease to be useful, if my behaviors are outweighing my value, well...

source: 目に余るほどの虚偽 これまでに見た事がない
target: A sorrier pack of deck wallopers I don't think I've ever seen.

source: 勤務中この二人が目に入っても、
target: From time to time, you're gonna see these two.

source: その目に映るもの全て
target: All the things I see in your eyes.

source: 君の目に映っているのは 本当の僕じゃない
target: What you're looking at-- that's not who I am inside.

source: 寝入る姿が目に浮かぶ
target: With one of his lucky strikes in his hand,

source: 目に浮かぶよ 巨大なネオンに君の名
target: - Straight to the top. Why, I can see your name in lights, lights six feet high.

source: まざまざと目に浮かぶね
target: That's a vivid image.

source: 見てしまったら 目に焼き付いて離れない
target: Once you see it, you can't unsee it.

source: この犯人も目に焼き付かれて いる様ですね
target: It seems this Ouroboros killer was also obsessed with eyes.

source: 目に焼き付いてます
target: It's so clear in my mind.

source: 目に物見せるわ
target: Show me something.

source: 目に物見せてやる！
target: I'll show you what I've got! This!

source: 何か これっていう目標がさ 目に見えてあって 入ってきたわけじゃないから
target: I didn't gain any insight on what I want to work towards.

source: ひざに座らされた子供達が 身もだえするのは目に見えてる
target: Kids are squirming in his lap all day. It's bound to happen sooner or later.

source: 死体を目に触れやすい屋外に捨てるのは ギャングの仕業らしい気もします
target: Dumping the body out in the open like that feels like a gang hit.

source: 死体写真を 持ってても デクスタの机でやれば ハリソンの 目に触れない
target: And maybe you could keep the photos on Dexter's desk, so Harrison won't see them.

source: 仰々しい演出だ 目に触れるよう 人や物を引用している
target: It's a theatrical term referring to a picturesque grouping of people or objects.

source: 目の前が真っ暗になったとき
target: And just as everything was going dark,

source: 密売人や臓器カルテルにとって 私は目の敵です
target: Traffickers, cartels.

source: 魔法省はなぜ僕を目の敵に？
target: I don't understand. What has the Ministry of Magic got against me?

source: おれを目の敵だ
target: He was just tryin' to bait me.

source: 何で哀れなスメアゴルを 目の敵にする？
target: Why does he hates poor Sméagol?

source: 山口の一件で花岡先生を 目の敵にしてるんですよ （蒲生） 裁判所の呼び出しに　応じない場合
target: Kuryu has been targeting him ever since Yamaguchi!

source: 何ヶ月も彼を目の敵にしてきたと言っている
target: Monroe and Clennon had it in for him for months.

source: - 目の毒だな
target: - Well, you shouldn't look like that.

source: 目も当てられない
target: This looks terrible.

source: マーシーに関わると 皆 目を付けられる
target: Because anybody associated with Marshy is a marked man.

source: 祈りなさい 目を付けられたぞ　アーサー
target: Pray on it. Hello. They're on to you, Arthur.

source: ♪人を傷つける事に目を伏せるけど
target: "Tolerance to do harm to others"

source: もし、マホーンがそこにいったら、 これ以上目を伏せることができない
target: What if he's in there? I can't keep avoiding him.

source: 両親の話をする度に 目を伏せる
target: Every time I mention my parents, your eyes go down.

source: 目を凝らすと 今までの人生が見える
target: If you look hard enough, you can see your whole life from up here.

source: 貴方は目を凝らして 耳を澄まして 王子との契約期間を過ごすだけ
target: Lynne, all you have to do now is keep your eyes and ears open for the remainder of your contract with the prince.

source: 遠くに目を凝らしても かすんで消えていく
target: ♪ And when you look too far away ♪ It all but disappears
