target: And they're going to want the same as Europeans, Arabs, everybody wants real estate in New York, in America and I know the market here.

source: 彼らは血液に防腐剤を入れてます これは発酵によりアルコール検査で 高い数値を示すことがあります
target: And they used a preservative in the blood that has been known to cause fermentation, and in some cases, register higher in an alcohol test.

source: 国民が彼らの政治のため 人々を撃ったこの町にいた 奴らが何かのために言う 誰かが奴らのために言う
target: There were people in our town that shot people because of their politics, or because of something they'd said or something someone said they'd said.

source: それはいい 電気工のペンチを
target: That would be awesome. If he could come out here, we could use his needle nose pliers to get that stick out of your ass.

source: ドニーの指導力の元 コスコフと ファインバーグが 重要な管理職に 移動することだ
target: Under Donnie's leadership, along with Nicky Koskoff and Robbie Feinberg moving into key management positions, this place really is gonna be better than ever!

source: フィジーには死者が必要ない 万が一　雪なら 道路に散骨するかな？
target: Well, she won't be much use to you on Fiji now... not unless it snows and you need something to grit the path with,

source: ミュージカルの後に 一度 送っただけだよ
target: Look, I gave her a lift home from the musical. One time. She started telling me about how her mum wanted a new conservatory,

source: 灯りは点けといて 目を輝かしながら 戻ってくるかも知れないから 実際には泥酔してるだろうけど
target: Leave a light on, good lady, for though we may return with a twinkle in our eyes, we will, in truth, be blind drunk.

source: 当時大事なミッションがあって、 すぐ裁判になり、 五年のミッションだし
target: we had this big RICO case that was about to go to trial, and we're talking thousands of man hours, five years of research.

source: 最近のタクシー襲撃は11件 うち3件が面白いわ
target: There have been 11 attacks on cabdrivers in the past 60 days in the DC and Maryland area. Three of them are very interesting.

source: この街が地獄に落ちてから 混沌としているが 私が何度も何度も 聞いたのは
target: Lot of chaos in this crummy town since it all went to hell, but the one thing I've heard over and over again is,

source: 本が読まれ 絵に感嘆され 歌を歌われる限り 我々の中で生き続ける
target: As long as his books are read, his paintings admired, as ong as our songs are sung, we may each of us live forever.

source: 私が ベストマンの依頼を 理解しなかったのは 予想していなかったからです 誰かの一番の友人になることを
target: So if I didn't understand I was being asked to be best man, it is because I never expected to be anybody's best friend.

source: 犯罪者を暴く事に 執着するプライスにも きっと闇がある
target: Sal Price made his living writing about the dark things people do, but he doesn't seem to have a dark side of his own.

source: 銃を持ってるのが 見えたんで通報を
target: And then I saw that one of the men had a gun under his shirt, so I immediately got my phone and dialed 911.

source: 一体誰が防衛ネットワークに潜入しよう としたんだ
target: whoever did this finally managed to infiltrate our defense network, which is what they tried to do in qatar, only this time it worked.

source: 異なる種類のテストを多くをやりました しかし... 【マーカス博士】　最も効果的な 透視能力の測定に − ジナーカードがありました
target: Well, we did a lot of different kinds of tests, but... probably the most effective one to measure clairvoyant abilities were the Zener cards.

source: 彼は裁判なしで アメリカ人を含む無期限拘留を － 抑留者規定と国防認可行為に 拒否しなかった
target: He did not veto the Detainee Provisions and the National Defense Authorization act which codify the indefinite detention of people including Americans without trial.

source: その間に　リース・キンランという男が 以前　カルテルの仕事をしてたことを知った
target: That, during my time with them, I became aware of a man by the name of Rhys Kinlan, a former employee of the cartel.

source: ニックは結婚式だと言ったら 場所を聞いてきた
target: I said Nick was at the wedding and told him where it was, and that's when he walked out the door and got shot.

source: ちょっと、聞きたいんだ 皆には悪いが、ビーチでの話
target: Uh, you know, I want to take a moment to just, uh, apologize to all you guys about that stuff on the beach earlier.

source: 万事順調の様だが クリーンなら 疑念は払拭される
target: All I know is things will go better for you if you just came clean and got out in front of this thing.

source: 直ぐに行きますか それとも私に打たれますか？ 聞こえる様に 耳を叩きましょうか？
target: Now are you going to let me by or do I need to smack you on the ear to help with your hearing?

source: 暗号解読の専門家に 見てもらったけれど 悪戦苦闘して
target: I had one of the best cryptographers in the country take a look at it though he was mostly upside-down, as I recall.

source: それではもう君もわかっただろう それじゃどうして地球に？
target: and you didn't think the united states military might need to know that you're keeping a hostile alien robot frozen in the basement?

source: 心配性にもほどがある 医者が必要なのは彼女だ 俺たちに罪悪感を押し付ける
target: No, she is the one that needs to see a doctor, 'cause she always wants us to feel guilty or worried about something.

source: 記録によると... 君の捜査官は 私の指示に従わなかった ルーク・デンプシーを解放し
target: For the record your agent disobeyed a direct order of mine, released Luke Dempsey, and then attempted to apprehend the suspect without backup.

source: ルネの犯行を阻止すれば 彼の命も救える その上 西洋文明の崩壊も防げる
target: If we can find him and stop him, we will perhaps not only save his life but prevent the collapse of Western civilization.

source: これからが大変だろうが 聞きたい事があれば電話を 番号はハムさんに
target: I know you're going to be making some changes and if you or your family have any questions, Miss Ham's got my number.

source: 郊外在住の 平凡な主婦　とか― ＮＹの会社員　とか― アンブレラ社の兵士も
target: In one life she could be a suburban housewife, the next a businesswoman in New York, the next a soldier working for Umbrella.

source: ベニエを知らない人たちと 一緒だったけど きみは知ってるんだね - とても嬉しいよ
target: Oh, I would argue that a lot of people don't even know what beignets are, Spackman, but I will concede you that point.

source: 現場はマーキュリーラボの 厳重な研究室の中 それに何かを探してたと
target: The crime scene at Mercury Labs was on a floor with highly secured vaults, and the witness said he was looking for something.

source: 克服すべき課題もありますが 赤ん坊の様に 安全にする事を 約束致します
target: W-we still have a-a few kinks to work out but I can assure you this will be as safe as a baby lamb.

source: 息子なら財産を 相続できるからな 残された妻や子供も 養ってくれる
target: The son would inherit the estate, no part of which would be entailed away, so providing for my widow and any other children.

source: 奴が欲しがるほど　たいした量を 俺は持ってなかった だから　ストックトンにいる俺の知り合いの マジな奴らと連絡を取らせた
target: I didn't have the kind of quantity he wanted, so I put him in touch with some serious guys I knew in Stockton.

source: まるで誰かが　この部屋を ある一定のペースで歩き回って 無作為に売却済みであると
target: As if a single individual, walking at a relatively steady pace, circled the room, peeling off dots... randomly designating certain pieces as sold.

source: あなたを不具にできた 千ピースにスライスできた だが　あなたの魂が無傷なままなら
target: I could maim you, I could slice you up into a thousand pieces, but if your soul remains intact, what have I done?

source: 君は　僕がこれまで会った中で 最も強い人間のひとりだ でも　モリアティーのような意志と 精神を持つ者からすれば 弱いんだ
target: You are one of the strongest people I have ever met, but next to a will and a mind like Moriarty, you're weak.

source: 彼女はスパイじゃなくて 監視してる動きが私たちの利益になるって ことが知りたいだけなの
target: I just want to know if you think that she's onto us, if this little performance that we're watching is for our benefit.

source: 簡単な手書きのメモで 飲みたい物の隣に自分たちの名前を 走り書きしたコーヒーのオーダーだ
target: It's a simple, handwritten note, a scrawled coffee order with the names of the criminals written next to the drinks that they wanted.

source: 現金を失うかもとなれば お前は間違いなく 居ても立っても 居られなくなると思ったよ
target: I bet your greedy ass would be so worked up about the prospect of losing your cash that you wouldn't catch it.

source: ありがとう　私とても熱くなったわ、
target: Thank you, I don't know what I would have done if I had remained on those hot coals burning my pretty flesh.

source: これは言っておかないといけないと思うのだが 君にも同じことが起こっている
target: Now I would be derelict in my duty if I didn't point out that this might be exactly what's happening to you.

source: 僕の人生で最高の夜だった そして今は最高の眠りを
target: Best night of my entire life. And now I've got a suspicion I'm gonna have the best sleep of my entire life.

source: しかし、私のポッドは、コースを外れた。 そして、私はここに来た時点で 私のいとこは、すでに成長し そしてスーパーマンになっていた。
target: But my pod got knocked off-course and by the time I got here, my cousin had already grown up and become Superman.

source: バス停に向かって歩いていた別の子供が 突然　子供をさらって走り去った車を目撃 誘拐された子供は　コナー・フリント
target: Another kid was walking to the bus stop, and he saw a vehicle peeling out with our boy Conner Flint in it.

source: 例え我々が神話や伝説になろうとも それはアスガルドなのだ そして戦士が
target: And though we have fallen into man's myths and legends, it was Asgard and its warriors that brought peace to the universe.

source: 施設が没収していたためで 彼女が外に出る前に 誰かに電話したかどうかは わかりません
target: She didn't have a phone, because the rehab confiscated it, so now we don't know if she called anyone before sneaking out.

source: あなたのような星は数千とある 私たちに仕組まれたものだ 不老の為に欲しがる者へ供給する
target: There are thousands of planets like yours set up by families like mine to supply an ever increasing demand for more time.

source: それを皆さんが どう思ってるかは知らないけど 皆さんも同じような部分を持ってる
target: Hell, I don't know where they got the Luke part, but I can sure tell ya where they got the Drifter part.

source: 大失敗になるはずのパーティーを 楽しもうとして来たのよ ニックがすぐに彼女を 楽しませるわよ
target: Well, I think she was hoping to gloat over a party disaster, which, if I can count on Nick, won't take long.

source: しかし、ワシントンの連中は 天皇への復讐を望んでいる 何故なら米国の有権者が それを望んでいるからだ しかも、彼ら有権者は自分達にとって 何が良いのか分かっていない
target: But Washington wants vengeance on the Εmperor, because their voters do, and their voters have no fucking idea what's good for them.

source: つまり　あなたの双子は 安定剤を飲んで 無実の中国人女性を撃ったのね
target: So, your twin, all hopped up on cop tranquilizers, guns down an innocent Chinese lady holding a cell phone in her hand.

source: 現時点で実際には 道しるべ作戦とか諜報活動に 何の権限もないのよ？
target: Even though I don't actually have any authority over Signpost or, for that matter, any covert action at this time, do I?

source: 長い間 彼女を轢いた奴に 復讐したいと でも彼に言ったわ
target: Um... for a long time, he... he wanted to get revenge on the bastard who ran her over, but I told him,

source: スラム街と大都市の市民に 感染してる間に － 迅速な対応と隔離の結果 － 毎週の感染報告は 30％に落下しました
target: While citizens of inner cities and metropolitan areas remain hardest hit, through quick response and quarantine, weekly infections reports have dropped 30%.

source: 人から逃げる人生を やめにしたいんだ
target: But I've spent my life running away from people or pinning my hopes on somebody I can't have. I'm done with that.

source: 解放しようとしたが 鍵を渡せなかった
target: Freeing those slaves aboard the Empress would have finished the job, but I failed. I never made it back with the key.

source: 受賞作「漂う感情」は タイトルに"感情"と 入っているにもかかわらず 感情表現が 全く使われていません
target: Though the winning work, Drifting Emotions , has the word "emotions" in the title, there is no single emotional expression in it.

source: もし彼が解いたら　その証明法を秘密に しておくという条件で 彼の研究に資金提供をもちかけた
target: I offered to fund his work on the condition that if he did solve it, we would keep the proof under wraps.

source: シャンパンで僕に感謝の意を表したいのなら まず僕が酒を飲むかどうか確認すべきだと 思わないか？
target: You'd think if they wanted to thank me with champagne, they'd go to the trouble of finding out if I drink first.

source: 何言ってるか全然わからない いろんな事を隠してるね
target: I can sense your concern, the fear that you will lose the wealth and the power that the war has given you.

source: 私が求めてることは 公正な調査と公平な公聴会です そして、真実が疑いを越えて 実証されると信じます
target: All I ask for is an honest enquiry and a fair hearing and I believe the truth will be established beyond doubt.

source: お前が辞めて４年間 別の仕事をしたいと
target: I did another 4 years after you left, and I-- I guess the job just kind of ran its course with me.

source: 煙を起こして 彼らを誘導するの
target: Now this green stuff is gonna smoke like crazy, so as soon as you light it. Move on to the next fire.

source: 以前毎日弁当に 頼まれていただろ 多分好みはそんなに 変わってないと思ってね
target: It's what you used to ask for in your lunchbox every day, so I thought maybe your taste hasn't changed too much.

source: 君がいなくなるまで待って ロングアイランドに住むトニーだと言って 君の情報を集めるために　近づいた
target: I waited until you'd gone, then I approached, as Tony from Long Island, with the intention of steering the conversation towards you.

source: みんなは二階に誘導 あなたはそこに 指示を待って
target: Continue to direct the employees to the second floor and go there yourself until we know what we're dealing with here.

source: そこまで声を 張り上げるなよ
target: You know, I like a cheerleader just as much as the next guy, but maybe try a stage whisper next time.

source: 歩いて来る父を見て バレたと悟った
target: And I saw him coming toward me. And I knew that he knew. - The moment I saw him, I knew...

source: 欲しいもののためなら 何でもするだろう そして今はおれ達と同じものを欲しがってる
target: She'll do whatever it takes to get what she wants, and right now we just happen to want the same thing.

source: 昨日クジミーチ総督が 戦地からの 皇帝陛下の親書を 読み上げたんです
target: Yesterday at the meeting of the Imperial Council, our new governor-general, Sergei Kuzmich, was reading the Czar's rescript from the army.

source: 今すぐ始めるわ　将軍が少しでも 疑ったら私達は皆殺しよ
target: I'm going to get started right away. But if Krantz suspects any of this, he's going to hunt us both down.

source: 過去５０年間で 自動車産業は変わってきたので 自動車に使用する クロム合金組成物を
target: You see, over the last 50 years, right, the auto industry has changed the chrome alloy composition it uses on cars.

source: 爆弾騒ぎとは無関係だ 質問に答える義務はない
target: - My client had nothing to do with these threats against Patty Hewes, and frankly, he's not required to answer your questions.

source: 俺は母が望むようなオリバーじゃない 父にした約束はまもる
target: I can't be the Oliver my mother wants me to be and still keep the promise I made to my father.

source: ウソじゃない 弟が居る集団は 聞いた話以上かもな
target: But if she's not, this group with your brother at its core has done something you told me couldn't be done.

source: 年明けに出来上がってきて サンプルが それで修正して ギリギリ２月の展示会 間に合うかなって感じ
target: I'll finish them by the end of the year, and then I'll rework them and get them ready for the exhibition.

source: ええ　そう訊かれたから 質問したのに...
target: Yeah, you asked did I know what my problem was... and then you told a story, and I don't know what...

source: どの位の間、人々は 七つの王国の陰に隠れる？ 彼らの動かない王の 臆病な王の後ろに 高い塀の後ろに
target: How long do the people of the Seven Kingdoms stand behind their absentee King, their cowardly King hiding behind high walls?

source: 殺した後 それを飲み込むことが重要だ そうしないと　燃料電池が劣化して お前を見つけられなくなる
target: It's important that you swallow it only after the kill, or the fuel cell will degrade and we'll never find you.

source: もちろんよ ダーシーは 自分でも短気だと言ってたわ
target: Charlotte, how could it be otherwise? Every circumstance confirms it. And Mr. Darcy has boasted to me himself of his resentful...

source: 地下の燃料タンクまで行けるか？
target: Yeah, I've got three charges and a remote detonator. Do you think you can gain access to the underground fuel depot?

source: この動物園はフランス革命のときに 建てられたという 1000万ガロンが汲み上げられ いたる所を通ってる
target: Some people say the modern world was invented when the French built this sewers 10 million gallons pump through every hour

source: このテロリストによると― あなたが誰かに事情を 告げれば― その人も危険になる
target: And this terrorist said that if anyone else learned about what was going on, their lives would be in danger, too.

source: 僕には居なかった 従兄弟のマットだけ
target: I never had any of that. I mean, before this, I barely even hung out with Matt, and he's my cousin.

source: ブログやソーシャルメディアに 追いやられ 熱心な記者達は真実を得るために ますます創造的になる
target: In order to keep up with bloggers and social media, dedicated reporters have to be increasingly creative to get the truth.

source: 肺における流体増強を作る それは酸素欠乏 複数システム臓器不全に繋がる
target: It's a genetic defect that creates fluid build-up in the lungs, which leads to oxygen deprivation and multi system organ failure.

source: 老いた魔女は子供に ラプンツェルという名前をつけた 彼女は入口のない塔に隠され 閉じ込められています
target: The old enchantress had given the name Rapunzel to the child she had hidden away and locked in a doorless tower.

source: 両親を変える事はできない
target: You can't change who your parents are. The only thing you can change is how you choose to deal with that.

source: 見てくれ 苛立たせて済まない だが　我々の仕事は　どのように飛行機が ハドソン川の中に至ったかを調べることだ
target: Look, I'm sorry if you're frustrated, but our job is to investigate how a plane ended up in the Hudson River.

source: とても寂しくて― 耐えられません 祖母のいない生活なんて...
target: To say she will be missed just doesn't cut it because I can't even imagine a world without her in it.

source: 警察署前からです 青年が悲劇の 死を遂げました
target: I'm down here in front of the police department with the story of the tragic death of this local young man.

source: 非常に興味があるんだが キンランが命を取りとめたら どっちの話が本当だと言うかな？
target: And just-just out of curiosity, if Kinlan does pull through, whose version of events do you think he's gonna agree with?

source: お前がチャンスを逃したら シェイも悲しむぞ
target: If Shay gets wind that you screwed up this business opportunity 'cause of her, she will kick you in your nuts.

source: アイビスに一人行かせる 面談して何か分かるかやらせる
target: I'm gonna send one of my guys over to ibis's office and see if they can get some answers in person.

source: まちがってたら言ってくれ ドイツにある監視プログラムに関する 書類をすべて持っていかれた ように見える
target: Please tell me I'm wrong, but it looks like they got all the documentation on our surveillance program with the Germans.

source: 火を放った犯人は史上初めて インガ急流を乗り切った
target: Now I think the people that started that fire also became the first ever to navigate and survive the Inga Rapids.

source: ダンハムさん？ ナディム・パテルです ようこそ
target: You cannot imagine what it's like for a man like me to not have access to parts of his mind.

source: シャーロックの仕事を探求するあなたを 私は　いつも支持してきたわ でも　彼とあなたとの関係は　問題よ
target: You know I've always been supportive of your exploration of Sherlock's work, but your pattern with him has become troubling.

source: IPアドレスは一致した だがTTLの値には大きな 矛盾点がある ヘッダーも本物ではない
target: The IP addresses match, but there are big discrepancies in the TTL values, and the headers are failing to authenticate.

source: 奴はラングレーに居ると言いながら 運転手にはブルーモント公園で降りると
target: Brody just said he was still at Langley, but he told his driver to drop him off at Bluemont Park.

source: 本当に... 多分それは私が かつて無かったような、 新しい感覚を得たからなの
target: Yeah, because it seems like I'm having so many new feelings... that I don't think have ever been felt before.

source: 無いでしょうね、防衛大で僕らが 何となく考えた理論ですが toy with 考慮に入れる、または観測する 戦争ゲームでも上手く 行くことはありませんでした
target: It was just a theory we toyed with in war college, but it never used to work during war games.

source: この携帯を持って ビルに渡してくれ うまくいけば オヤジが説得してくれる
target: Now I need you to bring this phone to Bill and hopefully his father can talk some sense into him.

source: 気に入らないなら 別の保険会社を 探せばいいじゃないか
target: All right, look, if this is so important to you, why don't you look for another insurance company, you know?

source: 運も興味もあれば 分解技術で家に帰るのも 可能かも
target: If we're lucky, and if you're interested, we might even be able to reverse engineer a way home for you.

source: ああ　ヤツの報告書を書いて 届けたからな することがたくさんあって
target: Well, you know, I had to bring him in, you know, file the report. There was a lot going on.

source: 君に任せるとでも思ったか？ 無抵抗でスティーブ・ジョブズに なれるとでも？
target: Alec, did you really think they were gonna let you march in here and play Steve Jobs without a fight?

source: だから仕事に戻り − 友人たちに ライサに恋に落ちたと話した
target: So now I have to go back to work, and tell all my friends that I'm in love with Raisa.

source: あのね そもそも私がこの ふざけた町にきた理由は 家族の情報を掴むためよ
target: The whole reason I came to this stupid town in the first place was to learn more about my family.

source: 白楢の木で 父は杭を作った 私達から奪うために 全員の...
target: A white oak stake fashioned by my father to take from us the very thing he forced upon us all...

source: 純粋な生き物を殺し― その血が唇に触れた瞬間から その者は呪われる
target: For you have slain something so pure that the moment the blood touches your lips, you will have a half-life.

source: きっと将来　この話をする時 その部分だけ省略しそうだから言ってるんだ
target: No, I'm just saying, if you tell that story in the future, you might want to leave that part out.

source: 下院議員を一人ずつ 品評しましょう
target: Well, let's go through all the sitting Congressmen one by one, and see if anybody sticks out from the crowd.

source: 今夜はふかふかのベッドで寝て お前が作ったのではない 温かい食べ物を食べる
target: I think we can treat ourselves to a featherbed for the night and a hot meal not cooked by you.

source: "フォックス劇場前から生中継です" "アトランタのミッドタウンで 厳重監禁行われています" "別の場所でウィルス感染が 発生しました"
target: We're live outside the Fox Theater in mid-town Atlanta, which is now on lockdown, following reports of another virus outbreak.

source: ぼくに何か起きれば 彼女は殺し続ける きみたちには　犯人がわからない
target: And if anything happens to me, she'll keep doing what she's doing, and you'll never find out who she is.

source: 自分の家の目の前で 宝探しをされたら どう思う？
target: And how's he gonna feel when we're hauling treasure up out of the water in front of his beach house?

source: ミンチにされたくないなら 行かなきゃいけないでしょ！
target: I don't want to be torn to pieces, and I'm sure if you really think about it, neither do you.

source: ええと、これはフォードが製造し、 キャロル・シェルビーが再構築した車です アメリカ史上、もっとも優れた パフォーマンスカービルダーです。
target: Well, this one was built by Ford and reimagined by Carroll Shelby, the greatest performance car builder in American history.

source: 彼らが知らないのは　ラッキーだ もし知っていたら 彼らがFBIにウソを つかなきゃならないだろう？
target: Well, it's lucky that they don't know, 'cause if they knew, they'd have to lie to the FBI, wouldn't they?

source: 人事部の人的要因が 警備上の弱点だ
target: - Thank you. - What I'm saying is that the human element of human resources is our biggest point of vulnerability.

source: 血液を知るって最高よ 色や形やにおいとか
target: It's amazing what you can learn from blood, even before it's analyzed. I mean, the color, the texture, the smell.

source: 罪を償わせるには 払えないほどの額でないと
target: If you want to send a message to this man, he has to pay a price that he can't afford.

source: 4人いるみたいで 気持ち悪かった
target: Well, I did once, but I was wasted, which was creepy because it was like there was four of them.

source: 私達は、この世界で 死に対して麻痺しています
target: By now, we are all so used to death, as we have seen everyone in the world around us die.

source: 宿題でもやってろ
target: Ma'am, I know you've done your homework, and so you know that money isn't a big part of my life.

source: 平穏な人生では いられなくなった 彼らが家であり 家族だとは思えない
target: I see a person who's never been at peace, who doesn't think that they deserve a home or a family.

source: ワイリーの力が必要になる 階下のロビーに検査所を設置しよう なぜ？
target: I'm gonna need some help from Wylie, and we need to set up a security station downstairs in the lobby.

source: 今度は公開投票にしよう みんなの立場を知りたい
target: - I think we ought to have an open ballot. Call out our votes, you know? Let's see who stands where.

source: ガレージを頼む サイドルームの電気が 消えているか確認だ
target: Why don't you just go over to the garage and make sure the lights are off in the side room?

source: 映画ではそんな男が 黄色のポルシェを買ったり 変な行動を起こすの ...でも僕はちがう
target: In the movies it's always men having them and buying ridiculous yellow Porsches but, you know, I'm not a man.

source: ‐他に方法がないからさ 彼女は歩き回っていた、 射殺された後― 9ミリのホローポイントで― （対人殺傷用の弾丸）
target: 'Cause there's no other way she could be walking around after being shot dead-on with a nine-millimeter hollow point.

source: 彼らはまだ生きてるの？ 彼らは刑務所の中に集まって 兵器を壊す策略を練っているに違いない
target: They must be in that jail gathering intelligence, hatching a plot to use their awesomeness to defeat the weapon!

source: ＢとＣで ８と６と５６でもある
target: To them, maybe this is a B and a C and an eight and a six and a 56...

source: ロードさんと一緒に乗客を後部車両に 移動させて頂戴
target: I need you and Mr. Lord to get all of these passengers to the very back of the train.

source: 検討し明朝10時までに 書面で回答する 翌朝グルボーカヤ村
target: The Don government will consider the Revolutionary Committee's proposal and give its answer in writing by 10 a.m. tomorrow.

source: 私ともう1人で 行けるかも知れない 運がよければ
target: I might be able to get myself and one other person outside the blast zone, if we are lucky.

source: すまない まだ始めてもねえんだ 君に見て欲しくない 悪夢を見ることになる
target: I'm sorry, kid, but I haven't even started with this creep, and I don't want you watching the rest.

source: 彼らを送ったら 恋人も同僚も辞める
target: After I drop them off, I'm done. I am no longer your girlfriend. I no longer work for you.

source: ビングリーさんじゃない 初めて会う人物でな
target: It is not Mr. Bingley. It is a person I never saw in the whole course of my life.

source: そういえばマリーを 病院送りにするって？
target: And I believe, Hank, that that was around the time that we took Aunt Marie to the insane asylum.

source: "前置詞で文を 終えない地方よ"と答える
target: Girl from Connecticut says, "We're from a place "where we know not to end a sentence with a preposition."

source: どっちかな もし大役を得られたとしたら 君は... 英雄の役かな
target: I wonder... if you did take on that bigger role for yourself, would you have been the hero orthevillain?

source: 金はジェシーのために 私が預かっているだけだ
target: For your information, I am holding Jesse's money for him and he will receive every last dollar of it.

source: 俺のほうは、パナマ政府と 送還してくれるための準備に 時間は必要だが ここに来させられた。
target: Well, I needed some time to finalize our agreement with the Panamanians, but instead I get dragged down here.

source: 正確な日付を　思い出せないのが残念です この手紙で お祝いさせて下さい
target: I'm sorry I can't remember the exact dates but I hope this card will take care of them all.

source: その調子で頼んだわよ 戻ってきた時に 失望しないように あなたを解雇する必要もないわ
target: I hope that it continues and I'm not disappointed on my return and I don't have to dismiss you.

source: あの女性に対するあなたの関心事は 知りたくないですね CIAにあなたを 引き渡そうとしたんですから
target: Not that I don't share your concern for the woman who tried to hand you over to the CIA--

source: あんたの考えでは サンバナディーノくらいまで行って...
target: So your idea was to drive the car a little way maybe into San Bernardino and then leave it.

source: すぐに我が主が 日本中を支配する... 貴女は死を賜るのよ 父親のようにね
target: Soon my lord will be ruler of all Japan and you can take your life like your father did.

source: それから私が偽の 通貨取引報告を手配する
target: There you have it. I'll generate false Currency Transaction Reports out the wazoo as well as the necessary W-2Gs.

source: 少し外の空気をと 外に出ようとしたら―
target: Are you okay? I was gonna take her out for some air, and bumped into the thing, and I...

source: 今の心境は 困難だろうけど... "カミナリ マ〇コ"とかの表現は 遠慮してくれる？
target: I know you're probably feeling a lot of emotion right now... but please refrain from using the term "thundercunt."

source: 我が家とは 違ってた 招待客200人の パーティが開催中で― 俺のベッドに タキシードが置いてある
target: Haas family holiday bloodletting, there were 200 people at my house and a tux laid out on my bed.

source: 花？
target: The flower shop nearest your office, uh, sells a dozen red roses for a very reasonable price of $127.68.

source: 私はついに　お前の実績に見合う報奨を 与えることに決めた
target: I finally found a suitable reward for the services you've provided over and above what might be considered reasonable.

source: 俺が死んだら 皆が困る あんたは捕まるぞ
target: If I get dead, a lot of people are gonna be very upset and they're gonna come get you.

source: （YOU）テラスハウスは 見ず知らずの男女６人が
target: Terrace House is a show about six strangers, men and women, 6 STRANGERS, MEN AND WOMEN, SHARE A HOUSE.

source: 客にされたことの記憶が 残っていれば 大惨事ね
target: Can you imagine how fucked we'd be if these poor assholes ever remembered what the guests do to them?

source: "どんな食事が好きか聞いておいて お肉が余ってるのよ"
target: I was wondering if she wanted anything special for lunch. 'Cause these days lots of people don't eat meat.

source: 去年お２人が女の子を救出してからずっと 数々の実績に注目してきました
target: Uh, well, I-I've kind of been following your careers ever since you guys rescued that little girl last year.

source: 現在56歳 パリ在住 変な趣味があるようだ
target: Now, Maurice here is 56 years old, living right here in Paris, and he has a very unusual pastime.

source: エレベーターに乗りました 誰かが後ろに来て... 私を抱え込み...
target: I was getting into the elevator when somebody came up behind me, grabbed me, put something over my mouth.

source: ちゃちな映画みたいに 考えてるんじゃないのか？
target: How did you think this was going to end, that little movie you've got going on in your head?

source: その機械は、貴男の怪物に エネルギーを供給する・・ 怪物が、目的を遂げるのに 必要な量を無限にだ
target: That machine is going to supply your monster... . ..with whatever amount of power it requires to reach us.

source: 人間中心の自覚の到来を示す時代
target: An era that will witness the advent of a human-centric consciousness... that will place our world before all others.

source: 部長になりたければ 契約を取ってこい
target: If you want to be considered for the role then get out there and sign me some fucking orders!

source: 犯行日時は不明ですが― 押し入った形跡はない
target: We haven't been able to establish a date or time, but there is no sign of breaking or entering.

source: でも その女性にとっては 恐ろしい一夜に
target: In getting her where he wants to get her, but I think that she's gonna have a horrible time.

source: ウィンステッドさんが "発作を引き起こした" とは言えません でも除外することは できませんでした
target: We could not say definitively that Ms. Winstead caused the seizure, but we certainly couldn't rule it out either.

source: 分からんが容器1つでも小さな町に対しては 十分な病原体の量だ
target: I don't know, but there's enough prion variant in one of those canisters to take out a small city.

source: アイダホからテキサスまでの ドライブ・インでの食事だ
target: Except we do have 200 hours of cloud sunsets... and us going to every drive-through from Idaho to Texas.

source: それが何で お仕置きになるか決して分からなかった
target: And we never knew why that was going to be a punishment to get to live away from him.

source: 犯罪は恥だという 意味合いも
target: In some cultures, crimes and guilt are made manifest, so that everyone can see them and see their shame.

source: これはわかっていただきたい ルート･アイリッシュは 世界一危険な場所です
target: I think it's important that you all understand that Route Irish is the most dangerous road in the world.

source: お前がマネージャーを兼ねろよ 歌手の取り分は？
target: - If you want to... assume more of the financial responsibility, I'd be glad. How much for the singer? 20%.

source: 何もしない方が 損失は少ない
target: If we have to take a loss that big... we might as well shut down now and save expenses.

source: テレビの差し押さえに来て そのままウチに...
target: All I know is, one day he came to take the TV away, and ended up staying for dinner.

source: その後 南米の 店を任される事に
target: Busted my ass, but ended up comptroller of a billion dollar pipeline in the rectum of the Third World.

source: 今週、３回目　同じホテル 同じカーボーイ・ハット
target: - Listen, it's the third time this week, I'm showing up in the same hotel, with the same cowboy hat.

source: 仲間割れしてたら "家族"になれない
target: Jason, if we don't trust each other, How is he ever gonna trust us? This ain't a game, woman.

source: 彼がやりたいなら それでいい 君と私とテディ以外は外出してる
target: Well, if that's what he wants to do, that's his right, but you and me and Teddy, we're out.

source: ジョンの行動は意図的ではないし むしろ協力的だ
target: I don't think what John is doing is a strategy, on the contrary I think he's trying to cooperate.

source: ぼくの中はとっくに超平穏なんだけど ぼくに必要なことは これをちょいと動かすことだな
target: My innards are already super, super peaceful, so all I need to do is just get this thing going.

source: 約束するなら、デズ あの島へ２度と戻らないと 約束して
target: If you're gonna promise me something, Des, can you promise me you'll never go back to that island again?

source: 家に隠す ジェイソンはいつも負けてた いつも同じ場所を選んだから
target: Then we'd hide it in the house, except Jason would always lose because he always chose the same place.

source: わからないだろ 施設の場所は知ってる でも施設の内部は わからないだろ
target: You don't know-- you know where the compound is, but you don't know where to go once you're there.

source: いや　君がモルヒネを盗んでいた患者達が 痛みに苛まれて　それを必要としてるのとは わけが違う
target: No, it's not like the patients that you're stealing it from need it to deal with their excruciating pain.

source: 魔法省を我が物にせんと 企んでいたのです！
target: We saw your lies for what they were: A smokescreen for your bid to seize control of the Ministry.

source: ええ　毎週テロ対策の ブリーフィングをしてます 意外な場所で 愛が湧き出るんだね
target: She does a weekly antiterrorism briefing for top brass, including Raymond. Love springs up in the unlikeliest of places.

source: 〈君のドバイ報告書に 感謝してる〉
target: *** we never had this conversation, but I wanted to thank you personally for your work on the dubai report.

source: 5人のうち3名は 眠った状態で乗船―― もっと言うならば 冬眠状態にあります
target: Three of the five men were put aboard asleep or to be more precise, in a state of hibernation.

source: それに 私は あなたの上官 いやなら あなた絶対 地獄に堕ちるわよ
target: And since I am the ranking officer if you don't like it, I believe you can go to hell.

source: 単純な質問よ 法知識の披瀝を求めてはいませんよ
target: It was just a simple question, not a cue for you to recite your vast knowledge of code law.

source: 沿岸警備隊が捜索してるが 難破船や死体は無い
target: We've got the coast guard out there, looking for signs of a wreck or a body, but nothing yet.

source: 突然 君達の後ろから 足音が聞こえるだろう
target: And then suddenly, you'll hear the scrape of a footstep behind you, but before you can even turn around,

source: 引き出しを開けて 死体を持っていく
target: Well, let's just, uh, you know, open a drawer, pick a bod, and get the hell out of here.

source: 親父ができることは予測できても その子供の行動は予測できないだろ
target: 'Cause you may think you know what he's capable of, but you have no idea what I'm capable of.

source: こんな美人を撃つなんて まるで狂犬だな
target: Man had to be a mad dog to shoot a goddamned good looking gal like that in the head.

source: この３人の容疑者は アーチー・ブルームの命を奪った炎に 火をつけさせたことに対して 等しく罪がある
target: All three of these suspects are equally guilty for lighting the flames that took the life of Archie Bloom.

source: - ジュリアーニ氏　絶対に無理です 警備員が この仕事を成功させたから
target: - Mr. Giuliani, there's no way in hell that that greaseball guard could pull off this job on his own.

source: 働けるかどうか　自信がない 仕事の携帯電話を持つのを拒否した
target: But I'm not sure I can work with somebody who refuses to carry a cell phone off the job.

source: あなたに 秘密の 場所があったなんて
target: I imagined that brilliant people disappeared to some secret place where good ideas floated around like leaves in autumn.

source: 透視能力者が見れないのは、 その後 起こったことだ・・・ 彼らが あなたを死から生還させた方法。
target: What the Clairvoyant can't see is what happened after ... how they brought you back from the dead.

source: 僕達が金庫に入って 他に 何を盗んだかしつこく聞いてた
target: She was terrified when she thought we'd been in there. She kept asking you what else we'd taken.

source: 私みたいなカワィィ子を あんたみたいなのが困らせる
target: It's men like you that make the world a rough place to live for beautiful girls like me.

source: 自分に自身がなくて そのせいで 他の奴に八つ当たりしちまったんだ
target: I had a lot of self-doubt, and it manifested itself in the form of unchecked rage and aggression.

source: "絶滅した"サメとは 闘えない
target: The very fact that something is extinct, would mean that you wouldn't be able to wrestle with it.

source: ずっと考えていたのよ 悪魔がどうやってここの 聖なる彫像の間を 自由に動き回れるのか？
target: I've been asking myself how is it the Devil can move so freely here among the sacred icons?

source: 君も分かると思うが 俺の限られた経験では 女性は少し敏感な傾向がある
target: You know, in my... admittedly limited experience, women... tend to be a bit touchy about accidentally marrying homosexuals.

source: 私をおびき出す為に 君が汚職警官に金を払ったんだ
target: You were willing to pay corrupt police officers to target an innocent woman just to draw me out.

source: 金色が一番重要なの これをやらなきゃ意味無いわ
target: But gold is the most important one. There's no point in doing it if you skip the gold.

source: ケン会議で これを公開するんだ
target: I wanted it to be a surprise, Adele. That's why I was unveiling it at the KEN Conference.

source: ライアンを 疑いたくないだろうが― 彼は今まで 君に嘘をつき続けた
target: I know that you care for Ryan, but he built his entire relationship with you on a lie.

source: まだ 何か隠してる
target: - Yeah, he does, it looks that way. But I think he's got something up his sleeve for you.

source: 心から敬服しますな ご主人の仕事に 興味をお持ちとは
target: I admire this very much when the little woman takes a keen interest in her husband's business affairs.

source: 間違いかと思ったら 選曲係が好きだからだったんだ
target: I remember, the first time we thought it was ironic then we realized he just liked the song.

source: これについては 国際魔法協力部の バーテミウス・クラウチ氏から 説明していただこう
target: To explain all this we have the head of the Department of International Magical Cooperation Mr. Bartemius Crouch.

source: ソーニャが シャドーネットで探しているが... 出来る事が限られる
target: Sonya's already looking for her through Shadownet, but there's only so much we can do from a desk.

source: でもそこには 小さな穴が空いてて てんとう虫が 飛んできたの
target: But there is this uh... a little hole in the trunk and one time a ladybug flew in.

source: あれ以来 思い込みは消えて 憧れの対象は男になった
target: Now i masturbate to a picture of freddie prinze, jr... and i'm quite certain of my sexual preference.

source: 刑務所長と話していく。 でもまず除法、話していけ
target: I'll talk to the warden and see what I can do... right after you give me some answers.

source: 微生物で発電し 同時に水をクリーンにする 未来技術です
target: I mean, to create electricity and clean water simultaneously using microbial fuel cells, this could be the future.

source: ここは炭鉱労働者のストに 賛同する町だったが
target: I remember when this was a working-class town that would have found common cause with the striking miners.

source: 始めてまだ３時間だし 食事は２回した
target: I would say... That we've only been working for three hours, and we've already taken two food breaks.

source: 会見前に　会っておきましょう
target: And we may want to wheel the old man in here for a minute to press the flesh.

source: アーチェリーは学園の 必須科目なので... あなた達誰でも 出来るはずですね
target: Since archery is a standard requirement at our school any of you should be able to do it.

source: 助手が不在なので 会社に戻るのでは？
target: [Ga-in] He hasn't hired a new sous-chef yet which may be a sign he's starting to come around.

source: レムは　君が 人の目をじっと見るのを恐れるような 男であって欲しくないんじゃないか
target: I know Lem would never want you to be afraid to look another man in the eye, right?

source: だがイージス艦司令部は言った 彼女の遺伝子が確認されると 俺たちをオロウスに連れて行く
target: But Aegis command said once her geneprint is verified, they'll get an injunction to take us to Orous.

source: The science at work here is very advanced, with every indication that it's been going on for years.
target: The science at work here is very advanced, with every indication that it's been going on for years.

source: 俺に2日だけくれないか そしたら出発できる
target: I need you. A couple of days, Rachel. Just give me a couple of days and we'll leave.

source: この谷の事を ラジオで聞いたわ ココはそんなに悪くはないと 思った
target: We heard a radio broadcast out of this valley and thought that maybe things weren't so bad here.

source: それと　女性の話を聞く事 これが　いつでもどこでも どの女性にも売れる理由だ
target: And I also listen to women, and that's why I can sell myself to any woman, anywhere, anytime.

source: もしこの船がコンピュータ制御なら しなければならないのは OFFスイッチを見つけることだ
target: How's that? If this ship's run by computer, what we need to do is find the "off" switch.

source: 施設と人員に対し 調査を必要とします
target: Never seen that many bodies in one place before. We need unrestricted access to your facility and personnel.

source: それに人前に出たら バカをさらすわ
target: I don't wanna get up in front of all those people. - Make a fool out of myself.

source: 未だ生きたとしたら、 年齢差が問題だと思う
target: I don't suppose it's any consolation, but if she were still alive, the age difference would be insurmountable.

source: 医療関係に転売できる カミさんに聞いた
target: No, resale of medical devices is a big business, man. I'm married to someone in the medical field.

source: そっちのモチーフで スッキリ見せるのも いいかと思うの
target: But I think going with a clean look with just the motif on that side could work too.

source: お前にもたくさんの. 家族がいることも知っている。 お前がもうちょっと協力してくれるならば.
target: You know there's a lot of families out there that would rest easier if you would just cooperate.

source: ここで家を買ったらバカみるわ　ホント
target: Buying real estate in a college town is a pain in the ass. Take my word for it.

source: Now, for as long as you can remember, we have been attacked and eaten by the dreaded Foosa.
target: Now, for as long as you can remember, we have been attacked and eaten by the dreaded Foosa.

source: 糸電話だよ コップを使って...
target: - It's a cup phone. See? You put your ear in that, and I put my mouth in that.

source: 「毎日 祈ってる」 「君はアイサの死に誓った」
target: I pray every day that you never lose sight of what you committed to do in Issa's name.

source: 普通じゃないわ 艦隊を星系の半分に展開してるのよ... パイロットを探す為にね
target: Might be a little tricky with the fleet scattered over half this system... looking for the lost pilot.

source: もし他にも悪魔の活動の 情報が入ったら 連絡をくれ
target: Listen, you, uh, if you catch wind of any other demon activity, give me a holler, all right?

source: アナキンを離して、今行かなきゃ
target: I know this is hard, Ahsoka, but Anakin has to stay behind, and we have to go now.

source: コソコソしてるのはドラコと母親か？
target: Is it me, or do Draco and Mummy look like two people who don't want to be followed?

source: お話の途中すみません、 サットンさん あなたの信用性に傷がつく 心配はしませんか？
target: Excuse me for interrupting, Ms. Sutton, but are you at all worried about the damage to your credibility?

source: 愛する人でも 噛まれる可能性は高いの
target: And the more you love them, the more likely they are to just bite it unexpectedly it seems.

source: 気分が良いんです 自分が他人の役に立てると 知る事は
target: I feel good in my human experience to know that I can contribute to the good of others.

source: 君は私より 有能なＮＹ市警だ
target: You're NYPD. So was I, and you look as if you were a better officer than I was.

source: しかし、断固たる当局の暴動の鎮圧の 試みにもかかわらず 学生達の活動により 敏速に国民の支持を得ています
target: Despite the authorities' determination to crush the uprising , it seems that students receive a growing popular support.

source: おかしな事は何もなかった でも、これを見つけた- カーサービスの 保留中の料金
target: Nothing there out of the ordinary, but I did find this-- a pending charge for a car service.

source: 夢日記にでも書いて 鍵をして... 枕の下にでも...
target: You write it in your dream journal, you lock it up, and you put it under your pillow.

source: 普通の怒れる少女がどう転んで 彼等の聖戦に加わったのか
target: I don't know how you went from one more angry teenage girl to joining the fucking jihadists.

source: これまでにした 標準化されたテストよ 医療会を除いて あなたは裏切った
target: Every standardized test you ever took averaged together, not including your medical boards, which you cheated on.

source: 弱った姿を 見せたくなかったのよ
target: I think he didn't want me to see him that way. He didn't want to be vulnerable.

source: 今回 恋愛関係とかも そうですけど 人間関係の難しさみたいなの 結構あるんですね 何か
target: This time, we see not only the romantic relationships, but also the complexity of the human relationships.

source: 愛する２人の間で 選択することは... 最も難しいジレンマだ
target: Making a choice between two people you love, that is the hardest dilemma you will ever face.

source: お会計もされ 若い女性と 6時頃 発ちました
target: They left around six this morning. The young lady was with him. Everything has been paid for.

source: 数百年 ロードを追い 妨害を続けてる
target: For hundreds of years, they've been chasing the overlords, trying to liberate planets they've tried to destroy.

source: このオフィスに入って行った男が レン・ポンテコーヴァを 監視してたのは　わかってるんだ　ビル
target: Well, Bill, we know that the man who just walked into this office was surveilling Len Pontecorvo.

source: しかし、私の愛する出発した父 私を停止したことがない。
target: We're not supposed to get too close to them... but my dear departed father never stopped me.

source: 注意してくれ これより先、ちょっとした ストップ・アンド・ゴー渋滞だ
target: Just wanted to give you a heads-up and tell you about a little stop-and-go traffic up ahead.

source: かつてエレンはこの男の 最悪の本能を刺激して 彼を自己破壊傾向にしてしまった
target: Ellen used to encourage the worst instincts in this guy, bring out this self-destructive streak in him.

source: 一昨日の夜 あなたは バーで 酔っ払っている姿を 複数の者に 目撃されている
target: According to various witnesses, you were seen drunk two nights ago in a tavern near the harbour.

source: 買っただろ 死ぬ前 一緒だったな
target: Bought by a guy dressed as a Creaver who was seen with the victim before she died.

source: それからわざと彼自身の車を爆破した モリスが彼を殺そうとしたように
target: Then he blew up his own car to make it look like Morris tried to kill him.

source: さて、まず第一に、私 ただあなたを確保したい 我々は、これらのアル· Haraziを取る 非常に真剣にテープ。
target: Well, first of all, I just want to assure you we take these Al-Harazi tapes very seriously.

source: むしろ　それは単にー 飛行機から別の飛行機に 乗り換えるようなものだ
target: On the contrary, it was simply a migration from your plane of existence to the one adjacent.

source: ランディが　ぶり返しと闘ってる 彼を集会に連れて行くよ
target: Randy is fighting off the urge to relapse, so I'm leaving to accompany him to a meeting.

source: 進め　止まるな　ビイート 熱いぞ ビイート
target: Don't stop, don't stop don't stop the beat I can't stop, can't stop can't stop the beat

source: 分からない このルートは初めてなんだ
target: I don't know. I'm not sure, I never really come this way, but we're close, we're close.

source: 面白くないと思ってるみんなも 聞きなさい。 テスト範囲ね。
target: Those of you who don't find it fascinating... you better listen up, because it's on the final.

source: 「すべての者は平等」ではなく 「法の下ではみな平等」なのだ ちがう！
target: I don't hold with equality in all things, only with equality before the law. Nothing more. That's...

source: ホッケーマスクの男が 出なければ平気だ
target: It's your birthday. As long as no one jumps out in a hockey mask, I'll be fine.

source: 息子は戦ってる 国民の前でさらし者にはしないわ
target: He's fighting an uphill battle. I'm not gonna put him at the center of the national spotlight.

source: ライブが始まれば 5分で場所が分かる
target: As soon as they go live, we can isolate the origin of the broadcast within five minutes.

source: シンガポールの家庭は 子どもの教育を重視する 教育熱心なんだ
target: In Singapore the families actually put a lot of stress on us in terms of our education.

source: うちの両親が私を探しに来たら トイレだって言っといて
target: If my mum and dad ask where I am, just say I've gone to the loo, OK?

source: - もちろん、このテストは全く関係ないのよ "物質D"の中毒特性とはね ですが・・・
target: Of course, these tests in no way pertain to the addictive properties of Substance D, but to...

source: ご存知の通り イーホームは 初心者ではありません
target: I want to point out right now that EHOME, they are not noobs (new to the game).

source: あなたの場合は― 感情の波のような音が 聞こえてくるの
target: With you, sometimes there's words, but other times I just get these sounds like waves of emotions.

source: ナタリーと同じ時間帯に働いていた 他のカウンセラーの話を聞いてみて
target: Head to the youth facility and talk to the other counselors that were working on Natalie's shifts.

source: - 家族同志知り合いです だからクラウツを心配してました
target: We started at officer school together and I know his family, so I was worried about Claus.

source: "プラザでこれを最後に" が 奴が俺と話す事だって？
target: This whole "once and for all in the plaza" thing is so he can talk to me?

source: 僕が死んで 息子が生まれたら 父上のもとで 育ててください
target: If I am killed and if I have a son, would you keep him here with you?

source: 僕が社交パーティに出席ても 誰も話しかけない
target: That's why, if you ever see me at a social event, no one's ever talking to me.

source: 告白するが 俺はゾンビ恐怖症で閉所恐怖症だ
target: Did I mention that the one thing I have a phobia of aside from zombies is elevators.

source: 唯一の経験は 麻薬と遭遇したこと ポットブラウニーで 1年生の時 - 間違えて
target: My only experience with drugs was an encounter with a pot brownie my freshman year-- by mistake.

source: 車をジャッキで起して 猛スピードで走れたのよ
target: Man could jack a car a dozen ways, then drive away like a bat out of hell.

source: 教育改革の余波を感じたか？ 私はいませんでした
target: I had to make a trip to California to meet the Provost of Stanford, for my son.

source: 絞殺の痕、性器への打撃... 被害者は死ぬ前に拷問されてた？
target: Plus the strangulation and the repeated Strikes to the genitals... The victim was tortured prior to death.

source: 警部、これを破壊しても デッドマン・スイッチは機能します
target: Now, Captain, if we can destroy that, then the dead man's switch is just another fucking switch.

source: あなたの良い心が 全てなくなるまで、 あなたは、数マイルも 真っ黒な空間を見つめ続けた。
target: I think you stared into miles of pitch black space until everything good inside of you died.

source: 彼はシチューに馬を 入れたのを知って 会社に公開すると脅した
target: He knew someone was putting horse meat in the stew and was threatening to expose the company.

source: ロウブルス麻薬カルテルに関連した虐殺事件と あなたを結びつけるものは　何も無い
target: We are unable to link them to either the mass killings associated with the Robles narcotics cartel.

source: 平和で健全な文明が待っています。 新しい方法への道を通れるようにするのは、私達です。
target: To set off in this new direction, it's up to you and me to clear that road.

source: オモチャとか服とか どうでもいい物ばかり
target: I always get a lot of stupid toys or a bicycle or clothes or something like that.

source: むしろ　それは単にー 飛行機から別の飛行機に 乗り換えるようなものだ
target: On the contrary, it was simply a migration from your plane of existence to the one adjacent.

source: 偶然か　それとも 意図的に心臓を破壊したのか
target: Now, do we think that this was by chance, or was the obliteration of the heart intentional?

source: 知りすぎると　君のように 危険なことになる
target: - I do. If I know too much I endanger my own existence just as you've endangered yours.

source: いい？ 取っておきの曲は まだ出さないのよ 私達の魔力が完全に戻るまでね
target: Remember, girls, we want to save the good stuff for when our full power has been restored.

source: 自然に忠実で 下心のない仲間だ ・・愛と失うことも知っている
target: Mates who are loyal by nature, not design and who know the meaning of love and loss.

source: すぐに新しいグラスを
target: - And among those we care about most... are our young men and women in the armed forces.

source: こうしろとか ああしろとか 殺すぞとか 命令ばっか
target: You're all like "do this", "do that", "get in the car cuz someone's trying to kill you."

source: 毎日 国境を越えて 人が誘拐され... 殺されたり それを称賛されたりする
target: Every day across that border, people are kidnapped or killed by his hand or with his blessing.

source: ジョーにjpgの画像を 送って欲しいんだ
target: I need you to take a jp-g on your smartphone and then mail that to Jo's computer.

source: 俺は、いつも あんた達の事を見てる 彼女、最近変だぞ
target: You know, I used to see what she saw in you, but now I'm starting to wonder.

source: もし薬をやっていたら 彼女は単独では 持たないでしょう
target: And that if she did have drugs in her system, that she wouldn't have done them alone.

source: 君らアイルランド人が 腰布姿のころ... 侍は熟達した戦士だった
target: When the Irish were comporting themselves in loincloths these chaps were the most sophisticated warriors on Earth.

source: 隠し口座を見つけた それはあなたの奥さんの配下の 高官たちにつながるものだった
target: He uncovered other blind accounts, accounts that were traced to a senior member of your wife's administration.

source: ホッケー道具で 母を殴り始めて 僕はそれを掴んで 父に向った
target: Then he started hitting her with my hockey stick, and I grabbed it and fought him off.

source: 1時間半以上駐車場に いましたね
target: Where you sat in the parking lot for over half an hour before deciding to leave again.

source: わかったわよ、あの日にジムにいったらね
target: Okay, yeah, I needed a condom. Because, I don't know, that day I went to the gym.

source: 断れるたぐいの話じゃなかったが それこそまさに　私の望むところだ
target: It was not an offer one could decline, and yet that's precisely what I intended to do.

source: 来たら私がでないと なにかあったんじゃないかと思われる
target: And, if she shows up, and I don't answer the door, she's going to know something's wrong.

source: - もう一度彼に話してください... - いいえ,違いはありません。
target: Talk to him again so I can try to get him to tell us what he did.

source: 分からない、CIAの無線ばかり 調べてたから
target: I've been trying to narrow down a signal spectrum the CIA might use. Tap the U.S. consulate.

source: ここで一緒に
target: I'm gonna let you go now, and you're going to sit down and have breakfast with me.

source: ある日突然　顔を引き剥がして 下からトカゲの顔した宇宙人が 出てきそう・・・
target: Like one day they might pull their faces off, and there'd be alien lizards underneath, you know?

source: おいクソババア　妻に謝れ！
target: I don't know who you think you are, but I'd like you to apologise to my wife.

source: ドッキング ステーションまで ほんの2分ほどの飛行で到着します
target: It's like an amusement park. The hop to the main docking station will only take two minutes.

source: 俺は現場監督なんだ それで こいつは手造りなんだよ
target: I'm a construction manager, and I built this little slice of heaven with my own two hands.

source: 助手の話を忘れてたと言うのは 重大な欠落ね
target: Failing to mention your involvement with Professor Ames closest assistant is a pretty serious omission of fact.

source: それだ　その痛みを遮断することで 彼の潜在意識が
target: There you go. His subconscious mind is protecting itself from further trauma by blocking out that pain.

source: 個人的に仕事の同僚を 家族のように感じていた そして私は死んだんだ
target: But personally, I feel more like the people I worked with were my family and I died.

source: 酒を取ってくれ 賭けはやらん
target: I will drink it up. Bring me a bottle of rum! I'll do it even without betting.

source: 脅しても無駄だ 俺の人生はもう破綻してる
target: You think whatever you're threatening... can make my life any more fucked up than it is now?

source: それからぼくを使い ネメックを逮捕させ 金を奪う計画を思いついたんだ
target: And you thought that you could use me to take care of Nemec and take his cash.

source: 悪いが　僕らは　お互いのことを もっと知りあうことになってる と言ったのは　君じゃなかったか？
target: I'm sorry, wasn't it you that said we were supposed to be learning more about each other?

source: すぐにここに相棒が来て どちらかを見る
target: In a few seconds, your partner will come in here and one of two things will happen.

source: 何故大統領はパリや他に連絡をとらないのでしょうか？ もう救助したとでも思っているのでしょうか？
target: Why isn't the president on the phone to Pale, or whoever, makin' sure this kid gets out?

source: 今朝　左翼傾向のある ウェイターが出勤し １０分後に立ち去った
target: A waiter with radical leanings who showed up for work this morning, and left ten minutes later.

source: まずは アーロン 次に他の誰か -- 彼女をいじめた人間を
target: She's starting with Aaron, someone else will be next-- until she finds out who her bully is.

source: 私が話した グループ活動に − 参加するって事？
target: You know, maybe you wanna change your mind about going to one of those groups I mentioned?

source: 彼女はアスガルドには 属さない 晩餐会のテーブルの ヤギにしかすぎぬ
target: She does not belong here in Asgard any more than a goat belongs at a banquet table.

source: お前たち２人は― 一歩も この家から出るなよ
target: You and your snot-nosed little brother over there are not to step foot outside of this house.

source: ５年遅れで 大学と法科大学院にも
target: Bad enough to have gone to college and law school five years after my peers had graduated.

source: 私はそれが想像できない あなたにはあまりにも難しい 私の娘の死を命じる
target: I can't imagine it was too difficult for you to order the death of my daughter.

source: 起立して　地方検事の質問 貴方は人間ですか？
target: You're on the stand, the DA says, "Ted, do you consider yourself to be human?" Objection!

source: 革命なんぞに興味はないし 協力するつもりもないんだ お姫様
target: Look, I ain't in this for your revolution... and I'm not in it for you, Princess.

source: 彼女は逃げた 見つけ出して狩る
target: You are to have no further contact with her. Hanka security will hunt her from here.

source: 彼がヴァネッサ・ヒスキーを殺したことを 証明できる そう　でも　クラインフェルターを 取り戻せたとしても 彼が　その工作員達の名前を明かすか？
target: Okay, but even if we do get Kleinfelter back, isn't he just gonna release those names?

source: さっさと出てって あんたがいなくても平気よ
target: I've gotten very good at losing people. - You are only making it easier for me.

source: どこかで抗生物質を見つける 一緒にここから出よう
target: We're gonna find you some antibiotics, and we're gonna get you straightened out in no time.

source: まあ、それは仕方ありません。 ヴァイキングの襲撃ルート周辺に絞って 捜索するのは どうでしょうか？
target: Well, I mean, it does stand to reason to search near Viking raid routes, doesn't it?

source: ある時 ミアで ある男が主人に断れない申し出をしました
target: One day in Myr, a certain man made my master an offer too tempting to refuse.

source: 私が稼げるのは 一流の弁護士だからです
target: You're absolutely right. I have made a lot of money. I'm good at what I do.

source: お前のガールフレンドを 見つけろ 彼女とジュリアをここへ 連れて来い　直ちに
target: Get out there and find your little girlfriend, bring her and Julia Shumway back here, pronto.

source: 私がこの汚れたカネを― サロンに入れて きれいな現金に換えていく
target: I take your dirty money and I slip it into the salon's nice, clean cash flow.

source: 計算すら無理なのに... まして 望みの結果を　引き出すだなんて
target: I can't solve that kind of a problem, much less manipulate the outcome to my advantage.

source: ああ、ウォラーが初めて直面する 思いもしない問題、 ドローン攻撃で解決できない―
target: Yeah, Waller's never seen a problem she didn't think couldn't be solved with a drone strike.

source: 君達のマスコットが 3秒で大事な人を − 連れ出すのを 見たぞ
target: I-I saw your mascot take one of my best guys out in less than three seconds.

source: 右に曲がって 機械室に向かって エレベーターを停止した 電圧ケーブルを切って
target: Turn right, head to the mechanical room, and cut the tension cable to the elevator's lock.

source: アジトが判ったら 警察に連絡出来る
target: I can actually follow them to where they're holding you and I can call the cops.

source: ９０個もの部族を束ねたのは 歴史上であんただけだ
target: You spent your life convincing 90 clans to come together for the first time in history.

source: 映画を見せてたって 聞いたっけ？
target: Did I hear you were showing a movie this morning on the first day of school?

source: 君の話を本に書こうと 誘ってるワケじゃ
target: You probably think I'm trying to write your story. - Which, I'm not, by the way.

source: 彼とリッパーの話を？ 看護婦が殺される前に
target: Did you discuss the Chesapeake Ripper's crimes with Dr Gideon before he murdered the night nurse?

source: 歯と下顎のポケットを 調べてくれる？ 組織が残ってるかもしれない
target: Please examine the teeth and any pockets in the mandible where tissue could still be present.

source: お前がすべてだ 何よりも大切だよ
target: I am what I am because of you, and I wouldn't have it any other way.

source: 彼らは私を鹿キラーと呼ぶようになった 私を黙らせるキャンペーンがある。
target: They started calling me a deer killer and then there's a campaign to shut me down.

source: 「フロイトはアイルランド人について．．． ．．．彼らは、精神分析を必要としない、 唯一の民族だ、って言ったんだ」
target: What Freud said about the Irish is we're the only people who are impervious to psychoanalysis.

source: カメラの映像をハイジャックして 離れた場所に流している
target: Someone's been using it to hijack that camera's video feed, broadcast it to a remote location.

source: お前たちがバベルの塔より 矢を放とうとも その矢は決して―
target: You can fire your arrows... from the Tower of Babel... but you can never strike God!

source: 危険なモノが多く有るけど トランクを開けてはいないね？
target: A lot of dangerous equipment in my car. You didn't open the trunk there, did you?

source: 玉座に座って 安全な所でこの戦を 眺めていろ
target: Now sit on your golden throne, and watch this battle from the safety I provide you.

source: 私は名誉を重んじます あのままで名僧となれましょうか？
target: Minister, I value my reputation. How can I be a good monk with a bad rep?

source: 集中します 死因が不明の人の骨よ 部屋は３週間ロックされてた
target: So we have someone dead of unknown causes, locked in a safe room for three weeks.

source: この騒乱は ただの余興で 本当の狙いを 逸らす為だった
target: All this madness was just a sideshow to distract us from what they were really after.

source: 出産年の終わりに 結婚したから ふけて見えるのよ
target: I seem older to you because I married well before the end of my childbearing years.

source: - 最初はこの周辺 後はシェーンに任せる 俺とダリルは遠くで ランドルを解放する
target: After that, Shane'll assign shifts while me and Daryl take Randall offsite and cut him loose.

source: 武器を持ち蜂起するならば 死ぬ覚悟をしろ
target: They say if you live by the sword, you should be prepared to die by it.

source: パパ... 動物園の時みたいな 変な真似はしないでね
target: Dad, you're not going to freak out... like you did at the petting zoo, are you?

source: あの時の薬は押収したろ ボケたのか？
target: No, I ain't selling them no more, you confiscated them, remember? What, you got Alzheimer's, Richard?

source: 思ってたより リックはやってくれたわ
target: Rick's gotten us a lot farther than I ever thought he would, I'll give him that.

source: 酔ってる時も混乱してる時も 落ち込んでる時も...
target: And no matter what I do, no matter how hopeless I am... no matter how confused...

source: それは　昨日撮られた写真です あなたが着ているシャツとネクタイ それに血が付いて捨てられていたのを 私たちは　見つけたんです
target: It was taken yesterday, and you're wearing the shirt and tie we found covered in blood.

source: 遺体は見つからない だが　バーがこの近くにある 最近まで イライアスの所有物だった
target: I don't have a body, but there's a bar near here, until recently, belonged to Elias.

source: 今日いきなり表れて 口止めされたんだよ
target: Anyway, she shows up today and she wants to, like, make up like nothing ever happened.

source: 友達の警官が ブリックと仲間をムショに 送れるだろう
target: My friend on the police force will be able to put Brick and his friends away.

source: でなければ 衝突してる
target: We should be in between one of the two hills otherwise we will be crushed. Right.

source: 私は教授のジェイコブズよ 残りの学期は 私が授業をします
target: I'm Professor Jacobs and I'll be taking over the class for the rest of the semester.

source: 貴方はレオニダスと同じくらい 愚かだ この世で価値が無い男を考えてみよ
target: You're as foolish as Leonidas if you think men don't have a price in this world.

source: この医者と よく議論したよ
target: The learned doctor here and I have already spent many a night debating Mr. Moore's tractus.

source: これは私達の姿ではない このコミュニティでの 行動ではない
target: This is not who we are, and this is not how we act in this community.

source: レイチェルが彼とデートした時
target: When Rachel first told me she was dating Harvey Dent I had one thing to say

source: 伝言を残したんだが
target: Good, you know, I've never heard back from you... I left you a couple of messages.

source: 平等な市民権が 欲しいだけです
target: - We want the same rights as humans... - You can't trace it. It's all been laundered.

source: ええ 連絡系統の問題だ それでガルベスの怪我の件も
target: - If communication had been better, we would've known Galvez was on his way to the hospital.

source: いや　もう君の為には働かない 何の借りもない　ここで降ろしてくれ
target: No, I don't work for you any more. I don't owe you anything. Drop me here.

source: _の子供たちが、今、私はちょうど、ええと、私 唯一のスーパースター; 私は_他の運命2'
target: I used to have the other destiny's children, but now I'm just, uh, a lone superstar.

source: この街で唯一の本当の 怪物はシュレッダー そして彼は 2つの変異体を作った
target: The only real monster in this city is Shredder and the two mutants that he's created.

source: 昨晩殺害されました 犯行現場にS. N.
target: Well, he was murdered last night, and a S.N.A.R.T. logo was found at the crime scene.

source: わたし 末期がんの父が　いるんです。
target: My... My father is terminally ill with cancer, with a debt of 100 million yen, he...

source: スーツを買った事以外に、 お前にやろうと小銭を貯めたんだ
target: Except for a few suits that I bought, I saved almost every penny you gave me.

source: おふたりの関係は 前の奥さんが亡くなる どれくらい前から始まってました？
target: Just curious -- how long before the first Mrs. Feinberg died did you start your affair?

source: 彼女達に関する 書類をすべて手に入れたわ
target: OK. I grabbed all the archived papers with the Plastics, which was pretty much every issue.

source: 電池の切れない人形のように 俺はひたすら前へと進む
target: Like that bunny on TV with the battery, I just keep going and going and going.

source: 3階にいるらしい。 ホテルの正面で、 まん中の左側の部屋。
target: Yeah, they're on the third floor, front of the hotel, just to the left of center.

source: 誰かが彼と彼の研究を狙ってると 思ってるからだ
target: We went to see Mr. Prince because we believe someone was targeting him and his work.

source: 彼には雰囲気が 私を引きつけた 信頼がある
target: He had this air about him, and he had this confidence that drew me to him.

source: 終わりだ シャワーを浴びろ
target: ♪ I was too young to understand what it means ♪ Time. All right, hit the showers.

source: いいか　待ってろ
target: No, no, wait... why don't you just go re-read the How to Be a Cop manual?

source: 向こう側で話しかけたら おかしいと思われそうだ
target: On the other side if I start to talk to people there they'd think I'm crazy.

source: ファビアンがここの鍵を 彼から鍵を借りたんだ
target: Fabian had the only key to the rec center, which means Lou got it from him.

source: 問題があったら、妹は２階へ連れてって テレビのボリューム上げるから
target: If anything goes wrong I'm supposed to take her upstairs and put the TV on loud.

source: オレが行きたい場所、わかるか？ ロッククライミングに行く、 宇宙に行く、
target: You know, where I want to go, you know, climb things, go to outer space, huh?

source: それが真実なら ここは血だらけだ 壁も ここの天井もね
target: If that were true, there'd be blood here on the wall, and then the ceiling here.

source: あなたは私の恩師だから 1日 猶予を与えるわ
target: Out of respect for you and everything you taught, I can give you one more day.

source: 彼女を殺せば 脱出は不能 ウエスカー！
target: You can kill her if you like, but then you'll never get out of this place.

source: 信号のロックを試みているが、RF干渉が発生している
target: We're trying to get a lock on your signal there, but we're getting some rf interference.

source: アインシュタインでなくても ピンチと分かる
target: Ain't gotta be no Einstein to see there ain't no future for me as a single.

source: あんた達を 入国させる罠だ
target: That's just a trap to get you onto American soil so you can be prosecuted for...

source: ぼくのことを知りたければ ネットに書かれてる
target: You know, if you want to check me or look me up, it's on the Internet.

source: 見たこと　行ったことを 正直に記してきた
target: I've tried to give a true accounting of what I have seen, what I have done.

source: 上司も逃亡者グループを
target: Let me guess: He had a ragtag band of criminals ready to pick up the slack.

source: "手はとっときたい！"って すっげー言ったなって 今思ったら
target: "No, I want to save that." I was just remembering how she said that so adamantly.

source: 奇跡的な回復をしたから いつでも家に帰れるって
target: No, he says I've made a miraculous recovery, and I can go home whenever I want.

source: ブタの脳とコーテキシファンで 一時的な組織再生を
target: The pig brain is activating a little-known side effect of Cortexiphan which is temporary tissue regeneration.

source: ある店を、探し 映像にナンバー・プレイトが 映ってるはずだ。
target: I need the ones with exterior security cameras, 'cause I'm looking for a license plate number,

source: 君が息子さんを最後に見た事は 依然として事実なんだ
target: But the fact still remains, that you're the last person to be seen with your son.

source: 彼らがここを建てた時 作業員が発見した 60フィート下は大量の墓石だった
target: When they were building this city, construction crews discovered a mass gravesite, 60 feet below ground,

source: 君は　ただの連続殺人犯だと思ってた
target: I thought you were just a serial killer. Now I know you're a catfish as well.

source: 陛下は録音を済まされました 録音したレコードを放送用に ラジオ東京に持ち込もうとした矢先
target: Ηe made a recording, and we were ready to send it to Radio Tokyo for broadcast.

source: でも警察との関係は良好だと 殺人は犯してない
target: All right, but the cops there are cool with him now. He doesn't kill people anymore.

source: 私がお約束できるのは その件を枢機卿会で提起する事
target: All I can offer, Anna, is that I will bring your request to the college.

source: つまり... 君がショーを 開いたんだよね？
target: I mean, you can't say I don't know how to put on a show, right?

source: 私は、2つのベッドルームのスイートに絞っている それでいい、12階に何ですか？
target: I have you in a two bedroom suite on the 12th floor, is that okay?

source: 一緒に今イザックも吸ってんだからさ、
target: What the fuck? You're sitting here smoking it with him. Of course you know him!

source: さっきのことだけど...
target: Well, this is it. I want to tell you and I really I mean this.

source: 少し前進して 彼の視界を遮ってよ
target: I want you to push in. Block as much of his view as you can.

source: 次にする事は 自分のためでなく 皆のために する気がする
target: Honestly, it seems like everyone's thought of a next step for me except for myself.

source: 血液が天使の像を覆い 噴水の水を汚染した
target: Blood covered the angel statue in the square's fountain, and also contaminated the fountain's water.

source: 貴方にあんな態度を 本当に御免なさい 貴方がマットと 再婚すると聞いた時に
target: I'm sorry I was such a bitch to you when you decided to marry Matt.

source: （雄基）ある意味 次のステップに 行くタイミングなのかなって
target: The next step after Arisa, I guess. Maybe it's time for me to move on.

source: 彼は　その爆弾のことを聞いてすぐに 警察が自分を疑うだろうと思ったの
target: Soon as he heard about the bomb, he knew you people would be on him.

source: 誤解しないでください 少しの時間は　いたんです
target: I mean, don't get me wrong, he was there a good amount of the time.

source: 状況の問題でない 発生原因にかかわるかも
target: It was never the time or the place! That was the problem to begin with.

source: 〈現金不可なので　カードのご用意を〉
target: Remember, Vertusair no longer accepts cash, so please have your credit or debit card handy.

source: するとパニックを起こします, そしてそれをまた馬鹿にします。
target: Then she'll go into a panic attack, and then they make fun of that, too.

source: お邪魔して申し訳ございません　貿易大臣閣下 木戸大尉がお目にかかりたいといらしています
target: I'm sorry to intrude, Trade Minister, but Chief Inspector Kido is here to see you.

source: それでも、鷹が思いつかないような 隠れ場所はたくさんあるんです。
target: But there are so many places it would never occur to a hawk to hide.

source: もうあなたを見失いたくないの
target: Peter, I've lost you before over this, and I'm not gonna let that happen again.

source: 彼もトマスがそれを やらなかったと知ってた 彼が盗んだ物を知ってたかどうか
target: He also knew Tomas wouldn't have done it if he knew what he was stealing.

source: あなたがミサイルを落とす前まで それは安全に5,000年隠されていました
target: That was safely hidden for 5,000 years before you dropped a hellfire missile on it.

source: あんたの家には行きたくないって。 憂うつになるから。
target: Mum told Dad she didn't want to go to your house 'cause it's too depressing.

source: 30分後に税金を払う そのカネだ
target: The money's to pay a tax bill. - I have a hearing in 30 minutes.

source: こんな夜中に ハンサムな男が２人も嬉しいわ
target: What a pleasure this is, two handsome men visiting me on such a lovely evening.

source: そこで　パークマンが 会議のためにホテルに来た時 彼は　強硬手段に訴えた
target: So he tried the hard touch, when Parkman came to the hotel for the conference.

source: 熱振動機を破壊することができれば コアを不安定にして 武器を破壊できる
target: If we can destroy that oscillator... it might destabilize the core and cripple the weapon.

source: 親父は死んだ人間と話せると 思ってるらしい
target: But Walter seems to think we can get the dead guy to answer some questions.

source: でないと世界は ママ・ジューンの ホット・ヨガの後だ
target: -Got it? -Yeah. Or else the whole world tastes like Mama June after hot yoga.

source: 君たちは親しいが 彼は爆発寸前だ
target: Dan, you guys have been close, but you need to take a step back here.

source: それを私に提供しようとしてる
target: Her beloved Divergent Tris is going to be the one to deliver it to me.

source: 悪趣味な年上女に 貢がせないかぎり無理だ
target: I'd say, "Unless the demand for creepy-looking gigolos "has gone through the roof, that's bollocks."

source: あるいは　自分のDNAがついていると 知ってたから 電話を見つけたと主張した
target: Or he claimed to find it cos he knew his DNA was already on it.

source: そうしてポールは　うちの玄関に現れた ほとんど話も出来ないほど　怒り狂ってね
target: So Paul turns up on my doorstep so full of rage he can hardly speak.

source: あなたが生きている限り あなたはこの集会の敵よ
target: You are an enemy to this coven and will be so long as you live.

source: 女は果樹にしがみついた 人生のすべてだったんだ
target: So this woman, she's fuckin' hangin' on to this tree, cos that's her fuckin' life.

source: 見たことのない スクランブルを掛けてる
target: I tried, but this guy is using some crazy Felicity-Caliber scrambler like I've never seen.

source: 心の痛みを忘れるために こうやって話をすれば楽になっていく
target: Physical pain is better than emotional any day, but believe it or not, talking helps.

source: ジュリアンは 仕事を続けて欲しいと 気に入られてる
target: This guy Julian, you know, they don't want me to stop working, they like me.

source: 誰であろうと 刻み込まれるのだ
target: If it was me, every man, woman and child in the Union would be chipped.

source: 妹が来ただけで 死ぬほど怖くなった
target: My little sister drops in, and pays us a visit, and scares us to death.

source: Ｔシャツ販売や 映画ビジネスで 俺は気が狂いそうだ
target: I'm thinking about T-shirts, merchandising, movie deals... my mind's going crazy with this thing here.

source: 議事堂の部屋と一緒で "フランシス"だ
target: It's the same as the name above the door in my office in the Capitol.

source: 今のままだと証拠がなくて ビクトリアを拘留できないから
target: Which is good because they won't be able to hold Victoria Andrews without more proof.

source: あのガキの場合は本気で言った
target: Don't tell me he didn't mean it. Anybody says it like that, they mean it!

source: DNAも指紋も無かったのですが キャップが外れて空だったのです
target: No DNA, no fingerprints to link them to anyone, but they were uncapped and empty.

source: 私の職務外だが キムを勝手にさせてはいかん
target: Skipper, I know it's not my place, but you can't let Kim behave like that.

source: 「ダサい、フィギュアを見てね」
target: Check out this stupid crappy sculpture I did." You guys want to see a sculpture?

source: 魔女は生きることが 許されたのだ もし規則に従うなら
target: Witches would be allowed to live and govern themselves if they followed one strict rule:

source: パパがキャメロンを 殺したと思わせるの
target: We can pin it on my dad so the cops think my dad killed Cameron.

source: 運命が明かされるまで... 自分の最善を尽くす
target: I think a man does what he can until his destiny is revealed to him.

source: Dr. アーデンが失踪前に書いた 死亡診断があるはずだ
target: In it you'll find a death certificate made out by Dr. Arden before he disappeared.

source: 宗教じゃないけど 遺骨は埋めるべきよ
target: I'm not a religious person, but I do believe, there's a place for human remains.

source: トーマス 鼻をほじらないで それとお金のために 仕事を選ばないでね
target: And, Thomas... don't pick your nose... and never take a job just for the money.

source: その市民が 示して見せた 彼らの中に 正義があると
target: This city just showed you that it's full of people ready to believe in good.

source: 世の中を変えるため 弁護士になったんじゃないのか！
target: - You told me you became an attorney so you could change the world! - [Groans]

source: これのせいよ... 私を嫌わせる...
target: And it made me just.... lt made me hate this thing growing inside of me.

source: お前に合ってると思うんだ
target: There's one place down here... that might be nice for a guy in your situation.

source: もしデファイアントが到着 できなかったら、 君達全員も そうなっていただろう
target: If the Defiant hadn't arrived when it did, all of you would be among them.

source: 暫く振りだろうが 楽しめるはずだ
target: Come on, I know you haven't done it in a while, but it'll be great.

source: 夜の８時発 L. A. 空港で チャーターした貨物輸送機は ――
target: There is a cargo plane scheduled to depart lax at 8:00 pm to mexico city.

source: 外には　警官が立ってるのよ よくドアを蹴リ破って入って来なかったわ
target: Well, there are police officers standing outside. I'm surprised they didn't kick the door down.

source: ベッドに戻って　お願い でないと力ずくでフランクに 抑えつけさせるわよ
target: Get back in bed, please, or I'll be forced to get Frank to restrain you.

source: でもまだ遭遇した時の 幻覚の理由が分かってないわ
target: Okay, but we still don't know if he's responsible for those weird images you saw.

source: そんなことしたら お前ら 俺の授業に出ない口実ができんだろ
target: If I do that, you guys will have an excuse to skip my class again.

source: そしてこの世の最後かも知れないので ファックしてほしい --
target: And I want you to fuck me like it's my last night in this world.

source: フォルカー産業が国内で最大級の 会社の一つであることも トミー・フォルカーが
target: You do realize that Volker Industries is one of the biggest employers in the state..

source: 何人来るのか、武装してるのかも わからなかった
target: I didn't know how many of you there would be or whether you'd be armed.

source: いいか 家族は家族だし あそこはお前の家だ
target: Now, look, your home is your home and that is where you belong, all right?

source: 化学療法をしたいとは思いません。
target: And now death has followed you home. I don't think I want to do chemotherapy.

source: ここ半年で　顧客がどれほどの額の 損害を出したか知っていますか？
target: Do you know how much clients have lost their money in the last six months?

source: 私はあなたを 殺そうとなんかしてない
target: No matter what you think, I didn't have anything to do with any of this.

source: 身分をわきまえることを教え込まないと。
target: The pig doesn't know his place, and now he needs to be taught a lesson.

source: 彼女がかつて演説したフォートタイロンパークに 記念碑があるわ
target: You know, there's a plaque in Fort Tryon Park where she once gave a speech.

source: 後でオレのところに来て 出身を聞いたんだ 昔　何をしてたかも
target: He came up later, asked me where I was from, what I used to do.

source: もちろん、FBIが邪魔をすれば そうはならないけどな
target: Of course, that ain't going to happen if the feds are on a war path.

source: リズボン　僕が間違ってるなら 訂正して欲しいんだけど 彼女がつけてるのは スポーツブラだろう？
target: Lisbon, correct me if I'm wrong-- that appears to be a sports bra she's wearing.

source: マークが完全に 火星重力から逃れるためには そしてヘルメスに インターセプトするには...
target: So, in order for Mark to escape Mars gravity entirely, and to intercept the Hermes...

source: ♪空は青く♪ ♪信じた夢は♪
target: ♪ skies are blue ♪ ♪ and the dreams ♪ ♪ that you dare to dream ♪

source: いや　ドーナツビスケット以外のもの 食べてるの初めて見たからさ
target: Nothing, it's just that I have never seen you eat anything other than doughnut biscuits.

source: 気温変動が ±５℃以上で鳴るわ
target: Any temperature changes greater than five degrees in either direction will set off an alarm.

source: 娘さんは肺炎です 肺の感染症を 防げませんでした
target: She has pneumonia, and we haven't been able to control the infection in her lungs.

source: 全く何もないわけじゃないが 何の爆発も無かったんだ
target: I'm not saying it's perfectly fine, but there hasn't been any atomic blasts, all right?

source: 本当 空気変わる人っていると思うんだよ 多分 それで
target: What I've done all these years? You can tell the moment someone stands on stage.

source: 何にしても岩のある所に 行かなければならないのよ
target: We still have to make it to solid rock. There's got to be a way.

source: そう言う事もあるわ アナタの方が有利だし 弁護士に相談するくらいは
target: Well, once the government determines you're a traitor, kinda puts an end to government benefits.

source: 単なる不具合じゃないから・・ アバナシーの問題は伝染するかも？
target: Because if this is not a dissonant episode, then whatever Abernathy had could be contagious.

source: 彼と比べられるのは もう うんざりだ
target: I'm tired of you comparing me to Bobby, and, in fact, I'm tired of you.

source: "南ゲートに警官２人"
target: The rest should be on the South Lawn. And two policemen on the South Gate.

source: 見て。 私はおそらく最後の人です知っています あなたは今から聞きたいです。
target: I know I am probably the last person you want to hear from right now.

source: 一年後彼女は私のところへ来て 腕の中の赤ん坊を見せた
target: A year later she came to my gates with a squalling baby in her arms.

source: 先ず 思いつくのは... 感傷的な物語
target: Off the top of my head, I would go with the sense of manifest destiny.

source: 同じ印か 縫い傷だ ヘビ殺人の 被害者と同じの
target: Oh, it's the same insignia that was carved into the stomach of the snakes victim.

source: -　助けて欲しい割には 何も教えてくれない
target: - You expect us to help you, but you won't tell us what you're working on?

source: ジョーン軍曹 "ジョンゼイ" ブライアン・パリー ♪私達は毎晩 あなたのことを考えてる 一生あなたを愛します
target: ♪ We'll think of you every night and we'll love you for all of our lives.

source: 御存知の通り この戦争は人気がない
target: I mean, in case you didn't know it, this is not a very popular war.

source: だから 早く忘れたいんだよ
target: I saw her do it and I need to get it out of my head.

source: マイケルが精神面だけでなく 命の安全も保障してくれています
target: Brother Michael provides for the safety of our physical - as well as spiritual lives.

source: 幸せな人生の秘訣は 全ては支配できないと知る事だよ
target: The key to a happy life is to accept you are never actually in control.

source: アナタは心の何処かで 爆発が起きなくて安堵してる
target: Because I think there's some part of you that's relieved that bomb never went off.

source: 来るべきだったんだ 彼女はお前に弔辞をして 欲しかったんだ
target: You should have been there, and, you know, she wanted you to do the eulogy.

source: 誰かに捕まる前に こんな事をしないか？
target: ♪ Maps can be poems ♪ And do this, please, before anyone catches us in here.

source: 見かけとは違う 心底そう感じる
target: I know I don't look it, but I'm beginning to feel it in my heart.

source: ダン　何人が怪我をしたのか 酷いのかを教えてくれ
target: Dan, I need to know who's hurt and how badly, and I need a count.

source: 2，3の法の盲点を 突かないとならない・・ ・・不動産弁護士とね
target: I got a couple loopholes I got to get through with the, uh, real-estate attorneys.

source: イル・トロヴァトーレの上演がある チケットを取りたい ケネディセンターで
target: There's a performance of Il Trovatore at the Kennedy Center that I'd like to catch.

source: 道をより安全に 皆さんの安全を守る為に
target: Folks, I need your help to make our streets safer and our citizens more secure.

source: そんな理由じゃ無理だろ
target: You really think that a girl's gonna go for me just 'cause I have cancer?

source: おかしいわね 口は平気だけど おチンチンが擦れて痛いわ
target: It's funny. My mouth doesn't hurt at all but my penis is a little chafed.

source: 裁判長 原告に告知も 説明も なしですか？
target: - I don't know. Your Honor, you're dismissing my clients' case without any notice or explanation?

source: 連中はワッツの研究と思った訳だ でもワッツは何も知らない
target: They must have thought it was his work, but he didn't know what it was.

source: 僕が君に会った1回目 取締役会から出てきたら君は読んでた
target: The first time I saw you, coming out of a board meeting, you were reading.

source: 君たちに何かするよう 強制したりは　しないよ でも世間の注目度は　高い
target: Look, I don't want to force you to do anything, but public attention is good.

source: あんたも警官だったのなら 検視官が何をするかくらい 知ってるだろ？
target: You were a cop long enough to know what a medical examiner does, right?

source: そしてあの小さな城を取り返すの なぜなら取り返せるからよ
target: And take that stupid little castle back because it's ours and because you can.

source: 着替え　食事　運転　歯磨きもね
target: all the time they dress you, they feed you, drive you... Brush your teeth!

source: どこの誰が　千回も観るかよ
target: I am not the one who watched it a thousand times, everyone else has.

source: "サンタルシア高校 容疑者逃走中"
target: Suspect is on the move! Hold on, we're gonna get you to the hospital.

source: 彼らが結局非道を尽くしたのは知っています しかしこれを建てたのは彼らの祖先です
target: I know they did terrible things at the end, but their ancestors built this.

source: モデル風情が ファーストクラスか?
target: - I am! Really? A first class trip to Buenos Aires on a model's salary.

source: 君はアーチボルド・ウィットウィッキーの 子孫のサミュエル・ウィットウィッキーかい？
target: my name is optimus prime. we are autonomous robotic organisms from the planet cybertron.

source: この前このような部屋にいた 彼女が死んだ夜だった
target: Last time I was in a room like this was the night she died.

source: そなたに再び 頬笑んでほしいのだ... 来るべき時が来ても 悲しんではならぬ
target: I would have you smile again not grieve for those whose time has come.

source: 全て残ってる ここに入ったのにだ
target: Everything's still here, including what I think they were after, the Kahndaq dynasty diamond.

source: 待てよ ベラ 本気じゃないだろ
target: Oh, wouldn't I? Let me do it, and I'll show you if I would.

source: パパ・ジョルジュと ママは里親なの
target: But Papa Georges and Mama Jeanne, they're my godparents, so they took me in.

source: 彼女の身を守るために 彼女がどこか他の場所に 行く必要があると話したら
target: I told Irene that, in order to be safe, she needed to go elsewhere.

source: 我の全力を投入する準備は 必要だと考えます
target: I think we need to be prepared for anything in this case. I agree.

source: 国を救うためなんだ。 少しゆっくりしたら？
target: This night saved our country. Why don't you go rest. We're all done here.

source: 飛行機が海面に落ちたとき どのような感じでしたか？
target: Can you tell us what it was like when the plane hit the ocean?

source: ロブスターか エレファントマンだ
target: Yes, Jim. I'm telling you! It was either the lobsters or the elephant men.

source: たぶんアーロンを 拘束してる場所と同じだ - 都心部の高層タワー
target: Chances are it's the same place they're holding Aaron-- an office tower in midtown.

source: あそこに川がある 辿れば家に着くぞ
target: As long as you can find the river, you can find your way home.

source: 君と僕を組ませるのに 何故こんなに時間が
target: Can you believe it's taken the bureau this long to finally put us together?

source: クルーズが無実だという可能性を なぜ　そんなに考えたくないんだ？
target: Why are you so unwilling to even consider the possibility that Crewes is innocent?

source: 電話を掛けた所 先週クビになっていました
target: Put in a call to his current employer. Said Granger was fired last week.

source: トッド捜査官と 挨拶しても？
target: If Special Agent Todd keeps making those sounds.. I'm gonna start looking at him.

source: メガネの殺し屋を一人 調べるだけよ?
target: So you're telling me you can't find one hit man who wears hunting glasses?

source: そうだ、J だけどこんなピエロ野郎がどうやって 手にいれたんだ？
target: No disrespect, J, but how a clown like you get so much product, man?

source: そんな口の聞き方はゆるさん 王は王の好きなようにやるものだ
target: You can't talk to me like that. The king can do as he likes!

source: そこで"いや 世界一だよ" って言うのも 何かちょっと 俺は言えなかったというか
target: And I couldn't really say then, "No, you're the only one in the world."

source: 電話で話したように, エンリケおじさんは... カラフルな人生を歩んだ.
target: Like I said on the phone, your sweet uncle Enrique lived a colorful life.

source: テイラーである君の 問題にすべて − 回答できない
target: I know being Taylor might not be an answer to all of your problems.

source: すぐ死ぬだろうから。 スティーブ、発射体を確認。
