target: Unfortunately, you shall be too dead to hear it. Steve, we got a bogey.

source: 山腹をえぐり作った城塞の 美しさは例えようがなかった
target: Built deep within the mountain itself... the beauty of this fortress city was legend.

source: ずっと私のすぐそばにあったのね
target: ♪ Oh, oh, oh, oh. ♪ And it was right there in front of me

source: いずれにしても　あんなに 幸せそうな彼は見たことないわ
target: - In any case, I have not seen him that happy in a long time.

source: ごゆっくり あとでお話したい
target: But stick around. I'd like to get to know you all a little better.

source: あなたじゃ無いとは分ってた フィオナがあなたの喉を 切ったら死んだから
target: Well, I knew it wasn't you, because when Fiona cut your throat, you died.

source: 主人公が 突飛な現場を設定して 逃れる話だ
target: Beckett, the character gets away with it by staging a crime scene so bizarre,

source: スイーツが遺体には 鈍い痛みがあったと
target: I mean, Sweets says some grieving victims turn to sex to dull the pain.

source: 事件が起きた後に 税金の契約のコピー を取るように言われた
target: With what happened, they sent me down to collect copies of the tax agreements.

source: 地下室に入れられ 今日から俺の娘だと言われた
target: He locked me in his basement and told me I was his new daughter.

source: 世界が狂ってるとは そんなに心強い ことはない
target: There's nothing more reassuring than realizing that the world is crazier than you are.

source: 自分の信ずる事に対しては 死ぬも厭わないとは、感心ね でも、私も同じよ
target: I admire you're willing to die for what you believe... but so am I.

source: ここへ来て２週間ですが 私　家から黒い蟻を掃除してるんです
target: For two weeks I come now, and I clean black ants from the house.

source: 彼と話をさせてくれ 理解してもらう
target: Just let me talk to him, all right? I'll get it all figured out.

source: 健康と安全の仮面をつけて 人助けを止めようとする
target: Stuff that stopped us from being able to help, masquerading as health and safety.

source: でも人を殺したりしないわ
target: He is selfish, egotistical, and a complete horndog but he is not a killer.

source: 地球の物を取ったら 報復を自分の義務にしている
target: Someone takes something from the earth, you think it's your responsibility to avenge it.

source: 死んだオオカミより、飼いならされた方が 便利なのを知っている
target: She knows a tame wolf is more use to her than a dead one.

source: 試合をする連絡なら... 必要ないわ
target: Listen, you want to be in somebody's ring... you don't have to call me.

source: 裸でハンバーガーを食うために ビールを何本飲んだのか？
target: Exactly how many beers did you have before you got naked with that hamburger?

source: 頭の中でささやくの 怖い 聞きたくない
target: Voices in my head, whispering things, scary things, things I don't want to hear.

source: 手が　ますます 緊張してきたわ
target: Your hands are getting more and more tense. They're very tense. Still more tense.

source: でも来るなら ひとつ言っておく
target: But when we go tonight, Andrew, can I give you, like, a pro tip?

source: スタジオが使えるのよ 後で皆を呼び戻すの
target: Then we can have the studio, anyway, and we can get the others back.

source: "待つと良い事がある"って
target: Well, you know what they say about good things happening to those who wait.

source: そうか スーツは？
target: Okay, first things first, I need the armour. Where are we at with it?

source: 私は愛や色んな事を 感じられる
target: Yeah, no, yeah, no. Yeah, I am capable. I love a lot of stuff.

source: 鼓動を遅らせる 人間の自然療法よ そして血圧を低下させる
target: It's a natural human remedy to slow the heart beating and reduce blood pressure.

source: この写真を撮った人物が犯人なら 友達か　あるいは
target: If it was the person who took this picture, then it was a friend.

source: 詩的な描写なら ジョンの ラブメールには負ける 何を見た？
target: Yes, if I wanted poetry, I'd read John's emails to his girlfriends, much funnier.

source: うん、これはものすごくいい学校です と彼女はそこに行くと思った。
target: Yeah, because it is a damn good school and she wanted to go there.

source: もし ジムの子なら 絶対に産みたい
target: I want very much to have it if it's Jim's. That's what I want.

source: 俺はムリだ　通れない ひとりで行け
target: I'm not going with you. I won't fit. You have to go by yourself.

source: 父に一つだけ約束させられたんです アメリカ人とは 絶対に結婚するなと
target: My father made me promise one thing, that I would never marry an American.

source: それはいい セルジオ･タッキーニの 14歳サイズのトレーナーだ
target: Well, that's handy, because in here I have an age-14-sized Sergio Tacchini tracksuit top.

source: 俺は鎖に繋がれているが
target: I think he's in Iowa -- at a coffee shop. [ Car doors close ]

source: で どうやって出る？
target: Back in the block! How do we do that with them things out there?

source: 主題の内部に入る瞬間まで 注意深く待つんだ
target: Wait for the moment that our eyes finally penetrate the inside of the subject.

source: 本の題名は "征服者エイゴンの歴史と
target: And the title of the whole book is "An History of Aegon the Conqueror"

source: アンドレアが お前が思っているより 早く出してくれる
target: Andrea's gonna get me out of here sooner than you know it, all right?

source: 私の技術で 床から組織を はがせるかもしれませんよ "かも"だって！ ？
target: I've got a biodegradable solution that might loosen the tissue fused to the floor!

source: 人斬り と して働いたのは 14歳から19歳までの5年間
target: Worked as an assassin for 5 years, from the age of 14 to 19.

source: それで　愛情で夕食をとらせたの どうなの　オリバー？
target: So, making me have dinner with the love of your life is what, Oliver?

source: ブレナン博士は連続殺人犯に 繋がる証拠を見つけてない
target: But Dr. Brennan has no evidence to link these cases to a serial killer.

source: それと、「多数の要求」のレクチャーは聴きたくない
target: And I don't want to hear any lectures about the "needs of the many."

source: ルシールとヤりたいと 冗談言ってた 奴が
target: In fact, we were just joking about oral sex with Lucille the other day.

source: サンにアーロンを連れて ロング・ビーチ・マリーナに来るように
target: Then call Sun and tell her to bring Aaron to the Long Beach Marina.

source: 彼女は　同じチームの他の刑事と 浮気をしてて
target: She was having an affair with one of the other DS's on the team.

source: ビショップ博士なら わかると思う
target: If Dr. Bishop finds out, we'd love to learn anything we can about it.

source: 助ける前にスキューバ･タンクの 空気がなくなっちまう
target: She ran outta air in her SCUBA tank before we could get to her.

source: 私は教職が大好きだった そして　彼らは私から奪った
target: I loved teaching so much, and I let them take it away from me.

source: あなた方には古い情報だと思いますが、 でも新鮮です・・・ 他のみんなにとっては。
target: You guys may think it's old news, but it's new... news to everybody else.

source: 訪問のたび そんな事言うの？
target: Do you have to say that every time you show up at a house?

source: "今では ここに私と住んでいる"
target: In fact, he's moved in with me. Not that that's not a good place.

source: 各国の首脳が 和平案に同意を
target: The presidents of Iran, Russia, Israel and France have all agreed to your terms.

source: 今日はもう 何人か予約が入ったし 力を入れ過ぎないようにやるわ
target: I've just got a couple of clients today. So I'm gonna take it easy.

source: そんな 子供の頃の事を...
target: Oh, olive, you can't let what happened to you as a child define you.

source: しかし、何より神秘的なのは... ものの大小ではない
target: But maybe the most mysterious of all... is neither the small nor the large.

source: オリに戻った時 何が起こるかはわからない どういうつもりよ
target: Now, I can't say what's gonna happen when he goes back to the pen.

source: パーティ専用にバスに 乗らされるらしい
target: This bus is gonna take you up to wherever the party is, I heard.

source: それで　明日座席表は 一杯でないと困るんだな そして素晴らしいひと時を過ごす
target: So tomorrow the seating chart shall be up, and we'll have a wonderful time.

source: だが君はここにいる 名を馳せる時だと思わないか？
target: And yet here you are, about to make a name for yourself, about to...

source: あなた　クロム... バッジを見た？ 視力は正常よね
target: Yeah, I just showed you my badge, and I know you have 20/20 vision.

source: Bウィルスは 脳に作用して 感染拡大のための 機械のようになってしまう
target: I think the B virus rewires the brain to create a perfect contagion machine.

source: 道路には二人の人が 僕はスピードを上げ 上げて、上げて
target: A year ago two people in the road I was driving fast, fast, fast!

source: そして、あれば、我々は開発を停止... 藤野のアライグマは、あまりにも良いオフになります。
target: Then if we stop the development... the Fujino raccoons will be better off too.

source: ピンクの派手な服装から見て おそらくメディア関係で
target: I'm guessing something in the media, going by the frankly alarming shade of pink.

source: 世界中を実験の試験場にしていることは 十分に知っているわ
target: Enough to know that they're using the world as a testing ground for experiments.

source: 毎分10,000ツイート 一方で我々は ダウニング街の対応を待って - 国家の表明を
target: 'While we wait for Downing Street to respond, 'the nation is voicing its opinion.

source: それには君の協力が必要だ
target: And I'm going to need your help if we're going to change her mind.

source: 邪魔して済みません... ルシールを忘れてたので
target: I'm sorry to interrupt, sir, but, uh... you left Lucille out by the truck.

source: 箱を開ける前に 量子物理学では言われてる 猫は生死にかかわらず
target: Quantum physics says before you open the box, the cat isn't dead or alive.

source: 犠牲者増加軽減を 狙ったのね でも2人多いわ
target: Okay, well, you get points for the deep cut, but you're off by two.

source: それから私はジェイミーを毎日四時間覚えるまで座らせた
target: After that, I sat Jaime down for four hours every day until he learned.

source: 耳を貸すな　妄言だ
target: Tom, do not listen to that crap. That's the worm talking. Is it, Tom?

source: 結婚して シカゴに越しました いつ戻ったの？
target: I moved to Chicago when I got married. Oh. When did you move back?

source: 礼儀正しくしてるが 俺はいつでも━
target: I've been too polite to point out that at any time I want to,

source: あんな気味の悪いとこに 友達を一人で行かせられないさ
target: We sure ain't letting' any friend of ours goin' to that creepy place alone.

source: 売れないクソ小説を取りに わざわざご苦労さま
target: Thank you for going to the trouble of picking up his lousy, unsuccessful novel.

source: あなたが心配してくれてるよう 僕も心配してるよ ジョー
target: Well, I'll always worry about you, Joe, just like you'll always worry about me.

source: 運命の人よ　早く会わせたい
target: He's the one, Beth. I know it. I can't wait until you meet him.

source: はい それとは別に 中国の会社に... この部分を
target: And then, quite separately we place an order to a Chinese company for these.

source: オリバー・スレッドソンが 以前住んでいた家に住む 老夫婦も含まれます
target: Including the elderly couple who lived in the house formerly owned by Oliver Thredson.

source: 精神医療なのに 反対はしてない
target: No, he doesn't oppose them per se, he just believes in self reliance more.

source: - どれが貰えるの？
target: What do we get for that? - Top shelf. - I like that one.

source: コンディション２に移行します この時間を有効に利用しましょう
target: We're gonna go to Condition Two. We have to take advantage of this time...

source: 望んだ人生を生きてて 幸せそうだった
target: Like, he was just so happy to be living the life he was living.

source: "結婚まで寝ない"と 言った女さ
target: Girl waited three weeks to tell him she doesn't have sex 'til she's married.

source: 暗い穴の底
target: Let's just say. I put him in a hole and threw away the hole.

source: 仕事っていうのは＿
target: All the 3 little piggies had to do was just steal one little crown.

source: 曹操の真の目標は 劉備を打倒するだけではなく 呉の征服です!
target: Cao Cao's real target is not to defeat Liu Bei but to conquer Wu!

source: でもお前は 俺の部屋に忍び込んだ 真夜中にだ
target: But here we are in my office in the middle of the night.

source: もし茶番ならキャリアは終わるぞ
target: I find out this is bullshit, There will be consequences. Severe, career-Ending consequences.

source: でも誰も知らないし 皆 熊が嫌いならどうする？
target: But I don't know anyone there. What if they don't even like bears?

source: "なぜ神は こんな仕打ちを" 君はそう言った
target: "What kind of God would cause so much suffering?" That's what you said.

source: あの時 殺して おけばよかった でも 私は女にしては 慈悲深いから
target: I should have killed him then, but I had mercy on the cunt.

source: 出版前に言っとくが
target: You could always go on the record, help me get my facts straight.

source: 8年前の事だけど アブ ナジールに賞金が掛かってると
target: Eight years ago you told me there was a reward for Abu Nazir.

source: わかりました
target: - I don't think we took any depreciation on that new equipment last year.

source: 「どうやら、やっと、わかったんだ．．．」 「．．．組織の中に、スパイがいる」
target: I'm sure by now you know I got an informer in my outfit.

source: 俺は 400ドル投資した これが精一杯だ
target: I've got $400 invested in that coach. That's as far as I go.

source: 完璧になるため さらったのか
target: So you're suggesting Malcolm Truss was kidnapped so the shapeshifter could perfect itself.

source: 彼のBMWの記憶装置によると 他の車からの影響はなかった
target: His BMW's black box said there was no impact from any other car.

source: 僕が間違ってた 始めからやり直したい
target: It would be different... if we could just give it another go around.

source: 今度は大麻を吸った者を 大勢出してしまった
target: This time a great number of people who smoked marijuana have come forward

source: 我々を失業させるつもりですか？
target: Sounds like you're trying to put me out of a job. [ laughter ]

source: 子供の問題は 僕に余裕ができるまでお預けだ
target: We'll get back on the kid when I get my feet under me.

source: あのね アートを コツコツ勉強するのも悪くない でも 昨日今日 業界に入ったド新人が
target: I think it's good to research art, but being new to the field,

source: それは私たちが最初に 喧嘩になった時の言葉ね
target: See, that's the kind of talk got us in trouble to begin with.

source: 警察は炎上した車から 痕跡を見つけられなかった
target: Cops couldn't find the evidence on the SUV to point to a culprit.

source: 教官は部屋を 「再現してある」と... それが 手がかりでした
target: You used the word "reconstructed" for the rooms, and that was the key.

source: マグヌッセンみたいな人はね だから私みたいな人が存在する
target: People like Magnussen should be killed, that's why there are people like me.

source: 犯罪歴無し　でも税金の申告で 問題があって
target: No criminal record, but he had his share of law and tax problems.

source: はい この先に8台のパトカーが
target: Yes, sir. There's an all points on you. Eight units headed your way.

source: それは誤りです 彼等が留まる限り我々も残るべきです
target: - That's the wrong move. As long as they stay, we have to stay.

source: こんな物読んでどうなると思う？
target: Do you want to know where this is going? Right into the garbage!

source: 〈でも これしか―〉 〈方法がないのよ〉
target: You've been through a lot, and I don't know what else to do.

source: でも　警察のコンサルタントをするのに 一緒に暮らす必要は無いわ
target: But we do not need to live together to consult for the police.

source: 話し方といい -- 身のこなし方といい
target: The way you talk... the way you carry yourself... were you a cop?

source: 中３なんで
target: I was on it from the fifth grade up until the ninth grade.

source: 作り方は違うが 純度は同じだ
target: We used a different chemical process, but it is every bit as pure.

source: 携帯屋で強盗した男と接触した
target: We caught a break with that kid that robbed the cell phone store.

source: ２０年前の今夜 私たちを救ってくれた
target: Who, 20 years ago this night... Saved all of us from those dreaded...

source: むしろブライアクリフを 20世紀に持ってくるこの機会を 利用する事としました
target: I've decided to take this opportunity to bring Briarcliff into the 20th century.

source: 俺のために 立ち寄ったのか？
target: Be an angel. Come over here and hold it for me, will you?

source: 俺は水をさがして 忌まわしい薬を全部飲んでくる
target: I'm gonna go find some damn water and take all my damn pills.

source: 巻き込んでごめんね
target: I'm the one that should be sorry for dragging you guys into this.

source: でもドイツで心理評価を受けさせ 結果もご存知の筈
target: But you ordered his psych evaluation in Germany, which I'm sure you reviewed.

source: 誰もが見たがるショーを作るんだ それは、つまり...
target: - No. I give 'em a show they cannot resist, which is gonna be...

source: 大学を出る頃には 私の隣で仕事をしていた
target: He worked with me in the department in his last year at school

source: ジョンは表現可能なあらゆる 言い回しで称賛してくれるが
target: John's expressed that thought in every possible variant available to the English language.

source: 大丈夫だ
target: It's gonna be all right. I posted bond, and I wasn't doing anything.

source: カメラがついてる それにマイクもな
target: There's a camera in that shit, there's a fuckin' Mike in that shit.

source: だがベッドが恋しくなって来た 窓も同様だ
target: But I am gonna miss my bed, and the window for that matter.

source: 面白いわ, しかし今日は私の 結婚式なの冒険談に興味ないわ
target: Fascinating, but it's my wedding today we are not interested in your adventures.

source: 引っ張られる僕の写真
target: First the scream, then a photograph of me being taken in for questioning.

source: お前は一人一人皆のものだ
target: You got to believe that you are inside every single one of them.

source: 家で証拠が 見つかったり―
target: Look... Evidence found at my house, me drugged and brought to a hotel...

source: それを読んだ人がいる そして彼にはうんざり
target: There's only one person who could read it and I can't stand him.

source: パパは私に 一人でやらせるつもりなのよ だから...
target: Well, I think my Dad's probably trying to get through to me, so...

source: 宇宙一のバカになることか？
target: What's that? The plan to be the slobbiest entity in the entire universe?

source: 薬を断ち切るのが目的なのよ
target: The idea is to wean you off of the pills, not to get--

source: 私はカマとマントの 自分のイメージが好きだった
target: I've always quite liked the image of me with a sickle and cape.

source: 身近な人を失って 動揺してると思うが
target: So, you must be, uh, really upset, losing someone so close to you.

source: 総督と同じ部屋に 居たんだよね そしてヤツを行かせた
target: You were in a room with the Governor and you let him go.

source: 分かった もし何も見つけられなかったら
target: All right. If you can't find anything out right away, call Dr. Sagara.

source: カミングス あなたが必要とされてる場所に居なさい そのため私が給料を払ってるの
target: Cummings, you're needed in whatever area I'm paying you to be needed in.

source: ２人でいつもしてた事の １つでしょ
target: That was one of the things that we would do. I know that.

source: もう少し時間をくれたら 吐かせます
target: - Just give me a little more time. I'll sweat it out of him.

source: シュレックも、立派な王になるよ
target: What did I tell you? The kid's going to be a great king.

source: でも、ホントに重要じゃないのよ あなたを疲れさせたモノなんて、ジャン -ピエール
target: But it doesn't really matter that you are tired of these things, Jean-Pierre.

source: 知らないと言ったでしょ
target: I already said no. That question couldn't have been asked over the phone?

source: うまく行ったとして 本当にそれでイイのかい?
target: And even if it had worked out, would you really want ginger babies?

source: ナンシーは次の飼い主に なろうとした、だが・・ ・・たった一人の飼い主のものだ
target: Nancy made an effort to claim him, but he was a one-master dog.

source: もし倒されても 立ち上がるから
target: And if you knock, knock me over I will get back up again

source: ああ　だがあの話し方だよ
target: Yeah, but the damn thing is the way he tells the story, Frank.

source: 俺はただ何とかして 生きていこうとしている男さ
target: I'm just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe.

source: 分かって欲しい 私は貴方を絶対に忘れなかった
target: And I need you to know that I never gave up on you,

source: もうスイッチを 押さなくても良いな
target: There were times when I thought about not turning that signal on anymore.

source: 俺がした事　見た事...
target: The things I did, the things I seen... it becomes who you are.

source: 僕は普通になりたい 普通の大学生に
target: I just want to be normal, Bee. That's why I'm going to college.

source: 本当のことを言えばいいじゃないか
target: Now, why can't we just tell them the truth and live with it?

source: そして　タジキスタンの人々はたった１つだけ 真実と永遠の平和を知りたがっている
target: And only then will the people of Tajikistan know true and lasting peace.

source: 秘密を打ち明けてくれたでしょう 少しは信頼して
target: After everything you've confided in me, I should at least have your trust.

source: 今日、各世界の代表方々に 再びここに集まって頂いたのは かつて無い同盟を結ぶためです
target: Today, we have assembled representatives of numerous worlds, to forge an unprecedented alliance.

source: 火曜になるつて 信じられる？
target: Now they're saying it won't be here till Tuesday, can you believe it?

source: みろよ　このガキはまだ9歳だが タマの大きさはおまえの倍だ
target: You cried like a little bitch. This kid is fucking nine years old.

source: 君と私、イゴール... 私たちが 独自で男を作成するんだ... ...想像してみろ
target: You and I, Igor... we shall create a man after our own image.

source: 希望の持てるしるしだけど まだあなたから目を離さないよ
target: That's a hopeful sign, but I'm still gonna keep an eye on you.

source: 僕が彼女と仕事を 一緒にやっていくなら
target: And I realized that if I'm ever gonna make things work with her,

source: これを聞いたら パパの携帯に電話くれ
target: And call me on my cell to let me know you got this.

source: 決定的な証拠を ご覧になっていませんか？
target: Am I handing you a slam dunk on a silver platter, or what?

source: カラスタントンの作業履歴です エイリアスは 前のアドレスと財務記録 と彼女の死亡証明書
target: Kara Stanton's work history, aliases, prior addresses, financial records, and her death certificate.

source: この席に来て何か注文したんだろ
target: I mean, you can just sit down and ask for that right off.

source: それと　ダニーの死体にも 使われてた同じ洗剤の痕跡
target: And traces of a cleaning product, the same one used on Danny's body.

source: もし散歩なんかに行けば― １時間以内に― 死ぬだろう
target: You go marching out there and within an hour, you will be dead.

source: １週間外出禁止のどっちがいい？
target: Or are you gonna be grounded for a week for lying to me?

source: "茶系のジャケットに 春服の様なパーカ？"
target: Are you wearing a tan jacket, like, a spring jacket, and a hoodie?

source: 君は正しい ヒーローの服を着たら ヒーローのように行動するべきだ
target: You're right. If we're gonna dress like heroes, we should act like heroes.

source: キティは上等な 音響ステレオ・システムも買ったって言ってたわ。
target: Kitty said they also got one of those fancy new surround sound systems.

source: ♪偽りだらけのしがらみなんか 切り捨てればいい♪
target: You could cut ties with all the lies That you've been living in

source: その質問は総統閣下自らに直接 聞いてもらわないと
target: You'd have to address any questions on that subject to the Führer himself.

source: 宣戦布告された我々に 残された選択肢は一つだ...
target: Declared War on our way of life and left us with one option:

source: 彼はマジェスティック・ホテルよ でも出かけたばかり 南に向かってる
target: He's been at the Majestic Hotel, but he's just left, heading... south, okay?

source: この町に長い人と
target: I wanted to talk to someone... who's lived here for a long time.

source: 重要なのは 私は殴られ　鍵を盗まれた
target: But the point is this: she struck me, and she stole my keys.

source: 必要な時ほど 言葉は出なかった
target: Why words slink n' slide off a tongue, when we need them most?

source: 長年　参加したかった
target: One I hope to be a part of for many years to come.

source: 客はパスタに １万ドル払うんだぞ
target: They don't pay 10 grand a plate for pasta nero if we're lax.

source: こんな時があったわ リチャードが料理をしてくれたの
target: You know, there was a time Richard used to cook meals like this.

source: 完璧なマイクは大学を変えた 盗作がばれたからな
target: Perfect Mike here had to switch colleges 'cause he got busted for plagiarism.

source: 素敵なディナーとのロマンス私 そして多分あなたは、そのボーナスを得ることができます。
target: Romance me with a nice dinner and maybe you can get that bonus.

source: 彼を訓練したわよね？
target: Hell, he learned how to jump out of airplanes with the 82nd Airborne.

source: この機会をくれて 感謝するよ
target: Thank you for your assistance in creating the opportunity - for this appointment.

source: 塗り薬のおかげなの
target: I put a special ointment on them. It makes them mor e beautiful.

source: 遠方の場所を知ってるよ、俺らを誰も 分からないよ
target: I know a place far from here where no one would recognise us.

source: ねえ　誤解しないで欲しいんだけど あなたは何者だ？
target: Hey, don't take this the wrong way, but who the hell are you?

source: ホワイトハウスがテロ攻撃を受ける
target: I have confirmation the white house is a target of a terrorist attack.

source: - あれを得た事の 完全に理にかなった説明を してくれるとと思うよ
target: I'm sure he's got a perfectly reasonable explanation for where he got it.

source: さぁ おまえのパパに キスしてくれ
target: And I want you to give your daddy a big kiss. Come on.

source: シリアルナンバーを調べればいい 再構築に成功したんだ
target: Well, the serial number was all scratched, and I managed to reconstitute it.

source: 地球が誕生してから、
target: The Earth is about 4.5 billion years old, that's 4,500 million years old.

source: 多分、けど、今連絡したのは、同じくらいの緊急事態よ、「S. O. （ウォード）」
target: Maybe, but I called with an equally pressing question for you, my S.O.

source: そのドレス、ワシらも着にゃならんのか？ え？
target: This dress you're wearing, do we have to wear one of these, too?

source: これで準備は整いましたね
target: Well, these are the kind of life sentences I like to hand out.

source: 話をでっちあげるために 創造的な知性に アクセスしたってことだ
target: Well, she would have been accessing her creative mind to fabricate a story.

source: 何か必要な物があったら言ってくれ
target: Let me know if you need anything. I'll just be right out here.

source: なぜ僕だけ除け者に？
target: But why would he keep me in the dark? Maybe I could help.

source: 受け入れられないのは ここ10年の間 二重取引をしているあなたの国だ
target: What's unacceptable is the double dealing your country's been engaged in for decades.

source: 透視能力者は 何でもするだろう その秘密を解明する為ならな
target: Which is why the Clairvoyant will do anything to know how it happened.

source: いずれ クォーターにいる 全ての魔女が 力を失い始める
target: Soon, all the witches in the Quarter will start to lose their power.

source: 早く行動しなければならないなら 最強は保証できない
target: If I got to do it fast then I can't guarantee the best

source: 会いに来るかい パズルの次の 謎が解けるよ
target: Come meet me, we'll figure out the next part of the puzzle together.

source: 彼はひどくおかしい 失敗した、神に誓って
target: He comes in all fucking loopy and fucked up, I swear to God

source: 言葉に詰まると １本吸うんだ
target: When I don't know what to say I ask for a cigarette too.

source: 我、汝に強いる 最も恐ろしく強大な地獄
target: - I compel thee by the three most dreadful and mighty names of Inferno,

source: 結婚して　子供２人 言うなれば弟の　お陰だ
target: I have a beautiful wife, two beautiful children, all because of my brother.

source: 彼が何をするつもりか知ってるだろ
target: We all know what he's doing and we all know what he'll do.

source: 私たちの将来を考えるには 時間が必要なのね?
target: You need some time to figure out how you feel about us? Okay.

source: 遅れたが最後、 "永久滞在"よ... いい？
target: So don't be late unless you wanna make this your permanent residence, okay?

source: 自分で蹴り飛ばせば全て終わるぜ。
target: You could kick it out right now yourself and it'd all be over.

source: 代償を支払う時が来ました
target: The time has come for you to pay for every crime you've committed.

source: 俺の学校だと １回に１冊しか借りられない これ借り過ぎじゃ
target: In my school, you're only allowed to check out one at a time.

source: ２００３年にマリファナ所持で 共に逮捕されたのは肯定的かね？
target: Would that positive effect be your joint arrest... for purchasing marijuana in 2003?

source: ジョン　俺たちは仲良く やらなきゃ　仕事が出来なくなる
target: John, we gotta all be friends, all right, or this ain't gonna work.

source: 俺の前では素直にしていろ・・・ お前には権利も弁護士も無い
target: Let me be clear ... you have no rights. You have no lawyer.

source: 救急箱がある 消毒しないと
target: Let me get the first-aid kit, clean that out. It's gonna get infected.

source: じゃ 事務所に電話して
target: - I don't have a phone. Uh, well, call me at the office, okay?

source: ポテトは太るから 出すなと言ったろ
target: And I asked you to stop making these potatoes. I'm gaining weight again.

source: 人は変わるから 面白いわよね？
target: It's funny how people change, isn't it? Yeah. I mean, I don't know.

source: 放してったら 人に見られたらどうするの
target: Let me pass, you devil. What will people think if they see us?

source: 良くもまあ次々と 恥をかかせるのね？
target: How do you always manage to find a new way to humiliate me?

source: ディーン・レストン... キャロラインの死の 数日後CEOに指名された
target: Dean Reston... was tapped as CEO just a few days after Caroline's death.

source: 誰がこの放送を仕切っているかは 不明のままですが―
target: With no idea as to who is behind the broadcast of this show

source: 普通の子供は欲しくなかったんだ 自分を見失うのが怖かった
target: You never wanted a normal child because you were afraid of losing control.

source: "教会はグローブ紙の 質問に関心を持たず"
target: The Church had no interests in knowing... what the Globe's questions would be.
Why don't we just say it at the same time? One, two, three...

source: 何も分っていません
target: Authorities outside still don't know the composition or the origin of the dome.

source: マイクロフトは　我々の想定以上に 見事に姿を消した
target: I must admit, Mycroft has disappeared more effectively than I'd have thought possible.

source: あと、死んだりしないで 面倒はまっぴらだから
target: And, just don't die. I don't need that shit hanging over my head.

source: 私たちは、別のユニットに参加する場所のクリーンスイープを作るつもりです。
target: We're gonna join with another unit, make a clean sweep of the place.

source: お父さんと代わって 話しがあるの
target: Put your father on the phone. I need to speak to him now.

source: そういう人が編集長なら 通販カタログになるわね
target: With an editor like that, the magazine will become a mail order catalog.

source: リバー８の犯行に仕立て 得するのは？
target: Who stands to gain the most if Liber8 takes the heat for this?

source: ああ 我々は 防犯カメラの映像を得た 本当に天才だな 認めるよ
target: Oh, we got a great little home movie of you admitting that, genius.

source: ミニゴーストと呼ぼう 連絡を取り易いように
target: Okay, we're calling them "Mini-ghost"... because we'll never remember what you just said.

source: ２ケース返品するから金を返せ
target: So I'm gonna return the two cases and you will refund my money.

source: 幅木なんて まだ整理もしてないわ
target: The baseboard is falling to pieces and I still haven't sorted it out.

source: 効果的であるとわかれば 人間にも同様に疑いなく効くだろう
target: Should it prove effective, it will no doubt work on humans as well.

source: 文書館に案内してくれ
target: Steve, would you show the detective to our old archives for outside ministries?

source: ファンレターが山ほど届くから それに混じってたと思う
target: Yeah, I think so. Yeah. I get a shit ton of fan mail.

source: 敷地の南西付近で待機 そこでラリーの連絡を待って トニー？
target: He'll be sending you coordinates for an exfiltration point along the southwest perimeter.

source: 死刑判決に責任がある
target: that you were responsible for the death by hanging of one Edward Seaton.

source: 奇妙と思われるでしょうが 信じたかったのは 他の者だったのです
target: I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.

source: 今までに解雇した人の 数は数えきれません
target: I can't even count the number of people I've fired in my lifetime.

source: 今日は 医者として来たんじゃない 友人として来た
target: But I'm not here today as your doctor, I'm here as a friend.

source: 主にウェストレイクの家を 買っているが　ここでは少ない
target: Buys homes mostly in Westlake, but I know she's got a few here.

source: これは私が子供と過ごす 単なる手段なんだ。
target: This was just a way for me to spend time with my son.

source: そして建設的な意見交換を自由に
target: And then afterwards, feel free to contribute any constructive ideas of your own.

source: 彼女に会ってるのは確かだ
target: All I know for sure is that I've been going to see her.

source: ぼくはアスパラガスか キャベツのどちらでも出来るから
target: I was either going to be an asparagus or a Brussels sprout.

source: 手紙とか脅迫者が送ってきたもの
target: --No, she's a friend, I mean a relative. --Good evening. --Good evening.

source: 書き留めてくれないか？
target: But I'm concerned ... 'cause I don't see nobody writing shit down.

source: テニスみたいにうまくは行かないもんだな
target: My tennis game will suffer, but it wasn't much to begin with.

source: だが 捜査を始めるたび 証拠が消え―
target: And here's the thing, every time we start a formal investigation, poof!

source: 監視カメラに ヤツの姿が
target: The security cameras picked up an image of him before she disappeared.

source: ボス　被害者の里親の ポリー・ダッチですが - ボスと話したいそうです
target: Hey, boss, Polly Datch, victim's foster mom-- wants to talk to you.

source: 有名な方なのよ
target: - I am. He's a playwright, Jack. Quite a famous one, at that.

source: 逃げろ！
target: We gotta get out of here! We gotta get out of here!

source: 彼女とは長い付き合いなの
target: Virginie and I have known each other for a long, long time.

source: 悪いか？
target: He gave me a sack of clothes, a horse. A fine horse.

source: トムの問いにも同じ答えを？
target: Is that what you told Tom Riddle, when he came asking questions?

source: "何年後が何とか"とか 全然 考えたことなかったから
target: I haven't really thought about what I would do in the future.

source: 彼が最も苦しんだので... まず犠牲になる者を 知っていたのでね
target: Because he suffered most and... we both knew who was really expendable.

source: 今度は最後まで 行けるかも知れんぞ
target: You never know, you might make it to the end this time.

source: 左舷飛行ポッドの前方部分が 重大な被害を受けています
target: The forward section of the port flight pod has sustained heavy damage.

source: いい勝負をさせてくれ 頼むぜ　勝負をさせてくれ！
target: Just give me one good fight, please. One good fucking fight, please!

source: ボートまで運ぶぞ 皆、持つんだ
target: We gotta get it on a boat. Grab the warhead! Let's move!

source: お前を捕まえるのに 十分狂ってるのは俺達だけだ
target: We're the only ones crazy enough to get you out of it.

source: 中２階の彼の研究室に行った
target: I went to his lab. It was in an attic. It was...

source: 赤軍の兵士達がワラジ履きで 我軍の戦車に立向かうのを 彼は見たそうです
target: He's seen them marching along, he's seen barefooted soldiers going against tanks.

source: 悪い事に... テロリストの１人が... 身内にいる
target: And worse... because one of those terrorists... is one of our own.

source: 私と一緒だったらアイツを止まる高い 可能性があるでしょう？
target: Wouldn't we have a better chance of stopping her if I helped?

source: このクソ仕事をやってくれなんて リックは頼んでないでしょ？
target: He didn't ask him to do this little job, now, did he?

source: 重力場のせいで ミサイルが逸れる
target: The gravity field is pulling our missiles down. We gotta get closer.

source: 君は人を守りたいんだろ？
target: I never will. All you ever wanted to do was protect people.

source: ポエムでも書けそうなほど待った 誰だか知らないが
target: I don't know who you are, but you got about five seconds...

source: 致しませんでした、単に博物館の 一部だと考えておりました
target: No, sir, I just assumed that it was part of the museum.

source: 頼むよ　私の考えだ
target: - It was my idea. Don't get mad at him. - I'm serious.

source: クリス、どのような事情でゴミ収集人のような 格好をしたのか知らないが
target: I don't know how you did it dressed as a garbage man...

source: お前が言った事など クソ食らえだ
target: I don't give a shit what you think you've already told me.

source: 心の準備ができていようといまいと
target: I don't give a goddamn about the people and what they want.

source: だいぶ前にその道は閉ざした
target: We closed that door to him a long time ago. He's alone.

source: ♪防護と防衛　常に・・ ♪兄弟愛と共に立ち上がれ♪
target: When, for protection and defence, it always takes a brotherly stand together.

source: そこで 一緒にデート行こうって しつこく言いたくないし （夏美）そっか そっか （ｱﾙﾏﾝ）そうそう...
target: I don't want to bother her by asking her on a date.

source: あなたが私を許せば... 私はあなたを教えることができます それらを制御する方法
target: If you allow me, I can teach you how to control them.

source: 雇用人は彼で 最初から明確にすべきです
target: He's my client, and that has to be clear from the start.

source: あの時 私達を選んだから 今の結果がある
target: This is the result of your choice to trust us back then.

source: あなたに任せてれば 大丈夫だと思ってた
target: I thought I could count on you to watch out for her.

source: よく残ったものね 母親が赤ん坊の毛布の中に...
target: It's a miracle that survived. His mother put it into his blanket.

source: 64年に捕まって拷問を受けた あの家です　ウィンタースさん
target: The place you were held at and tortured in '64, Ms. Winters.

source: 外に出てって ライターオイルをかけて 火をつけたんだ
target: She goes outside, and she lights 'em on fire with lighter fluid.

source: 他の所へ行ったら 怒りますよ
target: I shall be extremely angry if I hear you have gone elsewhere.

source: タマネギの半分が黒く腐っていれば それは腐ったタマネギよ
target: If half an onion is black with rot, it's a rotten onion.

source: 捜査が済み次第　鍵は返すよ
target: I'll have the keys back with you as soon as we're done.

source: あなたも彼と変わらない この町の誰とも
target: You're no different from him... or from anyone else in this town.

source: 警察は兄貴も死んだか 犯人と にらんだ
target: The police thought maybe he's dead too or maybe he killed her.

source: 黄色のテープの向こうに いて下さいね ボクの手品に 注目だよ
target: Everybody stay behind the yellow tape and watch me work my magic.

source: 何故同盟を結べる相手と敵対するんだ？
target: Why risk going against the North if they would be our allies?

source: 「我々は、暴行殴打による罪が いいんじゃないかと思うんだが。 」
target: We're thinking a guilty plea to assault and battery would make sense.

source: 押し続けろ 神経に打撃を与えた
target: You hit a nerve. How long did you serve in the military?

source: シェラ・クラブやユニセフに 関わってる... ...それに誠実だわ
target: He's involved with the Sierra Club, UNICEF and he's a sincere feminist.

source: 俺を信じてくれればよかった
target: You should have told me about this. You should have trusted me.

source: 正しく武装してなければ おまえ達をリングには　上がらせない
target: I'm not gonna put you in that cage unless you're properly armed.

source: セクター７ってどこにある？
target: i'm the one who asks questions around here. not you, young man!

source: 実を言うと条件がまだ合わない
target: Well, tell you the truth, we'd be looking at a bit more.

source: - ウィルは彼女に催眠術をかけるよう頼んだ、 記憶を戻すために。
target: He asked her to hypnotize him, so he could recover his memories.

source: あと数時間で 時間切れです
target: 'With hours to go, time is running out for the security services.

source: 鎮静剤を与えよう 過労でガタがきてる
target: I'll give her a sedative-- stop her body from working too hard.

source: 紙幣さえ使わなければいいと 小銭を山ほどつぎこんでしまう
target: He wasted change on slot machines, but he'd never risk bank notes.

source: 傷跡が残るでしょう あの出来事を伝える
target: She'll have a scar and a hell of a story to tell.

source: 知らない間に、 チンピラがノルドバーグを殺そうとした
target: Next thing we know, some thug tries to knock him off. Maybe.

source: 俺達にとって 成功へのチケットだ
target: This stuff right here... this is our ticket to the big time...

source: きみの好きな下町食堂で ミモザをたくさん飲むって約束したろ？
target: And I promised you bottomless mimosas at that bistro you love downtown.

source: ーサムを悪魔に渡した ー嘘よ！
target: She gave him to the Devil in the wood! - They lie!

source: カップを手にしない君を 見慣れていたが
target: I've grown accustomed to seeing you without the cup in your hand.

source: シグナルの三角測量で場所を割り出せるよう 携帯電話をここに残した
target: He left his cell phone here so we could triangulate its signal.

source: 人目を忍んで 科学的証拠を集めている 研究者がいる
target: This is scientific evidence from well-known researchers forced to work in secret.

source: ピンダーも合流させろ
target: Tell Ms. Pinder to get her ass in gear and join us.

source: 制服など所詮飾りだ
target: A little less tin on my uniform is the least of it.

source: 金庫の内部構造を見る事ができる ダイヤルを回しながら
target: I can see the safe's internal mechanisms while I turn the dial.

source: 今　力がなくなった そして　地面に横たわる
target: Now his strength is finished, and he lies down on the ground.

source: 私はあなたにそのサポートを与えた、 深刻な政治資本コストで。
target: I gave you that support, at the cost of serious political capital.

source: 一件落着の事件にするんだ
target: 'Cause we got a way of doing things so they stay done.

source: 300)}破碎的心能否重新拾起 300)}心を拾って集められるか 300)}何人的呼唤 幻化为耳鸣
target: The voice of someone calling out changed into ringing in my ears

source: ええ　ならなかった その時は　アレかと思ったから
target: Well, no. At the time, I thought it was, you know, passion.

source: ヴァンペルトは　サンフランシスコ警察から ファイルと物的証拠を提出させて
target: Van Pelt, bring in all the S.F.P.D. files and any physical evidence.

source: 最初に学ぶのは 自分達を守ること
target: You know, the first thing we are taught is to defend ourselves.

source: 緊急警備隊員によると 犯人たちは車を捨てて―
target: Okay, First Response Team says that the assailants' vehicle has been abandoned.

source: それに２人は すぐにそこを出ないと
target: So, in the meantime, you two need to get out of there.

source: 俺はそれで森を抜けて 君達と再会だ
target: I'll take them through the woods, there's a path. I'll show you.

source: ディレクターのルールで... 全くBGMがなくて - 信憑性のために 自然光だけ
target: Rules for a director... no background music, only natural light, for authenticity.

source: しかし、私はまだ信じられません
target: Now forgive me, prime minister, But I'm finding that hard to believe.

source: ベガが容疑者の男を発見した
target: It was at this point that Vega spotted two of our suspects.

source: 交通カメラの映像は 削除されてた
target: I hacked into the surveillance server, but the files had been deleted.

source: 台風に生き残った、可愛いクマさんよ、レーチェル。
target: Then you have an awesome bear that survived the stormy sea, Rachel.

source: ジェームズの写真と生年月日が載ってた。 でも、名前はゲリー・ミッラーだった。
target: It had James' picture and birthday but his name said Gary Miller.

source: 私も何かを隠そうとする時 同じ事をいたします
target: I do the same thing sometimes when I'm trying to hide something.

source: "素晴らしい所よ 静かで みんないい人達"って
target: "Oh, it's just fine. It's quiet and the people are real nice."

source: 小屋から煙が出てるの見て 盗人だと思ったんだ
target: I saw the smoke from the house... I thought it was robbers.

source: 写真には２０％以上の 組織が残ってますね
target: There's at least 20% more tissue on the remains in the photos.

source: あれは　確実に患者の言いがかりで 裁判には勝ったんでしょ？
target: That was clearly a false accusation. You won the case, didn't you?

source: 妹も身綺麗にさせておくわ
target: And my sister promises not to give you any more dirty looks.

source: 3人で何らかの 方法を考え出す
target: The three of us will come up with some kind of way.

source: 前に見たのは８年か９年前だ ああじゃなかった
target: Last time I saw it, it was 8 or 9 years ago.

source: 誘拐されたとかでは ないだろうが
target: I'd say, I don't know, she'd been abducted or something like that.

source: あんたはどうやって上り詰めるのか？ それは私よりも上なのか？
target: "And how high can she climb, and is it higher than me?"

source: テイト 空想を始めよう 2年前　3年前 いつ頃かな？
target: So, Tate, these fantasies started two years ago, three years ago, when?

source: そして、私たちは友達になるつもりです 私たちはあなたを追放するつもりです。 （リップスマックス）
target: And we're going to be friends and we're going to ostracize you.

source: 彼らのあらゆる動き、すべての言葉を知ることは素晴らしいことではないでしょうか？
target: Wouldn't it be great to know their every move, their every word?

source: ケーンさん　彼女はもはや海兵隊員ではありません 彼女は殺人者です
target: MR. KANE, SHE IS NO LONGER A MARINE. SHE IS A MURDERER.

source: ほら なぜ君はネイサンから 管理パスワードを受け入れなかった？ つまり　どういう事だ？
target: Here. _ Why did you not accept the admin password from Nathan?

source: 彼の親族か家族の... 誰かが見つかったのか？
target: Has anyone found out if he has next of kin or family?

source: 衣装の検品をしていたんだ、 コスプレしないか？
target: I just got a shipping of costumes. You wanna play dress up?

source: 俺がお前なら諦めて...
target: Max, if I were you. I'm going to go from here, now ...

source: 協力するっつったの ファインプレーだよ
target: That was good thinking on your part that you said you'd cooperate.

source: 理由は軍隊で最もささいな事で 私を否定するためなのか？
target: Why would that fool deny me even the smallest excess of troops?

source: お二人に子供は？
target: I have to ask this. Did you and Derek have any children?

source: 失礼ですけどホームズさん ジョンの事は良くご存知の筈よ
target: Well with all due respect, Mr. Holmes, You know John very well.

source: あとで じっくり 話を聞かせてもらう
target: Manager Kaise will have a lot of explaining to do later on.

source: 逮捕に近づいた 朝よりもな
target: At least we're closer to catching him than we were this morning.

source: この"ミスト"は 世界で最も強い麻薬だ
target: The Mist may well be the most powerful drug in the world.

source: ぼくらのリアルな夢を見たよ
target: So, I had a very vivid dream the other night about us.

source: 邪悪な事を引き起こす 自然の力を
target: A force of nature capable of giving rise to all things wicked?

source: 彼女はレベル8のエージェント資格を偽造し
target: She used the lead agent's credentials to fake a Level 8 clearance.

source: 計略が1つだけとは思えない
target: The Espheni are far too clever to rely on just one strategy.

source: ♪* したがって、へつらいを言うと私に伝えさせる、どのように(ちょうど)あなたに罰金を科する、である、はい*
target: *So let me tell you honey just how fine you are, yes*

source: ２,３週間前のことだ エディと俺が　奴の車の中で仕事をしてたら
target: A couple weeks back,Eddie and me were in his car doing business.

source: 始めましょう 準備はいい？ その鏡取ってくれる？
target: We good to go, everyone? Honey, hand me that mirror, will you?

source: 2人は、それがエイリアンに関わるものかもしれないと・・・ たぶん、方程式。
target: Couple of people think it might be alien ... possibly an equation.

source: 質より人気という付加価値に 弱い人間が 腐るほどいるの
target: There are tons of guys that prefer popular chicks over quality ones.

source: リタはリバープラザ・ビルの 清掃係だった
target: Rita Coronado worked as a cleaning lady at the River Cross Plaza.

source: 画像に埋め込まれた 位置情報を調べます
target: I'll see if there's a GPS embedded in one of these JPEGs.

source: ウィリアムは常に その力について話してた
target: William always talked a lot about the powers Cortexiphan children might have.

source: 今、帰ろうとしている クリストファーも元気？
target: I'm on my way right now. Are you all right with Christopher?

source: 君の実力を みせてもらおう
target: Let's go and see if you've got what it takes. That's right.

source: ヌードル・タワー火災に 目を通しました
target: Like at the Nodell Tower fire, which I've been reading up on.

source: このリストを思い出した
target: Well, here's the list. I was looking at it the other day.

source: どういう風に彼は... 俺たちを助けようとしたんだ
target: I mean, how-- how did he... he was trying to help us.

source: 言葉が出なかった ハッキリ確信している ようだったから
target: And I didn't know what to say, because he seemed so convinced.

source: 君がよくなったと聞けば スカイラーも喜ぶよ
target: Well, Skyler will be very happy to hear that you're feeling better.

source: 収監されたとでも思ってか?
target: I'm lookin' at federal time 'cause I stole a cell phone, seriously.

source: 免許証を見せて下さい これはあなたの車ですか？
target: We need to see your I.D. You the owner of this vehicle?

source: さぁ歩き続けて 彼らはなにもしないよ ヴィンス、警察を呼んでくれ
target: Just keep walking, honey. They won't do nothing. Vince, call the police.

source: レッド・ジョンが　パンザーを殺すことを 招待状のようなものだと 受け取っていたら？
target: What if Red John took murdering Panzer as some kind of invitation?

source: 倉庫の扉は安物らしい
target: Well, it looks like they're made out of some pretty cheap shit.

source: 彼と過ごした時間 彼が出征する迄だけど
target: I mean having him in my life, those years before he left.

source: パイルに載せろ、持って行け
target: Put them over in that pile and get them out of here.

source: ええ　アパートが見つかるまで 泊めて貰ってるんです
target: Yeah, Ben's been putting me up until I can find a place.

source: 爆発に巻き込まれずに ドアを破ることができる
target: Big enough to get us in, small enough not to kill us.

source: でも、ウーン... あなたと 友人に会った時から 全ての状況が変わった
target: But, um... since I met you and our friends, that's all changed.

source: でも 本当は 支店長の妻として もっと支えなければいけないのに 私の至らない分
target: I know I should be more involved in supporting him but right?

source: うわべは 君に劣るかもしれないが
target: I may lack your form, but at least I have some substance.

source: 彼はブラックウッド卿が墓から 出て来るのを見たと言っている
target: - The witness states that he saw, lord Blackwood, rise from the grave.

source: それでいいわ でも 指は使わないで... でないと匂いが...
target: But don't use your fingers because... you know, then they smell like...

source: あなたのファイルを読んだ 局とうまくいかなったようね
target: I read your file. I know you don't play well with others.

source: ジョンの言うように ヒックスを使用できると？
target: And you're willing to take John's word that you can trust Hicks?

source: ついでに　私の服も 一緒に洗ってちょうだい
target: And wash the clothes I just took off while you're at it.

source: 戦闘の試練の為でヨーダを誘ってないよ
target: I did not request Yoda's presence here to test him in battle.

source: ええやん、ちょっと頭倒して 口開けたってえな
target: For God's sake, just lean your head back and open your mouth.

source: 金を支払ったからといって 友情が減ずるわけではない
target: Just because I pay you for your services doesn't diminish our friendship.

source: ダシュコフ家の 彼女は退学にします
target: The other members of the Dashkov family are removing her from school.

source: そこにあるが なにかわからない
target: Something's wrong with the world. You don't know what, but it's there.

source: 警官はマイケル・コンロンの家での 銃撃事件の報告に応答しました
target: Officers responded to a report of a shooting at Michael Conlon's house.

source: 俺のケツもあそこまで 飛べばいいんだが・・・
target: Boy, I wish I could lift my arse up to do that.

source: ♪ if I can, 'cause it makes me feel like I'm a man ♪
target: ♪ if I can, 'cause it makes me feel like I'm a man ♪

source: あなたの忠実な軍の人が 死ぬ前にかばってあげて
target: Cover up, before your loyal army sees you bleed like a mortal.

source: やあ　ここにいます 今日　支払いができるかもしれません
target: Hi, I'm here. And I might be able to pay you today.

source: ケニーはデカ過ぎだな
target: Hey, Kenny, I think you got a little too big for this.

source: 私はロキ アスガルドから来た 偉大な目的の為に
target: I am Loki, of Asgard and I am burdened with glorious purpose.

source: それで戦争がなんの役にも 立たないということを知るでしょう
target: So you will finally understand why war is nothing to hope for.

source: きっと見張ってるぞ
target: Get down out of sight. They may be watching all the way.

source: ウィンドサーファーになるって言ったら？
target: I was quitting journalism to become a... I don't know-- a windsurfer?

source: 探すのを　手伝ってあげる。 ひとつだけ、条件付き。
target: I will help you find the things you want, on one condition.

source: どのようにして、信頼性のない人に 給料を払って正当化するの？
target: How do you justify paying a salary to such an unreliable person?

source: 時々　不運な事故後のイメージを うまく取り繕うこともしますから
target: Occasionally we have to help them smooth over their image after mishaps.

source: 俺達 KLG! あら　あれ マディソン・モントゴメリよ
target: We are KLG! [DANCE MUSIC PLAYING LOUDLY ON SPEAKERS] [CROWD SPEAKING INDISTINCTLY]

source: ごめんよ ボクは教会について あまり知らないんだ
target: I only ask because I wasn't brought up with much church experience.

source: ダスティン ウォールって言うんだ
target: Hey, Dustin. Show him the Wall. I'm just calling it the Wall.

source: この事件を　チームとして捜査できて とても嬉しいよ
target: Well, I'm so glad we got the "a" team working this case.

source: FBIとDEAの合同捜査だった
target: Oh, well, Rio Bravo was a joint task force -- F.B.I., D.E.A.

source: ーとにかくおしえろ ーここにあるとも
target: - so give me the fucking information. - Here's the information, right here.

source: 女のアソコに撃つと　どうなるか 見たいだろ？
target: Did you ever see what it can do to a woman's pussy?

source: 私が優しい注意を 受けたと仮定すれば 銃弾はない
target: That is assuming I get the friendly warning and not a bullet.

source: この王子があの王妃と 一生をするって想像つくか？
target: Can you imagine the prince married the queen for the intire life?

source: 呼び戻せた 小さなことが 重大な手がかりになるかも
target: The smallest detail that you can recall could be a vital clue.

source: ジェシーを助けてみなきゃ
target: If I can help him out, that's what I got to do.

source: 場所は知らない でも　きれいで穏やか
target: I don't know where I was, but it was beautiful and peaceful.

source: だって、話すと 任務から外されるでしょ?
target: No, if I had told you, you would have had me benched.

source: 私の言うとおりに動け
target: I can guide you, but you must do exactly as I say.

source: よければ　おふたりの問題が 何だったのか　話してもらえませんか？
target: If you don't mind me asking, what were the problems between you?

source: 死体はそれぞれ傷から 2種類の撃たれ方を
target: Yeah,both bodies received multiple rounds from a variety of ranges and angles.

source: 私が知っているのは 外交官ナンバーの車で来た事だけ
target: All I know is he drives a car with the diplomatic plates.

source: 彼女は上手くいかないと 大丈夫と言った奴は死んだ
target: She said the plan won't work. The guy who did is dead.

source: ただ 泊めてくれた礼を 先に言いたかった
target: Hey, I just wanted to say thanks for letting me stay here.

source: あなたが選んだ介添え人のドレス
target: I really liked that original dress you picked at the bridal store.

source: こんな世界に住みたくない 誠実さもなしで
target: And I don't want to live in a world with no integrity.

source: IRAの闘争に 協力してほしい
target: We're really deep in it, Jimmy, and we're gonna need your help.

source: 説得力のある 状況証拠がいくつか揃った ご主人を殺害する 意思を示すもの
target: A convincing set of circumstances, signalling your intention to murder your husband.

source: アンディ　私が どの位ココで　№1司会者だと思う？
target: Andy, how long have I been number one anchor in the city.

source: 良かったわ ２人とも元気そうで
target: I'm so glad you're both alive and not at each other's throats.

source: 七つの王国には 貴方を襲う危険を冒す 男は居ません
target: There's not a man in the Seven Kingdoms would risk hurting you.

source: こんな場所で見かけるのは めずらしい・・
target: So rare to see such dogs in this kind of bad neighborhood.

source: 使い方が解れば 無限の力を引き出せる
target: If we can figure out how to tap it, maybe unlimited power.

source: 私が想像してたFBIの仕事と
target: It's not what I thought working for the FBI would be like.

source: それともこれは我々がしませんでした皮質感染_から瘢痕化されています...
target: Or maybe this is scarring from a cortical infection that we didn't...

source: だけどここにあった銃より 多くは望めないかも
target: May not have as many guns as were in here, but--

source: カルプ先生に 気をつけないと
target: Ms. Karp is the one that we should be focused on.

source: 分子が早く動くと 自然発火が起きるね？
target: Moving molecules so quickly that you can create spontaneous combustion, yes.

source: 働き者だが ここで長く働く気はない
target: You don't mind the work, but you're not here for long.

source: 周辺道路を走る車の―
target: Set up a perimeter wide as possible on those three roads.

source: 家に薄光をもたらし 次の所有者のために装飾します
target: I'll make the house gleam and glitter for the new owners.

source: 最後まで生き残るのは ゴキブリだって。
target: What is it they say? Only cockroaches will survive the apocalypse.

source: ボーディがここから送信する 誘導は彼がやる
target: Bodhi will send a signal from here. He's patching us in.

source: カーラと私の意識の融合は、 今までしたことなく、 すべて越えてる。
target: Merging my consciousness with Kara's is beyond anything they've ever done.

source: そこで聞きたい 覚悟があるか ユタ
target: So, the question is, are you ready for that fight, Utah?

source: 連絡で救急車が出動したわ 場所は14番街＆ホバート
target: Call just went out for an ambulance at 14th and Hobart.

target: A commander of one of the largest drug cartels in Mexico.

source: 私がスーキーの お目付け役になるわ
target: Yeah, but... I could help you keep an eye on Sookie.

source: クリスマスは百年間なかった
target: No. No, we haven't had a Christmas in a hundred years.

source: ですが 言ったでしょ 正気に返っていません
target: But I don't know, man, I don't know what I saw.

source: 悪いけど　外に行かせて
target: Who called you? I'm sorry. Will you let me go, please?

source: ジョン・アーリンは何も気付かなかった そして、死で終わった
target: Whatever Jon Arryn knew or didn't know, it died with him.

source: 普通の人間になれると？ この異常な世の中で？
target: You thought we could be decent men in an indecent time.

source: 奴らを生かせておけないと言ってたけど 間違っていない
target: When you said they don't get to live, you weren't wrong.

source: 嘘をついて、 禁止された物を戦場から取って
target: Lying about where you were, taking forbidden items from a battlefield.

source: 人生で　当たり前のことを 望んで　何が悪いのかしら
target: What's wrong with me wanting one normal thing in my life?

source: お願いだから 今度だけは自分の心配をしてくれ
target: Now, I'm begging you -- for once, look out for yourself.

source: さて、私は掘り出すだろう それをあなたに送ってください。
target: All right, I'll dig 'em up and send them to you.

source: 人生を創り直しやがったか
target: It's a hell of a life you've made for yourself, Lloyd.

source: 探しに行こう
target: And I will go to the ends of the earth to...

source: それしか ホテルを救う道ないんですもの
target: Deputy Hanzawa wouldn't happen to have a trump card would he?

source: 全て無駄だったか 旅の仲間も解散だな
target: Then it has all been in vain. The fellowship has failed.

source: シネイド・オコーナーだ 見栄えが悪くなった
target: That was Sinead O'Connor. She don't look so good no more.

source: 今回は運がよかっただけだ
target: All that prancing around could have gotten us killed. You're wrong.

source: クリウスのサービスの契約は - 独立してますので - もし彼が１人だったら
target: All janitorial services at Crius are supplied by an independent contractor.

source: あなたが"あれ"の事を話さないなら― 私が話すわ
target: Well, if you won't tell her where it is I will.

source: A3は不注意な核発射に 対する安全確保
target: A 3-pronged fail-safe in the case of an inadvertent nuclear launch.

source: すべての瞬間に さらに良き未来の可能性はある
target: In every moment, there is the possibility of a better future.

source: "そこには 死 が在るのみで 私も そこには いない"
target: There is only death here now, and I'm leaving it behind.

source: 俺が警官になって自殺すると思ってるの？
target: You think I'm gonna become a cop and get myself killed?

source: 彼を次期大統領に面会させたい
target: I need to get him in front of the President-elect, Carrie.

source: 10本あるのか？
target: - Maybe there are ten knives like that. - Maybe there are!

source: 見た人が 吐きそうになるわよ
target: People have enough trouble keeping the food down as it is.

source: 今は夕方ですし 言葉が詩的になるんです
target: I found, in the evenings, the words just poured out, so...

source: 熱いシャワーに冷たいマルガリータ
target: What I'd give for a hot shower and a cold margarita.

target: And you are gonna give Dave here a brand new condo.

source: バギーに乗せようと...
target: I tried to put him on the ATV with me and...

target: Would you be so kind as to take me to her?

target: The unknown intruder knocked out a Seven Seas Navigator maintenance worker.

source: 勝てばいい話ですよ
target: Arthur, you don't have to do this. We could still win.

source: こんなとこで死ぬことになるとはね
target: Never would have guessed this is how I was gonna die.

target: Eyes look east to the mountain, assessing... wondering, weighing the risk.

source: 奥さんの担当医です
target: I've been caring for your wife ever since she came in.

source: ちょうどプレゼントを 開けるところだ すごいな また　こんな遺体だ
target: We did. Just in time to open the present. Oh, whoa!

source: そうですか　昨夜はどこに？
target: Okay. Uh, can you tell me where you were last night?

source: 詳しくは知らんが 思うに...
target: I don't know that much about it, but my guess is,

target: Harper put in a written request for transfer to campus housing.

source: （光る）感激してる （美咲）久しぶりに泣きそう
target: -This is making me want to cry. -I'm seriously moved. -Why?

source: うわ言を言ってる 具合は　どうだ？
target: He is talking like this. What is the matter with him?

source: これで逃げられない
target: No way those two get out without going past us first.

source: 前回　身代金を要求された時と同じように？
target: The last time you were asked to finance her safe return?

source: あなたが売ったダイヤは 盗品だった
target: The diamond you sold out was part of the stolen shipment.

source: 君が軽率な口を利いたのは これで二度目だ ミス・グレンジャー
target: That's the second time you've spoken out of turn, Miss Granger.

source: よし シスコ ケイトリン 罠を考えてくれ
target: Cisco, Caitlin, let's start engineering a trap. - You got it.

source: 何とかもっと 急いでもらえない？
target: Excuse me, isn't there any way that you can rush it?

source: サンドラを知ってたの 警察学校で一緒だったから
target: I heard. I knew Sandra. We were at Police College together.

source: 作家 花木ゆずの いちばんの理解者は僕だからね
target: I understand the author Yuzu Hanaki better than anyone, after all.

source: 親友まで殺したんだ！ みんなの為に！
target: I killed my best friend for you people, for Christ's sake!

source: バッキー、ありがとう。 でも一人でもいい。
target: Thank you, Buck, but I can get by on my own.

source: パートナーがいたと言ったのを覚えてるか？
target: Do you remember I told you that I had a partner?

source: 誰もあんたの弟に 麻薬を強制してない
target: Because nobody, nobody forced your brother to get involved with drugs.

source: 仕事とジムの両立は難しい
target: It is difficult to try to manage work and the kids.

source: 聞いて 許可がおりたとしても きっとうまくいかないわ
target: Honey, listen, even if they said yes, it would never work.

source: 後ろを向いてくれ、どうも
target: Do me a favor-- turn your guys' heads, please. Thank you.

target: - I seem to remember you were always good at cahooting, Cynthia.

source: 彼はクリーンだった
target: He wasn't a user; there were no drugs in his system.

source: 今までで最高のパーティー
target: This is the most beautiful shower I have ever been to.

target: When I first joined S.H.I.E.L.D. I thought I was going straight.

target: Betty's trying to crack the source of the gang's web-site feed.

source: あなたに勝利は無い
target: It's not a win if you can't get away with it.

target: They've somehow created a hyper-lightspeed weapon... built within the planet itself.

source: お前の思惑通りには いかないとな
target: You tell her you can't get blood out of a stone.

source: 俺達よりも 他の皆がだろう?
target: The real question is how would everyone else in Division react?

source: ズボンに靴
target: It's all here in the winter catalog. His pants. His shoes.

source: ビールは君が飲んでくれ
target: You can actually have the beer, that's for you, my tip.

source: 俺の彼女は　M14
target: I don't want no teenage queen I just want my M14

source: 誰がブロディを説得できるかと言えば 彼女だろうな
target: If anyone can talk Brody down off a ledge, she can.

source: いいか、デレクはやっかいごととは 無関係だ でも今回はな...
target: Look, Derek is no stranger to trouble, but this time, I...

source: ちょっと、怒りを私にぶつける必要ないじゃない。
target: Hey! You don't have to take your anger out on me.

source: 待て、待て、他にもここから逃げる 方法があるはずだ
target: Wait. Wait. There has to be another way out of here.

source: 恐怖を餌に 更に巨大に 強力になったからだ
target: Feeding on the fear of others, he grew larger, more powerful.

source: その稟議書は まだ十分に確認しておりません
target: That request for approval hasn't been reviewed yet. You're too late.

source: 真のヒューマンニタリアン賞は メルリン家族 妻のレベッカです
target: The true humanitarian in the Merlyn family was my wife Rebecca.

source: 先に外れた俺のせいだ
target: I went out of phase first. - It was my mistake.

source: 私には秘密の恋人がいます・・・ そう　１ダースもです
target: I had a secret love... in fact, a dozen of them.

source: いいかい　これは40年以上にわたって 私のライフワークになったが
target: Look, this has been my life's work for over 40 years.

source: そういう態度がイヤなのよ
target: You don't get to act like that, Marty, or like this.

source: クリス　彼女らはお前の相棒じゃない 売春婦と目撃者だ　来てくれ
target: They're not your sidekicks, Chris. They're prostitutes and witnesses. Come on.

source: 見て　エリオット これをお口に入れるよ
target: Now you look here, Elliot. This is going in your mouth.

source: 犯人は知ってたのか？
target: I wonder how long it took angel maker to identify them.

source: 誰か顕微鏡を取りに行け それでデマルコ氏の ペニスを見つける
target: Someone go get a microscope so we locate Mr. DeMarco's pecker.

target: I thought we were through with all the subterfuge, mr. Taylor.

source: お前を助ける方法は 無いとな
target: She said there was no way for us to help you.

source: 名誉のために 義務のために 栄光のために 我々は行進する
target: For honor's sake, for duty's sake, for glory's sake, we march.

source: ミシェル・スミス、アトランタ大会96年 尿検体の改ざんで告発
target: Michelle Smith, Atlanta '96. Accused of tampering with a urine sample.

source: 待ってくれ　今 置くから
target: Hold on, okay? I'm just gonna... I'm gonna set this down.

source: 総監の行った対策には 反発も多く
target: A number of policies that he enacted as commissioner were unpopular.

target: Tell me, does the Skynet defense system mean anything to you?

source: また私を 信頼して頂きたいんです
target: My only hope is that I can gain your trust back.

source: マーフィーが居なくても問題は起こるようだ
target: That's Murphy for you. Causing trouble when he's not even here.

source: ショウの住む世界にルールはない
target: Shaw lives in a world that doesn't play by your rules.

target: Yes, sir, and that's me. I want to handle this pitch.

source: このことを誰かに話したければ
target: If you need to talk about all this with someone, buddy.

source: メディアに君の写真を 公開する
target: We will release a clean photograph of you to the media.

source: アメリカ人が爆弾を作るための 材料を供給しているんだ
target: The Americans have been supplying them with materials to make bombs.

target: Same as the old one, without the goodwill that you'd accrued.

source: ニマを 探し出したいの
target: Bottom line is, Raina, we both want to find your sister.

source: それ以来 何度も取引した
target: Since then, we did business in a number of different occasions

source: 試合会場で会う方が良さそうだ！
target: It's best we meet up on the field at tonight's match!

source: ハルはいつもピューターのマグで ビールを飲んでいたの
target: Hal used to have his beer out of a pewter mug.

source: 剣は機能しなくなる
target: Look, when the Mark is gone, the Blade can't operate. Win-win.

source: どこを動かす？ 中露は地政学的に近すぎますから 反対どころか推進しています
target: Not China or Russia because they're too geopolitically close to us.

source: 〝あなたは次のどれ？ ヒューゴに女装をさせたわ
target: I would let Hugo cross dress, I let him wear make-up.

source: 「多くのヤツが、オレに なりたくて、死んでいった」
target: Lot of people had to die for me to be me.

source: あんな態度は経験済みだ
target: That's not the first time he's pulled that stunt on me.

source: 私は裁判所の判断に強い異議が ありますが 私は受け入れます
target: While I strongly disagree with the court's decision, I accept it.

source: 電波を追われたから壊した
target: They were tracking our cell phones. We had to dump them.

source: ここには新しい考えも 入れるべきだ
target: - I think we should just call this a... difference of opinion.

source: 俺は白い槍と妻を要求する
target: I claim the White Spear. And with it my woman Evolet

source: なぜスーパーヒーローは 漫画にしか存在しないのかわかった
target: Suddenly, I understood why super heroes only exist in the comics

source: ネルの思惑にのせられたんでしょ でも　彼は私を選んだ
target: He flirted with the notion of Nell, but he chose me.

source: 死因については　何かわかった？
target: Uh, well, what do we know about the cause of death?

source: 等分なら　今晩のおごりは誰だ？
target: But if we divide them evenly, who will buy tonight's drinks?

source: でも皆　危ないんだ　今行かないと
target: But the penguins are in danger! We have to go now!

source: 俺が着いた時は "ビールが冷蔵庫に"
target: When I got here, she was like, "Beer's in the fridge."

source: まさか　32年病欠なんてなかった
target: Come on, you haven't had a sick day in 32 years.

source: 子供達のベビーシッターに
target: The kids are at the babysitter. - I'll take care of...

source: 私はケーシー 私をそこに連れて行って欲しい
target: My name's Casey. And I want you to take me there.

source: なあ 分かってくれ
target: Okay, listen to me. I got to fill you in quick.

source: 夢をあきらめるな って
target: "don't let fear stop you from doing the thing you love."

source: その君に 私の魂を 与えよう
target: I would give my soul to be as you are now.

source: また時空の壁を 破れるかも知れない。 そして家に帰れる。
target: I might just break the dimensional barrier and get back home.

source: その必要はない ピアースのクレジットカード口座に侵入した
target: No need. I was able to hack Pierce's credit card account.

source: よくわからないんだけど エラはコンピュータから 手が出てきたって言ってるの
target: Ella said she saw a hand coming out of the computer.

source: 私の恐怖は現実となった スタークはお前を奴らのものにした
target: My fears have come true-- the Starks have made you theirs.

source: 15年ぶりに 警察へ来たの
target: Well, I haven't been inside a police station in 15 years.

source: コイツをいじめたヤツらも よく考えた方がいい
target: Whoever dares to torment him had better think long and hard.

source: 僕の図書カードは まだ使えるかな？
target: Do you think my library card will still be valid, Kate?

source: 君が八歳の時から ずっと君を見てきた
target: I've been watching over you since you were eight years old.

source: 敵の大部隊がこっちに向かってる
target: We got a large group of bad guys headed our way.

source: ロザノ ２週間前に母親が死んで
target: His mother passed away. He left two weeks ago. John Lozano.

source: あんたの死体で あいつを殺してやる！
target: I'll kill you and kill her with your fucking dead body!

source: 人間だな 銃を下ろしてくれないか？
target: If he's human, could you have him put the gun down?

source: ３ノットで 1 時間 その後 通常に戻せ
target: Continue with three knots for one hour, then proceed as normal.

source: ああ、なにせイザベル・ロシェフは 明らかに薬を注射されていた
target: Yeah, especially since Isabel Rochev was clearly injected with the stuff.

source: 確認するよ　心配するな
target: I'll check on that. Don't worry about that. Things go down.

source: お陰で安心だわ、あなたはとてもクールよ
target: I feel safer just knowing you're there. You seem so cool.

source: ペルーへ送るはずでは ありませんでしたか？
target: It's just, I thought you were sending him to Peru. But...

source: 衛星画像で彼らが... 追跡不能になった事を確認しました
target: The satellite imagery suggests they are unable to continue the pursuit.

source: いつ決めた？ 夏だけか？
target: When did you decide to go to California for the summer?

source: 女が欲しくない？
target: - I'm not gonna do it. - Don't you ever get horny?

source: アローの友人は 我々の友人だ
target: Any friend of The Arrow's is a friend... - Hell, yes.

source: 4時までに救出しないと殺される
target: If we don't find him by 4:00 p.m., he'll be killed.

source: 私は知らない。 /そんなこと言って ホテルの部屋で、右でしたか？
target: I don't know./ You said it was in hotel room, right?

source: このメールは世界を救う と言っていた
target: He told me this email was going to save the world.

source: ああ　ここにいた少年は？
target: - Yes, what happened to the boy who was in this bed?

source: それで、 私が逃げたことで、 敵対行為とされてしまった。
target: and that my jumping would be viewed as a hostile act.

source: 一部のダム視察官は − 見事に通過できた
target: And yet some dam inspector passed the job with flying colors.

source: 期待には応え兼ねるかもしれません、サー それでも、宜しくお願いします
target: I could not ask for a better man, sir. But, please,

source: 正道を目指してた
target: Sometimes misguided... But his heart was always in the right place.

source: いいえ もっと早く気付くべきでした 少し話をしましょう
target: No, no, I should have realized. Uh, may we speak privately?

source: ジャイルス。 。 。
target: So, Giles... got anything that can make this day any worse?

source: 誰も使ってないから
target: They aren't using it so you can do whatever you want.

source: あなたには才狽ｪある気がするわ
target: Got a feeling you'd be good at this sort of work.

source: 自分は逃げ方も失敗しているように感じさせられる
target: You make me feel like I'm failing at brooding over failing.

source: 彼らと話したいなら...
target: I mean if you want to, you can talk to 'em.

source: 「もう何も有りません」 と少女は言いました
target: 'I have nothing left that I could give,' answered the girl.

source: シャロンは　役者やスタッフと 何か揉めてたの？
target: Was Sharon having any trouble with the, uh, cast or crew?

source: どうしてサードを証人に しないの？
target: Why don't we put Saad on the stand and find out?

source: 売るだと？
target: Come on. Like you're really going to sell your dad's gym.

source: 未来のCPUが 必要だったというわけだ
target: You needed the CPU from the future to make it run.

source: それで何を調べる？
target: If the other guy was a virologist, what do you do?

source: だか、あんたには関係無い 問題は俺との契約だ
target: All you need to know is that we had a deal.

source: 下だったらね　屋根だよ　屋根
target: If its lower, throw up onto the roof (Japanese teeth custom)

source: 穏やかな声を聞きたくて
target: You know, I just kind of felt like a quiet voice.

source: 君が話しているのは 人々を巨大なウイルスに感染させる 男性についてだ
target: You're talking about a man who infects people with giant viruses.

source: ボクシングの為に生まれ 才能があったからだ
target: I was born to be a fighter. I had some talent.

source: 二人に同時に答えて欲しい質問だ
target: And I want you to answer it at the same time.

source: 彼にここにいると伝える 残りの素材。
target: Tell him to be here with the rest of the material.

source: 市長... ２人で話を
target: Mr. mayor, you can't... - no, get out. both of you.

source: 妻のスージーは 骨がんで亡くなりました
target: My wife's name was Suzie, and she died of bone cancer.

source: あなたは一晩で一生分の冒険を与えてくれた
target: You've given me the adventure of a lifetime in one night.

source: この投資家に興味を持たせられれば 私はいるでしょう
target: I will be if I can get this angel investor interested.

source: お前もデカイ リブを食べたいのか？
target: How bout you, darlin'. You're a big rib eater, aren't you?

source: 食堂に何があるか見てくるよ
target: I'll see what Chef has on the menu. Be right back.

source: 問題は　処理されていると彼は言っていた
target: He just said that the problem was being taken care of.

source: ジョン 何かを信じてるなら 何がいけないかわからない？
target: John, if you believe in something, how can it be wrong?

source: 完璧さは求めてない 私は言っただけ
target: I didn't ask for everything, George. I asked for one thing.

source: 自由人が闘技場で 戦うなんて聞いたことがない
target: I've never heard of free men fighting in the pits.

source: 夜陰草の抽出液です 効き目と同等に危険です
target: Essence of Nightshade is as dangerous as it is efficacious.

source: 私は、学生の時から、ゾルダに来るのが夢だったの。
target: I've dreamed of visiting Zloda since I was a schoolgirl.

source: 次に何をするか 少なくとも教えて?
target: Can you at least tell me what we're doing next?

source: まだ何も 捜索チームの範囲は拡大してる
target: - No, nothing yet, but search teams are expanding the perimeter.

source: オメコ野郎共、誰が最初に頭をカチ割られたい？
target: Which one of you cunts wants to be skull-fucked first?

source: 裏切ったけど...
target: And then he betrayed us to gain favor with them.

source: そして責任者 最高指導者の警備を担当
target: They are the heads of our Supreme Leader's personal security.

source: そのバッジには 規則や規定が伴ってる
target: There are rules and regulations that come with that badge.

source: 私はこの目ではっきりと そのガスを目撃しました
target: Sir, I have seen that gas with my own eyes.

source: この男と同じセルブロックに私を置く。
target: Put me in the same cell block as this guy.

source: 君の仲間を殺したのは 事実だ
target: It is true that they killed one of your associates.

source: 今回の事は　我海軍がやらねばならない 我々は不明の敵に　相対する事になる
target: This is the situation, Marines. We face an unknown enemy.

source: 妹が友人の家を抜け出して 駆け落ちしました
target: My youngest sister has left all her friends, has eloped,

source: サッサと決めろ
target: More than anything, I just want this moment to end.

source: MI6からあなたを殺せと 指令を受けたわ
target: MI6 has just given me a contract to kill you.

source: フェリスさん　ようこそ アニマル・パーク・アドベンチャーに
target: Mr. Ferris. Welcome back to the Rosemoor Animal Park Adventure.

source: もちろん わざとではないが
target: I mean, not on purpose, of course, but he just...

source: でも男は壁の外で 待っていて
target: But your men will have to stay outside the wall.

source: やめろ　君はまだ子供だ
target: Kid, just put your hands up. You're just a kid.

source: チーム・ディレクターはドーピング認めており 無秩序にならないように監督した...
target: The team's director admits doping was supervised to avoid uncontrolled...

source: まだかまりが、あるのは 明らかだ
target: So clearly there's some unresolved conflict between you and Murphy.

source: 奥さんに何度も ─ 連絡しました ハーモンさん
target: We've made numerous attempts to contact your wife, Mr. Harmon.

source: ああ、風呂場で死んだ熊ちゃんね
target: Oh, you mean that bear that died in your tub.

source: そう言うのを私はイラクで見た
target: The odds are slim to none-- no, no, no, no.

source: その目標に向けて 歩んでいるわ
target: So, definitely on the right track to succeeding for that.

source: だが希望も残っています サッカーです
target: But there remains a glimmer of hope, and that's football.

source: ふさわしくない曲を弾いてると 思われるのが怖い？
target: Aren't you afraid the others will think your playing inappropriate.

source: ジョンソンとして やらせたい
target: I want him to make a name on his own.

source: 赤いバルブを閉じて留め金を外して ホースを外す
target: Close the red valve. Disengage the clamp. Disconnect the hose.

source: 子供たちが常に遊んでいる・・・ ・・・あまり物音を たてないでくれるかな。
target: The children are always playing yet never make a sound.

source: 早すぎる呼び出しだ 驚かせてくれるな
target: You surprise me, my son, calling me up so soon.

source: 残りの人生を刑務所で なんて御免だからね
target: I'm not spending the rest of my life in jail.

source: 大変な事になった ラゲルタが教会で スライドを見つけてた
target: I'll lose my job, my career... and probably even Harrison.

source: 知ってる出口に走りました それで、逮捕されました
target: That still doesn't explain why you were in that basement.

source: 笑ってないで 助けてくれよ！ ？
target: Could you please stop laughing and do something to help?

source: 俺達お前が考えてるような 伝説じゃないんだ
target: Maybe we're not the local legends you think we are.

source: 俺がわかるか？ グレーの息子のカイトだ
target: You know who I am and you're Gray Cortland's kid.

source: 末期の癌と分かるのは、 いい気分ではありません
target: Having terminal cancer... it's not good. "Terminal" means end point.

source: 質問はない あなたは皆を殺した
target: I don't need to ask. I know you killed them.

source: フィンチ 彼の人生が 面白くなってきたぞ
target: well,finch,I think peck's life just got a little more interesting.

source: 黒幕の名前を教えて
target: Just give me a name,gregory.I'll keep you out of this.

source: セプテンバーが あんたの為に
target: It's called a Thought Unifier. Or at least it was.

source: "ママは他の部屋に行って 私を呼んだの"
target: Mom went in the other room and she called me.

source: さぁ　本かなんかですね もしもし？
target: Uh, it's... I don't know, a book or something? Please.

source: ジョージ国王もそうだったけど 立派にやってのけた
target: Neither was King George, but one rises to the occasion.

source: 違う　アーサー王の時代に 水道水はなかった
target: No, because they didn't have running water in Arthurian times.

source: 忍耐と訓練だ
target: To use a bow and arrow requires patience and discipline.

source: 生まれた時からずっと
target: Since the day she was born, she's been very difficult.

source: っていうかだれでも人殺しになれると思う
target: And it seems to me... anyone... can be an assassin.

source: おかしいな こんな遅くには動かない
target: It's weird. They don't usually go at it this late.

source: そのために爆弾を？
target: Is that who you were gonna make the bombs for?

source: 痕跡を見つけた　島を西へ向かってる
target: I found her trail. She's headed west across the island.

source: 身長と体重が　シェリルが言った人相と一致してる
target: Height and weight would be in line with Cheryl's description.

source: 何人もの女が 入れ替わっていった
target: I've seen a dozen girls like you come and go.

source: 黒いマントを着た男を見たって
target: He said it was a guy wearing a black cape.

source: 彼はトルコ風呂で仲間に会うつもりだ
target: He's supposed to meet his pals at the Turkish Baths.

source: 君は逃亡した奴隷で 僕は弁護士だ
target: You are a runaway slave, and I am a lawyer.

source: でも　今は　彼女を助けたい
target: But for now, I'd like to try to help her.

source: 水が枯れて...
target: - We had no water and... - The water was filth.

source: あとは武器の扱いが 出来れば文句なし
target: Plus there's all these awesome weapons she could learn about

source: 話せよ 俺なら平気だ
target: You can talk to me. I won't hate a player.

source: 「訴えが通らなかったら、 その時はその時さ」
target: I could give a fuck if the charges don't stick.

source: ♪ When I heard the thunder, I could feel the rain
target: ♪ When I heard the thunder, I could feel the rain ♪

source: 子供を迎えに行って貰いたい
target: I need to have my kid picked up for practice.

source: ふたりは　有限の生命の子でなく 永遠のイメージを孕んだ
target: No mortal child was begot... but an immortal, common image.

source: 幾人かを共に地獄に連れていく
target: They bring a lot of people to hell with them.

source: パニック状態の 市を抱えているのよ
target: Another open case will put our clearance rate at 19%.

source: 良い知らせもある 世界の解放だ
target: I come with glad tidings of a world made free.

source: これが家族でなくて何だ
target: If that ain't a family, I don't know what is.

source: 俺に付いて来いと、言う積りだった。
target: I was gonna ask her to come back with me.

source: 私はすべての答えを 知っているべきだったのに
target: I'm supposed to be the one with all the answers.

source: いや 私は他の臆病者とは違う
target: No, I'm not a coward like some people I know.

source: 当時を知る方は あなただけです
target: and you're the only one still around from those days.

source: ありがとう かわいいだけじゃない
target: - Thank you, for being more than just a pretty face.

source: 話はしたくない 帰ってくれ
target: Well, I don't want to talk. You need to go.

source: ご親切なのね ちょっと待ってて
target: That's very kind of you. Give me just a sec.

source: 頭はイカれたが あとは大丈夫！
target: My head's buzzing and I'm soaked, but otherwise I'm fine.

source: ディビジョンの妨害装置だけど 改造してる
target: He's using a Division scrambler, but he's reworked the encryption.

source: いや　その時間はない
target: No, there's no time for him to learn the meters.

source: 現代の技術化社会で最高の知性なのに
target: For one of the best minds in the tech world,

source: 撮るんじゃねえ デトマー
target: No, I wasn't... Don't film me, Detmer! Don't film me.

source: 800個しか作られてない 特殊部隊用よ ダニー？
target: They only made 800 of them. For Special Forces. Danny?

source: だが途中で酷くなるかも
target: But somewhere along the line, when it gets really bad,

source: 何なの？
target: ♪ With a head full of doubt ♪ Oh, my God.

source: でも彼は　何も言わない 彼は気にしてないんだわ
target: But he hasn't, so I'm sure he's fine with it.

source: ルシファーの現在の状態では、 彼はおそらくそれらを維持することはできません
target: In Calcifer's present state, he can't possibly keep them out

source: 勝者として立ち去ったんだ それをブチ壊すな
target: You walked away as a winner. Don't fuck that up.

source: 女神がこんなことをさせるのは 正しいことなのか？
target: Is it right that a goddess should perform such labor?

source: その時は　君を容疑者として扱うことになる
target: Only then, I'll be looking at you as a suspect.

source: アリバイ作りの - 時間稼ぎだ
target: You wanted to buy yourself time to create an alibi.

source: もう一度海兵隊に復員する チャンスを与えよう
target: I'm offering you the chance to be a Marine again.

source: 隠すことはなにもない キャンドルは誰のために？
target: I've got nothing to hide. _ Who's the candle for?

source: タバコをやめたのに
target: Now you done got me back to smoking, damn it.

source: 彼なら信用できますよ ぼくの弁護士です
target: And one that's gonna trust you because he trusts me.

source: 数週間祝った 時もあったわ
target: There was a time when you would celebrate for weeks.

source: 長く待てば待つほど 状況は悪化する
target: The longer we wait, The worse it's going to get.

source: 更生で開かれたインターネットを維持する連合に参加する。
target: Join the coalition to keep the Internet fair and open!

source: もう 生き返れないのよ！
target: The ARQ is off. If you die, you die forever.

source: 分かるんですけど... 嫌なもんですよ...
target: - I know, but... it left a prick in my heart.

source: コテージで 始めたんだ
target: I started doing them when we were at The Cottages.

source: 俺は彼らがどこにいるか 決して言わない
target: I am never going to tell you where they are.

source: 話をしてただけだ まだ終わってない
target: Well, we just spoke to Caroline at the Justice Department.

source: 子供は頭部の縫合を
target: And the kid in five needs stitches. 4-centimeter head laceration.

source: だからエルサは お前達を連れてきた うちの看板になるんだ
target: That's why Elsa brought you here-- be our headline act.

source: 彼女を見つけよう それで...
target: AND NOW WE HAVE A CHANCE TO SAVE HER, SO...

source: - いや、まあ長い話んだんだけど。
target: No, it was just... It was a long story, bro.

source: その銃特有の跡を 薬きょうに付けます
target: Each one leaves its own markings on the cartridge casing.

source: ふざけんなよ！
target: I didn't fucking do shit to you, what the fuck!

source: おれのあごを殴りやがった
target: Hit me in the jaw. He was a big kid.

source: 《今は 何言うてるか分からんけどな》 《そのうち必ず分かるようになる》
target: but there will surely come a time when you will.

source: ケン　インターネットの側面　新しい考え ツイッター　アラブの春　全部だ
target: Ken, the internet, new paradigm, Twitter, Arab spring, all that.

source: ベストバイで5 ,300ドル 買い物されてますよね？
target: Can you verify a $5,300 charge at Best Buy yesterday?

source: この中に仲間がいるだろう
target: Oh, let me guess, you've got friends in here, too.

source: 接続サービスが格段に進歩し 地球は狭くなった
target: Earth has grown smaller yet greater as connectivity has grown.

source: 二階に安全な場所があります
target: Sir, we have a secure room for you, right upstairs.

source: 数日間で戻ってくる。

source: 家に入り込んで盗んだでしょ？
target: You come into my house and you steal from us?

source: それしか気にしてないんだろう そんなことはないわ

source: ステューを初めて見たとき 正直あまり乗り気にはなれなかった

target: Her babies need her. We gotta make sure they're together.

source: でも赤ちゃんになって
target: But... you don't have to cry to be my baby.

source: あの猿は、５百年間 風呂に入ってない。

source: 私が美しい生き物を育てるのに とても長くかかったわ
target: It's been too long since I raised my beautiful creatures.

source: このままだとF5クラスの竜巻に発達するぞ。
target: If it keeps up, this could become an F5 tornado.

source: 私は以前には持っていなかった 能力を得ました
target: I gained an ability that maybe I didn't have before.

source: 出来ても タダでやらん
target: If you're good at something, never do it for free.

target: I dont knowif theresawayout of all this for yall,whichisa shame.

source: 今、取引を終わる時間です

target: - ♪ Never knew I was a dancer ♪ - That's it.

source: And I'm gonna take you home with me
target: {\fnDroid Sans Fallback}And I'm gonna take you home with me

target: There are students, who have been disappointed in every way.

target: - It was my decision, I told them to go ahead.

target: Wardo, it's like a final club, except we're the president.

target: We're not breeding them that clever. Unless they have help.

source: ただ それだけのことだ 簡単なことだよ
target: That's all there is to it. It's a simple matter.

target: - You're not gonna find any of those girls, you know.

target: That was taken in a small fishing village called Zhengjiu.

target: If I brought you some flowers, you'll be treated better?

target: That'll mean nothing to you, I know, but don't worry.

target: He must have fished the ticket out of the trash.

source: -稼いでいたんだろ　その必要はなかった

target: And in order to do that, we have to hunt.

source: いいわ 連れてらっしゃいよ
target: Fine. There's two of you? You can bring him along.

source: ヒーローとして 呼び戻されるさ
target: When they call, a hero's what we're gonna give them.

target: You know, you're looking at it wrong, the... sky thing.

target: You're flapping' around like a bunch of drunken ducks!

target: So, which is it? Do I have free will?

target: Okay, so what do we do with the rocks?

target: If you knew me the way you know him,
